x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crispy Lemon Pecorino Chicken Cutlets ğŸ‹ğŸ§€ğŸ”¥
Golden-crusted chicken cutlets coated with sharp Pecorino Romano, drizzled with a zesty lemon cream sauce and sprinkled with fresh herbsâ€”perfectly crispy, tangy, and rich in flavor!

Ingredients ğŸ›’

2 boneless chicken breasts, halved and pounded

1/2 cup grated Pecorino Romano

1 cup panko breadcrumbs

1/2 cup flour

2 eggs, beaten

Salt &amp; pepper to taste

Olive oil for frying

Lemon Sauce:

1/2 cup chicken broth

1/4 cup heavy cream

Juice of 1 lemon

1 tsp lemon zest

1 tbsp butter

Salt, pepper, and chopped parsley to finish

Directions ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³
1ï¸âƒ£ Dredge chicken in flour, then egg, then a mix of panko and Pecorino.
2ï¸âƒ£ Pan-fry in olive oil until golden brown and cooked through.
3ï¸âƒ£ In a pan, simmer broth and lemon juice. Stir in cream, butter, and zest until thickened.
4ï¸âƒ£ Drizzle sauce over hot cutlets and garnish with parsley.

â° Prep Time: 15 minutes
â° Cook Time: 15 minutes
ğŸ½ Servings: 4
ğŸ”¥ Calories: ~430 kcal per serving

x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/mediterraneanideas/permalink/1027642389023675/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Pineapple Cucumber Salad
**Ingredients:
â€¢ 2 cups fresh pineapple (diced)
â€¢ 1 large English cucumber (sliced or chopped)
â€¢ 1 small jalapeÃ±o (minced, seeds removed for less heat)
â€¢ 1/4 small red onion (thinly sliced)
â€¢ 1/4 cup fresh cilantro (chopped)
â€¢ 1/4 cup feta cheese (crumbled)
â€¢ 2 tbsp fresh lime juice
â€¢ 1 tbsp honey or maple syrup
â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
â€¢ 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes
â€¢ 1/4 tsp black pepper
â€¢ 1/2 tsp salt
**Directions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the pineapple, cucumber, jalapeÃ±o, red onion, and cilantro.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, honey (or maple syrup), olive oil, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.
3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
4. Sprinkle crumbled feta over the top before serving.
5. Chill for 10â€“15 minutes before serving for best flavor.
**Servings: 4
**Estimated Calories: 120 per serving</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02vkSbxhLdpdTYuMkfXiUCp1gqQgFzp3A5bDSLBDeBJ8UJthA8pxzVuNWcF59GzXBl&amp;id=61563446631039" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">GARLIC BUTTER CHICKEN BITES &amp; SPICY CAJUN ALFREDO TWISTED PASTA ğŸ—ğŸŒ¶ï¸

ğŸ“‹ Ingredients:

For the Chicken Bites:
1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces.
3 tbsp butter.
4 cloves garlic, minced.
1 tsp smoked paprika.
1 tsp Cajun seasoning.
Salt and black pepper, to taste.

For the Spicy Cajun Alfredo Pasta:
12 oz twisted pasta (fusilli or rotini).
2 tbsp butter.
3 cloves garlic, minced.
1.5 cups heavy cream.
1 cup grated Parmesan cheese.
Â½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese.
1 tsp Cajun seasoning (adjust to taste).
Â½ tsp crushed red pepper flakes (optional, for extra heat).
Salt and black pepper, to taste.
Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish).

ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³ Directions:

1ï¸âƒ£ Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the twisted pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2ï¸âƒ£ In a large skillet, melt 3 tbsp butter over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and sautÃ© for about 30 seconds until fragrant. Add the chicken bites, smoked paprika, Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until chicken is golden brown and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
3ï¸âƒ£ In the same skillet, melt 2 tbsp butter over medium heat. Add garlic and sautÃ© for 1 minute. Slowly pour in heavy cream, stirring constantly. Bring to a gentle simmer, then whisk in Parmesan and mozzarella cheese until the sauce is thick and creamy. Stir in Cajun seasoning and crushed red pepper flakes, adjusting seasoning to your taste. Season with salt and pepper.
4ï¸âƒ£ Add cooked twisted pasta to the skillet with the spicy Alfredo sauce. Toss well to coat all pasta with the creamy, cheesy, spicy sauce.
5ï¸âƒ£ Return chicken bites to the skillet and toss gently to combine. Let everything warm together for 2 minutes. Serve hot, garnished with fresh chopped parsley.

â± Preparation time: 10 minutes.
â± Cooking time: 25 minutes.
â± Total time: 35 minutes.
ğŸ”¥ Calories: 850 kcal per serving.
ğŸ½ Servings: 4 servings.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso Ingredients ğŸ›’
1 lb flank steak, thinly sliced

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Sweet Chili Chicken Bowl with Coconut Lime Drizzle

Sticky Sweet Chili Chicken Bowls with Coconut Lime Sauce

Ingredients:

For the Chicken:

1Â½ lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces

1 tablespoon olive oil

Salt and pepper, to taste

Â½ cup sweet chili sauce

1 tablespoon soy sauce

1 tablespoon rice vinegar

1 teaspoon garlic powder

For the Coconut Lime Drizzle:

Â½ cup canned coconut milk (full-fat for best flavor)

1 tablespoon lime juice (freshly squeezed)

1 teaspoon honey or maple syrup

Pinch of salt

1 teaspoon lime zest

For the Bowls:

2 cups cooked jasmine or basmati rice

1Â½ cups steamed broccoli florets

1 cup shredded carrots

1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced

2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro (optional)

Lime wedges, for serving

Directions:

In a medium bowl, whisk together sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and garlic powder.

Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken pieces, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned and cooked through, about 6â€“8 minutes.

Pour the sweet chili sauce mixture over the chicken. Reduce heat to low and let it simmer for 2â€“3 minutes until thick and sticky. Remove from heat.

In a small bowl, whisk together the coconut milk, lime juice, honey, salt, and lime zest. Set aside.

Assemble your bowls: start with a scoop of rice, then top with sweet chili chicken, steamed broccoli, shredded carrots, and red bell pepper slices.

Drizzle with the coconut lime sauce and sprinkle with fresh cilantro. Serve with lime wedges.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cook Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 35 minutes
Kcal: 520 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/3621749484743882/permalink/3880847135500781/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Spicy Brazilian Coconut Chicken

Ingredients:

2 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs (cut into chunks)

1 tablespoon olive oil

1 medium onion, diced

4 garlic cloves, minced

1 red bell pepper, sliced

1 green bell pepper, sliced

1â€“2 red chilies, finely chopped (adjust for spice level)

1 teaspoon smoked paprika

1/2 teaspoon ground cumin

Salt and pepper to taste

1 (14 oz) can coconut milk

1/2 cup chicken broth

2 tablespoons tomato paste

1 tablespoon lime juice

Fresh cilantro, chopped (for garnish)

Steamed rice (for serving)

Directions:

Heat olive oil in a large skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add chicken and season with salt, pepper, paprika, and cumin. Sear until browned, about 4â€“5 minutes per side. Remove and set aside.

In the same pan, sautÃ© onion until translucent, then add garlic, bell peppers, and chilies. Cook for 3â€“4 minutes.

Stir in tomato paste, then pour in coconut milk and chicken broth. Mix well.

Return the chicken to the pan, reduce heat, and simmer for 20â€“25 minutes until the sauce thickens and the chicken is tender.

Stir in lime juice and adjust seasoning.

Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve hot over rice.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes

Kcal: 420 kcal per serving | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/902050565099950/permalink/1081697207135284/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crab and Shrimp Stuffed Salmon

Delicious Salmon Filets Stuffed with Crab, Shrimp, and Seasonings

Ingredients:

- 4 salmon filets

- 1/2 lb crab meat

- 1/2 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined

- 1 tablespoon olive oil

- 1/2 onion, chopped

- 2 cloves garlic, minced

- 1/2 red bell pepper, diced

- 1/2 green bell pepper, diced

- 1/4 cup breadcrumbs

- 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese

- 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped

- Salt and pepper to taste

Directions:

Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).

In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and bell peppers and sautÃ© until softened.

Add the crab meat and shrimp to the skillet and cook until the shrimp is pink and cooked through.

Remove from heat and stir in breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper.

Cut a slit into each salmon filet to create a pocket. Stuff each filet with the crab and shrimp mixture.

Place the stuffed salmon filets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.

Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 25 minutes | Total Time: 40 minutes | Servings: 4 servings | Kcal: 320 kcal</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/497845799_122162897066515497_7822184181712663049_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=Ap_KzsfzD4oQ7kNvwGnht7D&amp;_nc_oc=AdlhVlbCCqFV72rIh7Com27D4MHl4qzxA2wdXHCqwgxGwe_jSuRuZ8JbiaYi4e_F_qmsZshAOm7-00lTnr0aHX0B&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=C1pMa1uaVeXSjpotj1flDA&amp;oh=00_AfPKhoIT9gHlAg7ffFL9hgvTxYht1LulD9Z3B5hZgBVmEQ&amp;oe=6846DE4B"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1224798075220738/permalink/1397421051291772/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Sweet Heat Maple Bacon Chicken Bombs with Sriracha Glaze

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 1/2 cup maple syrup
- 1/4 cup brown sugar
- 1 tablespoon paprika
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 8 slices of bacon
- 1/4 cup Sriracha sauce
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
Preheat your oven to 375Â°F. In a small bowl, mix together the maple syrup, brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Cut each chicken breast into 2-inch pieces. Place the chicken pieces in a large resealable plastic bag and pour the maple syrup mixture over them. Seal the bag and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes. 
Take a slice of bacon and wrap it around a piece of marinated chicken. Place the bacon-wrapped chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Repeat with the remaining chicken pieces. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the bacon is crispy and the chicken is cooked through. 
While the chicken is baking, mix together the Sriracha sauce and a little bit of maple syrup in a small bowl. Once the chicken is done, brush the Sriracha glaze over the chicken bombs. Serve hot and enjoy the sweet heat of these delicious maple bacon chicken bombs with Sriracha glaze!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1224798075220738/permalink/1395000271533850/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Spicy Honey JalapeÃ±o Chicken Skewers

- 1 lb chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
- 2 jalapeÃ±os, seeded and diced
- 1/4 cup honey
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tsp garlic powder
- 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Wooden skewers, soaked in water for 30 minutes

Cilantro Lime Dip:
- 1/2 cup Greek yogurt
- 1/4 cup chopped cilantro
- Juice of 1 lime
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper, to taste

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix together the diced jalapeÃ±os, honey, soy sauce, olive oil, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Add in the chicken cubes and toss to coat. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
2. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread the marinated chicken onto the soaked skewers.
3. Grill the skewers for 6-8 minutes per side, or until the chicken is cooked through and slightly charred.
4. While the chicken is grilling, prepare the cilantro lime dip by combining the Greek yogurt, chopped cilantro, lime juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Mix well.
5. Serve the Spicy Honey JalapeÃ±o Chicken Skewers hot with the Cilantro Lime Dip on the side for dipping. Enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Sizzling Black Pepper Beef Stir-Fry ğŸ¥©ğŸŒ¶ï¸ğŸ§„
Tender beef strips tossed in a bold black pepper sauce with colorful peppers and onionsâ€”ready in minutes and packed with flavor!

Ingredients ğŸ›’

1 lb flank steak or sirloin, thinly sliced

1 red bell pepper, chopped

1 green bell pepper, chopped

1 onion, chopped

3 cloves garlic, minced

2 tbsp soy sauce

1 tbsp oyster sauce

1 tbsp hoisin sauce

1 tbsp black pepper (fresh cracked preferred)

1/2 tsp sugar

1 tbsp cornstarch (to coat beef)

2 tbsp oil (for frying)

Sesame seeds &amp; green onions (for garnish)

Directions ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³
1ï¸âƒ£ Prep: Toss beef with cornstarch and a pinch of salt. Set aside.
2ï¸âƒ£ Sear: Heat oil in a wok or pan. Sear beef until browned; remove and set aside.
3ï¸âƒ£ SautÃ©: In the same pan, cook onions, peppers, and garlic until just tender.
4ï¸âƒ£ Sauce: Add soy, oyster, hoisin, sugar, and black pepper. Stir well.
5ï¸âƒ£ Combine: Return beef to the pan, toss to coat everything in the sauce. Cook 1â€“2 minutes more.
6ï¸âƒ£ Garnish &amp; Serve: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions. Serve hot with rice or noodles.

â° Prep Time: 10 minutes
â° Cook Time: 15 minutes
ğŸ½ Servings: 4
ğŸ”¥ Calories: ~350 kcal per serving

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02KbUd9zMGyGz6EcLGH4iz8jsViACQFKorf7bFKApsRgjdA4wDEpYPLo6F2DiMgekYl&amp;id=61557880173115" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ…ğŸŒ¿ğŸ” Tuscan Garlic Chicken &amp; Crispy Potatoes with Sun-Dried Tomato Mushroom Pestoâ€”a vibrant Mediterranean dish bursting with flavor and texture! Tender grilled chicken bites marinated in garlic and herbs, served atop crispy garlic-herb potatoes, all drizzled with a creamy mushroom pesto sauce enhanced with the sweet and tangy notes of sun-dried tomatoes. A truly delightful and satisfying meal! ğŸ¥”ğŸ§„ğŸ„âœ¨

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2-3)

ğŸ” Grilled Chicken Bites in Garlic-Herb Marinade:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
2 tbsp olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced ğŸ§„
1 tbsp fresh oregano, chopped ğŸŒ¿
Â½ tsp dried thyme
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ¥” Crispy Garlic-Herb Potatoes:
2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, cut into Â½-inch cubes
2 tbsp olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 tbsp fresh rosemary, chopped
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ„ğŸŒ¿ğŸ… Twist: Creamy Mushroom Pesto Sauce Enhanced with Sun-Dried Tomatoes:
8 oz cremini mushrooms, finely chopped
2 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
Â¼ cup sun-dried tomatoes (oil-packed), drained and chopped
Â¼ cup fresh basil leaves
Â¼ cup heavy cream
2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese ğŸ§€
1 tbsp lemon juice ğŸ‹
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ”¥ Instructions

Marinate &amp; Grill the Chicken: In a bowl, toss chicken bites with olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Heat a grill pan or skillet over medium-high heat. Grill or sautÃ© chicken for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and lightly charred. Set aside.
Prepare the Crispy Garlic-Herb Potatoes: Preheat oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C). In a bowl, toss potato cubes with olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Spread potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy, flipping halfway through.
Prepare the Creamy Mushroom Pesto Sauce with Sun-Dried Tomatoes: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add chopped mushrooms and minced garlic. Cook until mushrooms are softened and have released their liquid, about 5-7 minutes. Stir in the chopped sun-dried tomatoes and cook for another minute. Transfer the mushroom and sun-dried tomato mixture to a food processor or blender. Add basil leaves, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and lemon juice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Assemble &amp; Serve: Arrange the crispy garlic-herb potatoes on plates or in a bowl. Drizzle generously with the creamy mushroom pesto sauce enhanced with sun-dried tomatoes. Top with the grilled garlic-herb marinated chicken bites.
âœ¨ A flavorful and satisfying dish that combines the bright Mediterranean herbs with the earthy mushrooms, sweet and tangy sun-dried tomatoes, and crispy potatoes. A delightful culinary experience!

vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Cajun Cabbage Jambalaya ğŸŒ¶ï¸ğŸšğŸŒ¿
Spicy, smoky, and soul-satisfyingâ€”this one-pot Cajun favorite features tender sausage, hearty rice, fresh veggies, and bold seasoning simmered in a rich tomato base!

Ingredients ğŸ›’
1 lb smoked sausage, sliced
1 tbsp olive oil
1/2 onion, chopped
1 bell pepper, chopped
2 celery stalks, chopped
1 cup shredded green cabbage
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes
1 cup long-grain white rice (uncooked)
2 cups chicken broth
1 tbsp Cajun seasoning
Salt and pepper, to taste
Fresh parsley, for garnish

Directions ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³
1ï¸âƒ£ SautÃ© Base: In a large pot, heat olive oil. Add sausage and cook until browned. Remove and set aside.
2ï¸âƒ£ Cook Veggies: In the same pot, sautÃ© onion, bell pepper, celery, and cabbage until softened (about 5â€“7 minutes). Add garlic and cook 1 more minute.
3ï¸âƒ£ Build the Pot: Stir in diced tomatoes (with juice), rice, broth, Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.
4ï¸âƒ£ Simmer: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20â€“25 minutes or until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed.
5ï¸âƒ£ Finish &amp; Serve: Stir in cooked sausage. Let sit 5 minutes before serving. Garnish with chopped parsley.

â° Prep Time: 15 minutes
â° Cook Time: 30 minutes
ğŸ½ Servings: 6
ğŸ”¥ Calories: ~450 kcal per serving

x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Homemade Chicken Shawarma â€“ Juicy Middle Eastern
Ingredients:

1 lb (450g) boneless chicken thighs

2 tablespoons plain yogurt

2 tablespoons olive oil

1 tablespoon lemon juice

1 teaspoon ground cumin

1 teaspoon ground coriander

1 teaspoon paprika

1/2 teaspoon turmeric

1/2 teaspoon garlic powder

Salt and pepper to taste

Directions:

In a bowl, mix yogurt, oil, lemon juice, and spices.

Add chicken and coat well. Marinate for at least 1 hour (overnight best).

Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C) or heat a grill pan.

Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side or until charred and cooked through.

Slice and serve in pita wraps or bowls with garlic sauce, cucumber, and tomato.

Notes: Can be air-fried or grilled for different textures.

Prep Time: 10 minutes (plus marination) | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 25 minutes + marination</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/grandmassecretrecipes4/permalink/1188193089654497/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/495328718_2838350243028427_2834309842660211017_n.jpg?stp=c0.100.600.600a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=XOggwNwGEKwQ7kNvwFrxe3H&amp;_nc_oc=AdnI8igkZHdZkFJyK3vYkTWluAANTAMWv2KPyJubmL-3GBUegpW9POpID0Iu7DOssoBly8CFQAe6lolmkuCF0NS0&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=JS6B67dxUIN2ZdDOBuohjw&amp;oh=00_AfP6ZPb5pqd5PThvSll5Xq7Dne8cIapNF-1sxdg41-Cpog&amp;oe=6846CBDF"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/grandmassecretrecipes4/permalink/1188193089654497/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Ingredients:

2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces

3 tablespoons  soy sauce

1 tablespoon cornstarch

1 tablespoon vegetable oil

1 bunch green onions, chopped (white and green parts separated)

2 cloves garlic, minced

1 tablespoon ginger, minced

1/4 cup chicken broth

1 tablespoon honey

Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:

In a bowl, combine chicken,  soy sauce, and cornstarch. Mix well and set aside.

Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside.

Add white parts of green onions, garlic, and ginger to the pan. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.

Pour in chicken broth and honey. Bring to a simmer, scraping any browned bits from the bottom of the pan.

Return chicken to the pan, Cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until heated through.

Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Garnish with chopped green onions

Serve over rice or noodles.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0LyCe5ACv7aiTs11PuN8tePYjTcr9rFCPSaaEvxXMoGxptBjcVMshie3W9FpafmB2l&amp;id=61557880173115" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ…ğŸŒ¿ğŸ” Tuscan Garlic Chicken &amp; Roasted Potatoes with Creamy Mushroom Pesto Rossoâ€”a vibrant Mediterranean dish with a rich and slightly sweet twist! Tender garlic-herb marinated grilled chicken bites served alongside crispy roasted garlic rosemary potatoes, all drizzled with a creamy mushroom pesto sauce beautifully blended with sun-dried tomatoes. A truly delightful and flavorful experience! ğŸ¥”ğŸ§„ğŸ„âœ¨

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2-3)

ğŸ” Garlic-Herb Marinated Grilled Chicken Bites:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
2 tbsp olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced ğŸ§„
1 tbsp fresh oregano, chopped ğŸŒ¿
Â½ tsp dried thyme
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ¥” Crispy Roasted Garlic Rosemary Potatoes:
2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, cut into Â½-inch cubes
2 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp fresh rosemary, chopped
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ„ğŸŒ¿ğŸ… Twist: Drizzled Mushroom Pesto Cream Sauce Blended with Sun-Dried Tomatoes:
8 oz cremini mushrooms, finely chopped
2 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
Â¼ cup sun-dried tomatoes (oil-packed), drained and chopped
Â¼ cup fresh basil leaves
Â¼ cup heavy cream
2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese ğŸ§€
1 tbsp lemon juice ğŸ‹
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ”¥ Instructions

Marinate &amp; Grill the Chicken: In a bowl, toss chicken bites with olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Heat a grill pan or skillet over medium-high heat. Grill or sautÃ© chicken for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and lightly charred. Set aside.
Prepare the Crispy Roasted Garlic Rosemary Potatoes: Preheat oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C). In a bowl, toss potato cubes with olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Spread potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy, flipping halfway through.
Prepare the Drizzled Mushroom Pesto Cream Sauce Blended with Sun-Dried Tomatoes: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add chopped mushrooms and minced garlic. Cook until mushrooms are softened and have released their liquid, about 5-7 minutes. Stir in the chopped sun-dried tomatoes and cook for another minute. Transfer the mushroom and sun-dried tomato mixture to a food processor or blender. Add basil leaves, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and lemon juice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Assemble &amp; Serve: Arrange the crispy roasted garlic rosemary potatoes on plates or in a bowl. Top with the grilled garlic-herb marinated chicken bites. Drizzle generously with the creamy mushroom pesto sauce blended with sun-dried tomatoes.
âœ¨ A flavorful and satisfying dish that combines the bright Mediterranean herbs with earthy mushrooms, sweet and tangy sun-dried tomatoes, and crispy potatoes. A delightful culinary experience with a vibrant twist!

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/5692834530750799/permalink/10085513271482881/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Grilled Chicken &amp; Avocado Salad Bowl

Ingredients:

- 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 head romaine lettuce, chopped
- 1 ripe avocado, sliced
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/2 cucumber, sliced
- 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced
- 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese
- Juice of 1 lemon
- 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
- 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
- 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil

Directions:

1. Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Brush the chicken breasts with olive oil and season with paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
2. Grill the chicken for 5â€“7 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked and nicely charred. Set aside to rest for 5 minutes, then slice thinly.
3. In a large salad bowl, arrange the chopped romaine lettuce as the base.
4. Top with sliced avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.
5. For the dressing, whisk together lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, and extra virgin olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
6. Add the grilled chicken slices on top of the salad and drizzle with the dressing just before serving.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 30 minutes

Kcal: 390 kcal | Servings: 2 servings

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ¯ğŸŒ¿ğŸ” Greek Garlic Chicken with Hot Honey Roasted Potatoes &amp; Creamy Mushroom Pestoâ€”a Mediterranean-inspired dish with a delightful balance of savory, sweet, and spicy! Tender garlic-herb grilled chicken slices served alongside crispy potatoes glazed with a spicy hot honey, all drizzled with a creamy mushroom pesto sauce also kissed with hot honey. A truly irresistible flavor combination! ğŸ¥”ğŸ§„ğŸ„ğŸ¯âœ¨

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2-3)

ğŸ” Garlic-Herb Grilled Chicken Slices:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
2 tbsp olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced ğŸ§„
1 tbsp fresh oregano, chopped ğŸŒ¿
Â½ tsp dried thyme
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ¥” Potatoes Glazed with Spicy Hot Honey:
2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, cut into Â½-inch cubes
2 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
Â½ tsp dried oregano
2 tbsp hot honey (or regular honey with a pinch of red pepper flakes) ğŸŒ¶ï¸
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ„ğŸŒ¿ğŸ¯ Creamy Mushroom Pesto Sauce Drizzled with Hot Honey:
8 oz cremini mushrooms, finely chopped
2 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
Â¼ cup fresh basil leaves
Â¼ cup heavy cream
2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese ğŸ§€
1 tbsp hot honey (or regular honey with a pinch of red pepper flakes) ğŸŒ¶ï¸
1 tbsp lemon juice ğŸ‹
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ”¥ Instructions

Marinate &amp; Grill the Chicken: In a bowl, toss chicken slices with olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Heat a grill pan or outdoor grill to medium-high heat. Grill chicken for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through and lightly charred. Set aside.
Prepare the Hot Honey Roasted Potatoes: Preheat oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C). In a bowl, toss potato cubes with olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper. Spread potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and drizzle with hot honey. Toss to coat and return to the oven for another 5-10 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
Prepare the Creamy Mushroom Pesto Sauce with Hot Honey Drizzle: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add chopped mushrooms and minced garlic. Cook until mushrooms are softened and have released their liquid, about 5-7 minutes. Transfer the cooked mushroom mixture to a food processor or blender. Add basil leaves, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and lemon juice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle hot honey over the sauce before serving.
Assemble &amp; Serve: Arrange the hot honey-glazed crispy potatoes on plates or in a bowl. Top with the garlic-herb grilled chicken slices. Drizzle generously with the creamy mushroom pesto sauce kissed with hot honey.
âœ¨ A delectable dish that perfectly balances the savory chicken and potatoes with the sweetness and spice of hot honey, all complemented by the earthy and creamy mushroom pesto. A truly delightful culinary experience!

x1lku1pv x1a2a7pz x9f619 x3nfvp2 xdt5ytf xl56j7k x1n2onr6 xh8yej3" role="button" tabindex="0"><div role="none" class="x1ja2u2z x78zum5 x2lah0s x1n2onr6 xl56j7k x6s0dn4 xozqiw3 x1q0g3np xi112ho x17zwfj4 x585lrc x1403ito x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1qhmfi1 x1r1pt67 x7at6mh xkde5i4"><div class="html-div xdj266r xat24cr xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x6s0dn4 x78zum5 xl56j7k x14ayic xwyz465 x1e0frkt"><div role="none" class="x9f619 x1n2onr6 x1ja2u2z x193iq5w xeuugli x6s0dn4 x78zum5 x2lah0s xsqbvy7 xb9jzoj"><i data-visualcompletion="css-img" class="x1b0d499 xep6ejk" aria-hidden="true" style="background-image: url(&quot;https://static.xx.fbcdn.net/rsrc.php/v4/yF/r/aI2ybVCJ0LG.png&quot;); background-position: 0px -567px; background-size: auto; width: 16px; height: x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/grandmassecretrecipes4/permalink/1187564016384071/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/495335156_2837618963101555_1198102705305318363_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=107&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=VHGVjduJluEQ7kNvwGeuBNk&amp;_nc_oc=Adl_RypE-1TZDen6xgevtVzVfC5bBy_1CDRDcoPnp2CmeM81cHtyLm0Uyh7Sehg21QTCPPLdu24HbfkvQiZbhy0L&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=IqR0uyIBER0lWSCFTjQ-WA&amp;oh=00_AfNWvv5fpen1sFTyDWXVN8SB0ceq5GhK6WL2QXSD0x2brA&amp;oe=6846D777"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/grandmassecretrecipes4/permalink/1187564016384071/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Ingredients:

For the Shrimp:

1 lb medium shrimp (peeled and deveined)

2 tbsp olive oil

1/2 tsp paprika

1/4 tsp garlic powder

1/4 tsp onion powder

Salt and pepper to taste

A squeeze of fresh lime juice (optional)

For the Salad:

1 cucumber, sliced

1 cup cherry tomatoes, sliced

1/2 red onion, thinly sliced

1 bell pepper, sliced (green or red)

1/2 cup sliced green onion

Fresh parsley for garnish

For the Dressing:

1/4 cup olive oil

2 tbsp vinegar (apple cider vinegar or white vinegar)

1 tbsp honey (or to taste)

1 tsp Dijon mustard (optional)

1/2 tsp chili flakes or cayenne pepper (optional)

Salt and pepper to taste

A pinch of garlic powder

Instructions:

Cook the Shrimp:

Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.

Season the shrimp with paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.

Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for about 2-3 minutes per side or until they turn pink and crispy.

Squeeze fresh lime juice over the cooked shrimp for added flavor.

Prepare the Salad:

In a large bowl, combine sliced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, bell pepper, and green onion.

Toss gently to mix all the veggies together.

Make the Dressing:

In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, honey, Dijon mustard, chili flakes (if using), garlic powder, salt, and pepper.

Adjust the sweetness or acidity with more honey or vinegar, if needed.

Assemble the Salad:

Add the crispy shrimp to the bowl with the fresh vegetables.

Pour the dressing over the salad and toss everything together to coat evenly.

Garnish:

Garnish the salad with fresh parsley for a fresh touch.

Serve:

Serve immediately and enjoy the refreshing, crispy shrimp salad!

This dish is full of fresh flavors with a zesty dressing and crispy shrimp. Perfect as a light lunch or dinner! ğŸ¤ğŸ¥’</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div x1e5q0jg x13rtm0m x1q0g3np x87ps6o x1lku1pv x1a2a7pz xzsf02u x1rg5ohu" href="/groups/561822948958184/?__tn__=%3C" role="link" tabindex="0"><div class="x1rg5ohu x1n2onr6 x3ajldb x1ja2u2z"><svg xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/495430553_1390169685586346_1511645831351762254_n.jpg?stp=c0.95.720.720a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=WiVaO1MakooQ7kNvwHoRzRj&amp;_nc_oc=Adl-SlF6R-s-RrorxE3hc4jxTZ-UdARkrdwoPAAaoexUPdBXwdjXosbYMD9tfn-PmKj-p2ign729WkiZQEZPNnW7&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=IqR0uyIBER0lWSCFTjQ-WA&amp;oh=00_AfPgfPkGBF1vfncddfcy1ukyF_Ojso5ojdZF52NvNSXyjg&amp;oe=6846D1BC"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/902050565099950/permalink/1073925081245830/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Here's a simple recipe for Ravioli with Tomatoes, Asparagus, Garlic, and Herbs:

**Ingredients:**
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 pound asparagus, ends trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
- 2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano (or fresh, if preferred)
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 package of ravioli (about 9 oz), preferably cheese or vegetable-filled
- 1/4 cup fresh basil or parsley, chopped (optional)
- Parmesan cheese, for garnish (optional)

**Instructions:**
1. **Cook the Ravioli:** In a large pot of salted water, cook the ravioli according to package instructions. Drain, reserving about 1/2 cup of the cooking water. Set aside.

2. **Prepare the Vegetables:** While the ravioli cooks, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the asparagus and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned, stirring occasionally.

3. **Add Tomatoes and Garlic:** Add the cherry tomatoes and garlic to the skillet with the asparagus. Cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until the tomatoes soften and release their juices.

4. **Combine:** Add the cooked ravioli to the skillet with the vegetables. Gently toss everything together. If the mixture seems too dry, add a bit of the reserved pasta cooking water to create a light sauce.

5. **Season and Serve:** Stir in the dried oregano, salt, and pepper to taste. If desired, sprinkle with fresh herbs and Parmesan cheese. Serve warm.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02FbqpE8ZHuBXU3JKzLNNMnnnfkuTSaVzGYZasq6vs1B1uDBVNkAHFXBHK6dNeDQ9kl&amp;id=61557880173115" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ¥¥ğŸŒ¿ğŸ” Coconut Garlic Greek Chicken with Roasted Potatoes &amp; Creamy Mushroom Basil Pestoâ€”a Mediterranean-inspired dish with a luscious tropical twist! Tender chicken marinated in fragrant garlic and creamy coconut milk, grilled with classic Greek herbs, served alongside crispy garlic rosemary potatoes, all drizzled with an exotic coconut-infused mushroom basil pesto cream sauce. A unique and delightful fusion of flavors! ğŸ¥”ğŸ§„ğŸ„âœ¨

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2-3)

ğŸ” Chicken Marinated in Garlic and Coconut Milk, Grilled Greek-Style:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
Â¼ cup full-fat coconut milk
2 cloves garlic, minced ğŸ§„
1 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp fresh oregano, chopped ğŸŒ¿
Â½ tsp dried thyme
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ¥” Crispy Garlic Rosemary Potatoes:
2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, cut into Â½-inch cubes
1 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp fresh rosemary, chopped
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ„ğŸŒ¿ğŸ¥¥ Exotic Coconut-Infused Mushroom Basil Pesto Cream Sauce:
8 oz cremini mushrooms, finely chopped
2 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
Â¼ cup fresh basil leaves
Â¼ cup full-fat coconut milk
2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese (optional) ğŸ§€
1 tbsp lemon juice ğŸ‹
Salt &amp; freshly cracked black pepper to taste
ğŸ”¥ Instructions

Marinate &amp; Grill the Chicken: In a bowl, combine coconut milk, minced garlic, olive oil, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add chicken slices and marinate for at least 30 minutes (or up to a few hours in the refrigerator). Heat a grill pan or outdoor grill to medium-high heat. Grill chicken for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through and lightly charred. Set aside.
Prepare the Crispy Garlic Rosemary Potatoes: Preheat oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C). In a bowl, toss potato cubes with olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Spread potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy, flipping halfway through.
Prepare the Exotic Coconut-Infused Mushroom Basil Pesto Cream Sauce: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add chopped mushrooms and minced garlic. Cook until mushrooms are softened and have released their liquid, about 5-7 minutes. Transfer the cooked mushroom mixture to a food processor or blender. Add basil leaves, coconut milk, Parmesan cheese (if using), and lemon juice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Assemble &amp; Serve: Arrange the crispy garlic rosemary potatoes on plates or in a bowl. Top with the grilled coconut garlic Greek chicken slices. Drizzle generously with the exotic coconut-infused mushroom basil pesto cream sauce.
âœ¨ A unique and flavorful dish that beautifully blends the aromatic Greek herbs with the creamy richness of coconut and the earthy notes of mushroom and basil. A delightful culinary adventure!

x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/grandmassecretrecipes4/permalink/1186814699792336/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ“ Ingredients:

For the Herb-Grilled Chicken:

2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (or thighs), sliced into pieces

1 tbsp olive oil

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp dried parsley

1/2 tsp dried oregano

1/2 tsp salt

1/2 tsp black pepper

1/2 tsp lemon juice

For the Baked Sweet Potato:

1 large sweet potato

1/2 tbsp butter

1/4 tsp salt (optional)

For the SautÃ©ed Asparagus:

1 bunch asparagus, trimmed

1 tsp olive oil

1/2 tsp garlic powder

1/4 tsp salt

1/4 tsp black pepper

ğŸ½ï¸ Step by Step:

1ï¸âƒ£ Bake the Sweet Potato:

Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).

Wash and pierce the sweet potato with a fork.

Place on a baking sheet and bake for 45-50 minutes until soft.

Slice open, fluff with a fork, and add butter and a pinch of salt.

2ï¸âƒ£ Grill the Chicken:

In a bowl, mix chicken with olive oil, garlic powder, parsley, oregano, salt, pepper, and lemon juice.

Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat.

Cook for 4-5 minutes per side until fully cooked.

3ï¸âƒ£ SautÃ© the Asparagus:

Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.

Add asparagus, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.

Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally until slightly charred but still crisp.

4ï¸âƒ£ Assemble and Serve:

Plate the grilled chicken, baked sweet potato, and asparagus.

Serve warm and enjoy!

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cook Time: 50 minutes | Total Time: 1 hour

Calories: ~450 per serving | Protein: ~40g per serving</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Grilled Chicken &amp; Avocado Salad Bowl ğŸ¥‘
A fresh, protein-packed bowl for a satisfying and healthy meal!
ğŸ“ Ingredients:
1 grilled chicken breast, sliced
2 cups romaine or mixed greens
Â½ avocado, diced
Â½ cup cherry tomatoes, chopped
Â½ cup cucumber, sliced
Â½ cup grilled corn
1 tbsp olive oil
Â½ tsp black pepper
Â½ tsp garlic powder
Â½ tsp sea salt
Â½ tsp chili flakes (optional)
For the Avocado Dressing:
Â½ avocado
Â¼ cup Greek yogurt
1 tbsp lemon juice
1 garlic clove, minced
2 tbsp olive oil
Â½ tsp salt
Â½ tsp black pepper
ğŸ½ï¸ Step by Step:
1ï¸âƒ£ Grill the Chicken:
Season chicken with salt, black pepper, and garlic powder.
Grill for 5-6 minutes per side until fully cooked.
Let it rest for a few minutes, then slice.
2ï¸âƒ£ Prepare the Dressing:
Blend avocado, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper until smooth.
3ï¸âƒ£ Assemble the Bowl:
Place chopped romaine or greens in a bowl.
Add avocado, tomatoes, cucumber, and grilled corn.
4ï¸âƒ£ Top with Chicken &amp; Dressing:
Arrange sliced grilled chicken on top.
Drizzle with avocado dressing and sprinkle chili flakes for extra spice.
5ï¸âƒ£ Serve &amp; Enjoy:
Mix everything and enjoy fresh!
Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cook Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 25 minutes
Calories: ~550 per serving | Protein: ~40g per serving</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Delicious Spicy Honey Chicken with Mac and Cheese

Sweet Heat Chicken with Creamy Mac &amp; Cheese

Ingredients:

For the Spicy Honey Chicken:

1Â½ lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs or breasts

1 tablespoon olive oil

1 teaspoon smoked paprika

Â½ teaspoon garlic powder

Â½ teaspoon onion powder

Â½ teaspoon salt

Â¼ teaspoon black pepper

Â¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper (adjust to taste)

Â½ cup honey

2 tablespoons hot sauce (like Frankâ€™s RedHot or Sriracha)

1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar

1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes (optional)

For the Mac and Cheese:

8 oz elbow macaroni

2 tablespoons butter

2 tablespoons all-purpose flour

2 cups milk

2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese

Â½ teaspoon salt

Â¼ teaspoon black pepper

Â¼ teaspoon ground mustard (optional)

Directions:

Make the Chicken:
In a small bowl, mix paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper, and cayenne. Rub over both sides of the chicken.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Sear chicken for 4â€“5 minutes per side until golden and cooked through.
In a small saucepan, combine honey, hot sauce, apple cider vinegar, and red pepper flakes. Bring to a simmer, then lower heat and let it thicken slightly for 2â€“3 minutes.
Pour sauce over chicken in the skillet and cook another 2â€“3 minutes, basting to coat well. Set aside and keep warm.

Make the Mac and Cheese:
Cook macaroni according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in flour and cook 1 minute.
Slowly whisk in milk and cook until thickened, 3â€“4 minutes. Add cheese, salt, pepper, and mustard. Stir until smooth and creamy.
Stir in the cooked macaroni until fully coated.

Serve:
Plate the creamy mac and cheese, top with the spicy honey chicken, and drizzle with extra sauce if desired.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 25 minutes | Total Time: 40 minutes
Kcal: 690 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Savor the sweetness of summer with our Peach Burrata Salad, a symphony of juicy berries, fresh peaches, and creamy burrata balsamic glaze! ğŸ‘ğŸ§€

Peach Burrata Salad
Ingredients :

2 cups of baby green salad
2 fresh peaches, slashed
1/8 cup finely sliced red onion
4 cups of mixed fruit (cherries, blackberries, strawberries), peeled and sliced
1/4 cup salted pistachios
Fresh basil leaves
8 oz burrata cheese ball
Sea salt and fresh black pepper.
Olive oil or olive oil infused with lemon Mey
Balsamic glaze
Instructions :

Prepare the ingredients: Slice the peaches and onions. Pit and cherry and strawberry slices. Strawberries in the shell.
Assemble a salad base: Arrange baby salad greens on a serving tray. Scatter the red onion slices on the greens.
Add fruit: Place berries and cherries in clusters around salad greens, creating areas of color concentration. Leave some space in the center for the burrata.
Arrange the peaches: Stack the sliced peaches in several piles around the tray.
Burrata Place: Place the burrata in the centre of the plate.
Add the finishing touches: sprinkle pistachios and basil leaves on the salad. Drizzle of olive oil and season with freshly cracked black pepper and sea salt.
Finish with balsamic glaze: drizzle balsamic glazing all over salad.
Serve: Enjoy this vibrant salad with a side of crispy bread, crostini, or crackers for a complete meal.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1077634013534873/permalink/1329779468320325/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494224444_1892729818156795_8126051046064722581_n.jpg?stp=c0.180.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=106&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=h5QMR_OJQUYQ7kNvwFYabw_&amp;_nc_oc=AdlHurpzZ5inrVN4e-blUeE8zXEsIPN52xP9U1BvGfdp4Q5rzuOEd0KZL9d13LXE4iGuZR2yzQWxDbcAwmD6fuRB&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0Ny1moou8cY_J9w11LX8rg&amp;oh=00_AfPWw1mfeqaG9oTAHRzyy6Qz1zANDTyzC4gKRc9wtjTOKw&amp;oe=6846E3E4"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1077634013534873/permalink/1329779468320325/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Protein Cookies

Soft, chewy, protein-packed cookies perfect for a post-workout snack or guilt-free treat.

Ingredients:

1 cup creamy peanut butter (or almond butter)
1/2 cup protein powder (vanilla or chocolate)
1/2 cup old-fashioned oats (or oat flour)
1/4 cup honey or maple syrup
1 large egg
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
Pinch of salt
Optional mix-ins:

1/4 cup chocolate chips or chopped nuts
1 tablespoon chia seeds or flaxseeds
Directions:

Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large mixing bowl, combine peanut butter, honey, egg, and vanilla extract until smooth.
Add protein powder, oats, baking soda, and salt. Mix until a dough forms. Adjust texture with more oats or protein powder if needed.
Fold in any desired mix-ins like chocolate chips, nuts, or seeds.
Scoop 1-2 tablespoons of dough for each cookie, roll into balls, and flatten on the baking sheet.
Bake for 8-10 minutes until the edges are set. Cookies will firm up as they cool.
Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 10 minutes | Total Time: 20 minutes
Kcal: 150 kcal | Servings: 12 cookies</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/2308624149483776/permalink/2546950765651112/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Easy Mediterranean Baked Fish

Ingredients:
- 2 Fish fillets (your favorite)
- 6 sprigs Thyme chopped
- 3 sprigs Rosemary chopped
- 1 teaspoon Oregano dried
- 2 teaspoon Parsley chopped or dried
- 4 Garlic cloves minced or chopped or 2 teaspoon paste
- 1 teaspoon Basil chopped (optional)
- 1 teaspoon Lemon zest
- 1 tablespoon Lemon juice
- 1 tablespoon Sweet chilli sauce
- Your favorite spices and pepper to taste 
- 1/4 cup Olive oil

For The Veggies
- 1 cup Cherry tomatoes
- 1/2 cup Kalamata Olives pitted
- 1 medium Onion diced
- 1 Zucchini diced

Directions:

Preheat the oven to 400â„‰.

Add all the ingredients except the veggies to a bowl and combine well.

Rub the marinade on both sides of the fish generously and set aside.

Add the veggies into the remaining marinade and mix well with a spoon until they are well coated.

Pour the veggies into the baking dish, then place the fish on top.

Scrape any remaining marinade from the bowl and pour it on the fish.

Bake in the middle rack of the oven at 400â„‰ for 15 minutes. 

Baking time will depend on how thick your fillets are.

Cook until the fish is flaky or a thermometer reads 145â„‰ internal temperature.

Remove from the oven and let it rest for about 5 minutes, then serve!

Enjoy!

Serves 2</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Who can resist Chicken Birria Tacos? ğŸŒ®â¤ï¸ Crispy tacos filled with juicy chicken, dripping in cheese, and ready to dunk in flavorful consomÃ©! ğŸ¤¤

ğŸ‰&ZeroWidthSpace; ğŸ”¥&ZeroWidthSpace; FULL SECRET RECIPE ğŸ‰&ZeroWidthSpace; ğŸ”¥&ZeroWidthSpace;

Ingredients:

For the Chicken:

3 pounds bone-in chicken thighs
1 teaspoon salt
Â½ teaspoon pepper
2 tablespoons olive oil
Spices for Adobo Sauce:

1 tablespoon black peppercorns (or 1 teaspoon ground pepper)
1 tablespoon cumin seeds (or 1 tsp ground)
1 tablespoon coriander seeds (or 1 tsp ground)
6 whole cloves (or Â¼ teaspoon ground)
Â½ cinnamon stick (or Â¼ teaspoon ground)
Adobo Sauce/ConsomÃ©:

1 yellow onion, chopped
8 cloves garlic, minced
6 dried guajillo chiles, stems and seeds removed
4 dried ancho chiles, stems and seeds removed
1 chili de arbol, stem and seeds removed
4 vine-ripe tomatoes, roughly chopped (or Roma tomatoes)
2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar
1 tablespoon dried oregano
1 tsp smoked paprika
1 tsp dried thyme
Â½ teaspoon salt
4 bay leaves
3 cups reduced sodium chicken broth
For the Tacos:

12-14 corn tortillas
12 ounces Oaxacan cheese or mozzarella, separated into strings
Â½ white onion, chopped
Â¼ cup cilantro, minced
1-2 tablespoons lime juice
Pinch of salt
Directions:

Toast Whole Spices and Chilies: Dry toast the whole spices for the adobo sauce in a large Dutch oven or braiser over medium heat until fragrant. Toast the chilies separately and set aside.

Sear the Chicken: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Heat oil in the pot and sear chicken on both sides until browned. Remove chicken, leaving drippings.

Make the Sauce: In the same pot, add onions and garlic, sautÃ©ing until softened. Add toasted spices, deseeded chilies, and remaining Adobo Sauce ingredients. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until peppers are soft.

Blend the Sauce: Transfer the sauce mixture to a blender and purÃ©e until smooth.

Braise and Shred the Chicken: Return chicken to the pot with the sauce, cover, and simmer. Then transfer to the oven and cook for 20-30 minutes. Shred the chicken once cooked.

Assemble the Tacos: Dip tortillas in sauce, fry until golden, add cheese and shredded chicken, fold and cook until crispy.

Serve: Accompany with a side of consomÃ©, topped with onion, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime.

Prep Time: 30 minutes | Cooking Time: 1 hour | Total Time: 1 hour 30 minutes

Kcal: 650 kcal | Servings: 6 servings

src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/495378121_122133183098623739_5762160526340039401_n.jpg?stp=c0.192.1536.1536a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=pv0-NlXKcj4Q7kNvwHFAh02&amp;_nc_oc=AdlczkNCzrOie5iK5YfQ5iRoa2bOu3FLKmQNlocAUOcudLuaiyU2GY_wb5jLm3v29_Hk32HaB0senrn_2MwWBveK&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0Ny1moou8cY_J9w11LX8rg&amp;oh=00_AfOzBzggilvv_SjZ9ScNEYzrTeBaSDvrKVb71fXogCTr-Q&amp;oe=6846E96C"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0wzBW6B1f13tQqn3W7v56Bom8cg8kX4QyP9AwPJAbz3Neso6Cbia3P1Pyi7UkEsGml&amp;id=61568712180202" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Street Corn Chicken Rice Bowl
A vibrant, flavor-packed bowl with juicy spiced chicken, creamy street corn topping, and fluffy riceâ€”perfect for a satisfying, wholesome meal.

Ingredients

For the Chicken:

4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs

1 tablespoon lime juice

1 tablespoon avocado oil

1 teaspoon chili powder

1 teaspoon cumin

1/2 teaspoon garlic powder or 2 minced garlic cloves

1/2 teaspoon salt

1/4 teaspoon black pepper

For the Street Corn Topping:

1 cup sweet corn kernels (grilled or thawed from frozen)

1/4 cup red onion, thinly sliced

1 cup sour cream (reserve half for drizzling)

2 tablespoons mayonnaise

1/2 cup Cotija cheese, crumbled (plus extra for garnish)

1 teaspoon chili powder

Salt and pepper, to taste

Juice of 1 lime

For the Rice and Assembly:

3 cups cooked rice

Fresh cilantro, for garnish

Lime wedges, for serving

Optional: extra sour cream or TajÃ­n for topping

Instructions

Marinate the Chicken:
In a bowl, combine lime juice, avocado oil, chili powder, cumin, garlic, salt, and pepper. Add chicken thighs and toss to coat. Marinate in the refrigerator for 15â€“30 minutes.

Cook the Chicken:
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook for 8â€“10 minutes per side, or until fully cooked and golden. Remove from heat, let rest, then slice into strips.

Prepare the Street Corn Topping:
In a bowl, mix together corn, red onion, 1/2 cup sour cream, mayonnaise, Cotija cheese, and chili powder. Add lime juice and season with salt and pepper to taste.

Warm the Rice:
Reheat the cooked rice with a splash of water if needed until warm and fluffy.

Assemble the Bowls:
Divide rice among bowls. Top with sliced chicken and generous spoonfuls of the street corn topping. Garnish with extra Cotija cheese, chopped cilantro, and lime wedges.

Finish and Serve:
Drizzle with the remaining sour cream or a sprinkle of TajÃ­n if desired. Serve warm with a squeeze of lime.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494273235_1521871768770706_4598889679524969466_n.jpg?stp=c0.79.683.683a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=b52jaa2KqhkQ7kNvwFpRcqv&amp;_nc_oc=AdlVri2suy8nocV68YlCPGjHDgt2xaQgGgPeewpLagoF-R-Wr29LSlPpobzBT5J13RMbsAWCG6m5KDiRcQPDO2KL&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0Ny1moou8cY_J9w11LX8rg&amp;oh=00_AfNKmuBvw--XFWOgz2M4PkECel20wtHfn7__QUsYDWMIXg&amp;oe=6846C748"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/893991762759396/permalink/1108099598015277/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Salami-Mozzarella Tortellini Pasta Salad Recipe
Ingredients:

1 (20 oz) package cheese tortellini (fresh or refrigerated)
1 cup salami (diced or cut into strips)
1 cup mozzarella balls (bocconcini or ciliegine, halved)
1 cup cherry tomatoes (halved)
1/2 cup black or Kalamata olives (sliced)
1/4 cup red onion (thinly sliced)
1/4 cup fresh basil leaves (chopped)
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (optional)

Dressing:

1/3 cup olive oil
3 tbsp red wine vinegar
1 tsp Dijon mustard
1 tsp Italian seasoning
1/2 tsp garlic powder
Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:

Cook Tortellini
Cook the tortellini according to package instructions. Drain, rinse with cold water, and set aside.

Prepare Dressing
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.

Combine Ingredients
In a large bowl, combine cooked tortellini, salami, mozzarella balls, cherry tomatoes, olives, red onion, and fresh basil.

Add Dressing
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat everything evenly.

Chill
Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to let the flavors meld.

Serve
Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired, before serving.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/307896924846752/permalink/867063668930072/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Slow Cooker Honey Garlic Chicken

Ingredients:

Honey Garlic Sauce

1/3 cup honey

1 tbsp garlic, minced

1/2 cup soy sauce, low sodium (see note)

1/4 cup ketchup

1 tsp dried oregano

Crockpot Chicken and Vegetables

2 pounds chicken thighs, bone-in, skin-on

1 pound baby red potatoes

1 pound carrots, peeled

1 cup onions, chopped

1 pound green beans, trimmed

fresh parsley, chopped, for serving optional

salt and pepper to taste

Cornstarch Slurry (Optional)

2 tsp cornstarch

3 tsp water

Instructions:

In a small bowl, whisk together honey, garlic, soy sauce, oregano and ketchup.

Add the chicken thighs, potatoes, carrots and onions to a 4-6 quart slow cooker.

Pour the honey garlic sauce mixture evenly on top.

Cover the slow cooker and seal the lid. Cook on a LOW setting for 6-8 hours or on HIGH for 3-3 1/2 hours (see note).

About 20 minutes before serving, add the green beans to the slow cooker and optional cornstarch slurry to the sauce.

Re-seal the lid and cook for 15-20 minutes more until the green beans are tender and the sauce is starting to thicken.

Remove the chicken and vegetables to serving plates using a slotted spoon. Optional: Broil the chicken thighs for 2-3 minutes to brown the skin.

Drizzle sauce on top of chicken and vegetables. Garnish with optional minced parsley.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl
