xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494314595_1404323337427062_8312346639723397703_n.jpg?stp=c0.79.803.803a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=101&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=QVm_jGDOldsQ7kNvwEFtT9x&amp;_nc_oc=AdnNUf2NZlLwc8iFFLzvWrpz42ChKDUA9KF-JLswBc_qURsF0xkIK2__pOyD9Nx5vXjGxpVp4tp31wTGRv45XtkZ&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0Ny1moou8cY_J9w11LX8rg&amp;oh=00_AfNd4AqM_W75EKXUqrVYIE_oTYnWoX5QjfgmkEYrwa9uuA&amp;oe=6846DEEE"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/902050565099950/permalink/1070455864926085/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Cajun Chicken Alfredo with Fettuccine Pasta

Ingredients:

2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
12 oz fettuccine pasta
2 tablespoons olive oil
2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika
1/2 teaspoon onion powder
Salt and pepper to taste
1 cup heavy cream
1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, grated
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 cup chicken broth
2 tablespoons butter
Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Directions:

Cook the fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain, reserving 1 cup of pasta water, and set aside.
Season the chicken strips with Cajun seasoning, garlic powder, smoked paprika, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken strips and cook for 4-5 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and sautÃ© for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the chicken broth and bring to a simmer, scraping the bits from the bottom of the skillet.
Pour in the heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, stirring until the sauce is smooth and creamy.
Add the cooked chicken and fettuccine pasta into the skillet, tossing to coat in the creamy sauce. If the sauce is too thick, add some reserved pasta water to reach the desired consistency.
Cook for 2-3 more minutes, allowing the sauce to thicken slightly and the flavors to meld together.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot!

Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Servings: 4 | Calories: ~700 per serving</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div class="x14vqqas"><div class="x6s0dn4 x78zum5"><div aria-hidden="true" class="html-div xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494351555_122200616642263248_4983619966174998288_n.jpg?stp=c0.256.1536.1536a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=106&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=aRKYB8v1cqYQ7kNvwGeUuA8&amp;_nc_oc=AdlSzc1FsK-qCALJVzT6qrLK2wyB1PutQjc2GxiR-deOqKZrGggwc6v4KdMwE7fJpyEQL5EEAESAz3-XTYQGPZgx&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=8am2KqZP4adufRb9FMR6Tg&amp;oh=00_AfOZsEM6l8cfon05UaU2hEkHXElwyTq1unT2DDEcpbefzw&amp;oe=6846DA80"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0Trujhgtx7CaN4Mh8bEbA6Ya236BJcmvuNqWu2yjjLniV4Ni3TZQg2wwqp7a9buWWl&amp;id=61557897448601" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Quick Southwest Chicken Salad

A flavorful and easy-to-make chicken salad with a Southwest twist.

Ingredients:

- 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
- 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
- 1 cup corn kernels
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 1/2 red onion, chopped
- 1 avocado, diced
- 1/4 cup cilantro, chopped
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Juice of 1 lime
- 2 tablespoons olive oil

Directions:

1. In a large bowl, combine the shredded chicken, black beans, corn, bell pepper, red onion, avocado, and cilantro.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the cumin, chili powder, salt, pepper, lime juice, and olive oil.
3. Pour the dressing over the chicken and vegetable mixture and toss to combine.
4. Serve the salad chilled or at room temperature.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 0 minutes | Total Time: 15 minutes | Servings: 4 servings

target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/495223425_122140763540404397_3416381376953181262_n.jpg?stp=c0.104.992.992a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=PE_cQzJwbWMQ7kNvwHsRwN8&amp;_nc_oc=AdlQ8RK0-cB74ZUw0fPfm758xmAdXzLxTfZkHm6PJSvl0YCO9O26RldO9wGlZXmh9eBf7ev7OpXMJfcKe-zB124r&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=8am2KqZP4adufRb9FMR6Tg&amp;oh=00_AfNND69uCFQmsd_gimJPhVevqOC7GjJOSXpCD947C-Ylhw&amp;oe=6846E97F"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02jdm9zDQqdAdSf3xoP1Noh2P3c79gdKgeDeJDZ5hrhLoeHhqw6djCXzhrtvJ6RPQtl&amp;id=61562131926422" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Juicy Korean-Style BBQ Meatballs with Spicy Mayo Sauce ğŸŒ¶ï¸ğŸ”¥ğŸ¤¤ Ready in 30 minutes, a flavor explosion!

Ingredients:

 1 lb ground beef or a mix of beef and pork
 1/2 cup finely chopped onion
 1/4 cup finely chopped green onion
 2 cloves garlic, minced
 1 tablespoon Korean BBQ sauce or your favorite BBQ sauce
 1 tablespoon soy sauce
 1 teaspoon sesame oil
 1/2 teaspoon ginger, grated
 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
 1 large egg, lightly beaten
 Cooking oil for frying

Spicy Mayo Sauce:

 1/2 cup mayonnaise
 1 tablespoon gochujang Korean chili paste
 1 teaspoon sriracha or more, to taste
 1/2 teaspoon rice vinegar
 1/4 teaspoon sesame oil

Instructions:

1. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, onion, green onion, garlic, Korean BBQ sauce, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, and black pepper. Gently mix until just combined; be careful not to overmix.
2. Add the breadcrumbs and beaten egg to the meat mixture. Gently mix until everything is evenly distributed.
3. Roll the meat mixture into 1-inch meatballs.
4. Heat about 1 tablespoon of cooking oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Add the meatballs to the skillet and cook for about 5-7 minutes, turning occasionally, until they are browned on all sides and cooked through.  You may need to cook them in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan.
6. While the meatballs are cooking, prepare the spicy mayo sauce. In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, gochujang, sriracha, rice vinegar, and sesame oil until smooth and well combined. Adjust the amount of sriracha to your preferred level of spiciness.
7. Once the meatballs are cooked, remove them from the skillet and transfer them to a serving dish.
8. Serve the meatballs immediately with the spicy mayo sauce for dipping.  Garnish with extra green onions, if desired.

Enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/736976511261852/permalink/1025634665729367/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Cheesy Burrata Crostini with Prosciutto and Peaches.

Ingredients:

1 loaf of sourdough or French baguette, sliced

â…“ cup grated Parmesan cheese

â…“ cup grated Pecorino cheese

1 clove garlic, grated

2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves

2 tablespoons melted butter

4 ounces prosciutto

8 ounces burrata cheese, at room temperature

2 peaches, sliced

Hot honey (for drizzling)

Fresh basil leaves

Instructions:

Preheat the Oven:

Preheat your oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).

Prepare the Cheesy Base:

On a baking sheet, mix together the Parmesan, Pecorino, grated garlic, fresh thyme, melted butter, and a pinch of black pepper. Spread this mixture evenly across the sheet.

Assemble the Bread:

Place the sliced baguette over the cheesy mixture, then brush the tops of the bread with additional melted butter. Arrange the prosciutto slices on top of or around the bread.

Bake:

Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the bread is golden and crispy and the prosciutto has crisped up nicely.

Assemble the Crostini:

Transfer the cheesy bread to a serving platter or board. Tear the burrata and spread it over the bread. Top with fresh peach slices, crispy prosciutto, and basil leaves.

Finish and Serve:

Drizzle the crostini with hot honey to add a sweet and spicy kick. These crostini are delicious when served warm, but theyâ€™re equally great at room temperature.

class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Falafel Veggie Burgers ğŸ§†ğŸŒ¿
A crispy, herby falafel patty made with chickpeas and greens, served with creamy tahini and chopped veggie saladâ€”Mediterranean flavor in every bite!

â° Total Time:
Prep: 15 mins | Cook: 10 mins | Total: 25 mins

ğŸ›’ Ingredients:

1 can chickpeas, drained
1/4 cup fresh parsley
1/4 cup chopped onion
2 garlic cloves
1/3 cup oat flour or breadcrumbs
1 tsp cumin
Salt &amp; pepper to taste
Olive oil for cooking
Optional: chopped tomato, cucumber salad + tahini dressing
ğŸ“‹ Instructions:

Blend chickpeas, parsley, onion, garlic, flour, and seasonings until combined.
Form into patties.
Cook in skillet with olive oil until golden, 4â€“5 mins per side.
Serve with salad and drizzle with tahini.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494733852_1235451134816870_7522125292454912242_n.jpg?stp=c0.97.773.773a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=H0RhD62bQgcQ7kNvwEJrQXN&amp;_nc_oc=AdlPOJQOFXLSDrKugC1bzCIy43jtwE1z5bf_EJqCAg5OJwV-6dWNbCOVVPvB8M_7HIDMak8U1vhq3drIEmegNWZm&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=8am2KqZP4adufRb9FMR6Tg&amp;oh=00_AfMwhg15rPajdjOYRh_K31y7ZzIISmg1V33vqQuFLzXfDw&amp;oe=6846B410"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/thespicemerchantsdaughter/posts/pfbid0ypLJjvyVY9chPHxRBqUEyT4BkW1czPoUTsUmMa8hgrffNYv1P3YsfKenrc116WS4l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Something Indian Tonight â€” with a French Twist

Picked up a fresh bag of chickpeas from Punjabi Bazar on East Hill in Kent â€” such a clean, lovely spice shop. 

This Chickpea Confit is a simple yet deeply flavorful way to transform pantry spices. Confit means cooking low and slow in olive oil â€” a method that gently poaches the chickpeas without drying or browning them. The oil becomes a carrier of flavor, drawing in all the spices, herbs, and aromatics, and slowly infusing the chickpeas until theyâ€™re soft, rich, and layered with taste.

A beautiful meeting of Indian spice and French technique â€” easy, and comforting, a creation of Yotam Ottolenghi.

Ingredients
2 tsp cumin seeds
2 tsp coriander seeds
2 x 400g tins chickpeas, drained
10 garlic cloves, peeled
30g/1oz fresh ginger, peeled and julienned
300g/10Â½oz cherry tomatoes
3 red chillies, mild or spicy (to taste), slit open lengthways
1 tbsp tomato purÃ©e
Â½ tsp ground turmeric
Â½ tsp chilli flakes
2 tsp red Kashmiri chilli powder (or paprika)
1 tsp sugar
200ml/7fl oz olive oil
1 tsp salt

For the yoghurt dressing

2â€“3 limes, 1 juiced and the others cut into wedges
8 tbsp roughly chopped fresh mint leaves
8 tbsp roughly chopped fresh coriander leaves
1 garlic clove, crushed
180g/6oz Greek-style yoghurt
Â½ tsp salt

4 pitta breads (or other flatbreads), to serve (optional)

Method
Preheat the oven to 170C/150C 

Roughly crush the cumin and coriander seeds in a pestle and mortar. Combine the crushed spices with the drained chickpeas, whole garlic cloves, ginger, tomatoes, chillies, tomato purÃ©e, turmeric, chilli flakes, chilli powder, sugar, oil and salt in a large, ovenproof saute pan for which you have a lid. Stir to combine, then cover and cook in the oven for 1Â¼ hours or until the aromatics have softened and the tomatoes have broken down. Stir once halfway through the cooking time.

To make the yoghurt dressing, combine 1 tablespoon lime juice with the mint, coriander, crushed garlic, yoghurt and salt in the small bowl of a food processor. Blend until smooth.

Serve the chickpeas directly from the pan (or transfer them to a shallow serving platter), with the yoghurt and lime wedges in separate bowls and warm pitta or flatbread, if you wish.

Credit Yotam Ottelenghi

x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/theRootsandLeaves/posts/pfbid02csv6V3RUdkoG8jFQFf9ryRGVS22bxSufsyPaBMAMCD6Pqnr59gdt341Sr17Cw6jCl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ—ğŸ¥£ Chicken &amp; Rice Bowls with Creamy Garlic Sauce ğŸ§„ | Comfort in Every Savory Bite!
Juicy grilled chicken, fluffy rice, and rich garlic sauce come together in this easy, satisfying bowl!

ğŸš Ingredients:
For the Chicken:

1 1/2 lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 3 medium)

2 tbsp olive oil

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1/2 tsp onion powder

1/2 tsp black pepper

1/2 tsp salt

1 tbsp lemon juice

For the Rice:

1 1/2 cups long grain white rice

3 cups water

1/2 tsp salt

1 tbsp butter

For the Creamy Garlic Sauce:

1/2 cup mayonnaise

1/4 cup plain Greek yogurt

2 tbsp lemon juice

3 cloves garlic, finely minced or grated

1 tbsp olive oil

Salt and pepper to taste

1â€“2 tbsp water (to thin if needed)

Optional Toppings:

Chopped parsley

Diced cucumbers

Cherry tomatoes, halved

Sliced red onion

Crumbled feta cheese

ğŸ‘¨&zwj;ğŸ³ Directions:
1. Prepare the Chicken:

Pound chicken to even thickness if needed.

In a bowl, mix olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper, salt, and lemon juice.

Coat the chicken evenly with the marinade and let sit for at least 15 minutes.

2. Cook the Chicken:

Heat a skillet or grill pan over medium heat.

Cook chicken 5â€“6 minutes per side or until fully cooked (165Â°F internal temp).

Let rest for 5 minutes, then slice into strips.

3. Cook the Rice:

In a saucepan, bring water, rice, salt, and butter to a boil.

Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 15â€“18 minutes or until water is absorbed.

Fluff with a fork.

4. Make the Garlic Sauce:

In a small bowl, whisk together mayo, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

Add water a little at a time until desired consistency is reached.

5. Assemble the Bowls:

Add a scoop of rice to each bowl.

Top with sliced chicken, your favorite toppings, and a generous drizzle of creamy garlic sauce.

â±ï¸ Prep Time:
Total Time: 45 minutes

Calories: Approx. 480 kcal per bowl (without extra toppings)

ğŸ’¡ Tips:
You can meal prep components in advance and store separately for easy lunches.

Swap chicken for grilled turkey or beef strips for variety.

Sauce is great as a dip or salad dressing too!

ğŸ“² Hashtags:
#ChickenRiceBowl #GarlicSauceLovers #EasyDinnerIdeas #MealPrepMagic #ComfortFood #HealthyBowls #facebookviralcontent #SavoryDelights #WeeknightDinner #BowlGoals</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/grandmassecretrecipes4/permalink/1183274903479649/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">A fresh and vibrant dish thatâ€™s bursting with flavor! Juicy grilled chicken marinated in balsamic vinegar, served alongside a refreshing tomato and mozzarella salad, and paired with fluffy white rice for a well-rounded meal. This recipe is perfect for a light yet satisfying lunch or dinner!

ğŸ›’ Ingredients

ğŸ— For the Grilled Balsamic Chicken

Ingredient Quantity Notes

ğŸ— Chicken breasts 4 (boneless, skinless) Tender and juicy when grilled

ğŸ§„ Garlic cloves 2 Minced

ğŸ‹ Lemon juice 2 tbsp Freshly squeezed

ğŸ§‚ Salt 1 tsp Adjust to taste

ğŸ§‚ Black pepper 1/2 tsp Freshly ground

ğŸ¯ Honey 1 tbsp For sweetness

ğŸ§´ Olive oil 2 tbsp For marinating and grilling

ğŸ§ƒ Balsamic vinegar 3 tbsp For tangy depth of flavor

ğŸŒ¿ Fresh thyme 1 tbsp Chopped (optional)

ğŸ… For the Tomato Mozzarella Salad

Ingredient Quantity Notes

ğŸ… Tomatoes 2 large Sliced into thick rounds

ğŸ§€ Fresh mozzarella 8 oz Sliced into rounds or torn

ğŸ§‚ Salt 1/4 tsp For seasoning

ğŸ§‚ Black pepper 1/4 tsp Freshly ground

ğŸ§´ Olive oil 2 tbsp For drizzling

ğŸ‹ Balsamic glaze 1 tbsp For drizzling (optional)

ğŸŒ¿ Fresh basil 1/4 cup Chopped, for garnish

ğŸš For the White Rice

Ingredient Quantity Notes

ğŸš White rice 1 cup Rinsed well

ğŸ’§ Water 2 cups For cooking the rice

ğŸ§‚ Salt 1/4 tsp Optional, for flavor

ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³ Instructions

ğŸ— 1. Marinate the Chicken

ğŸ§„ In a small bowl, combine the minced garlic, lemon juice, honey, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, black pepper, and fresh thyme.

ğŸ— Place the chicken breasts in a resealable plastic bag or shallow dish. Pour the marinade over the chicken, ensuring itâ€™s fully coated.

ğŸ•’ Marinate the chicken in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours for extra flavor.

ğŸš 2. Cook the White Rice

ğŸš In a medium pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil.

ğŸ§‚ Add a pinch of salt, then stir in the rinsed white rice.

ğŸ³ Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.

ğŸ§´ Remove from heat and let the rice sit, covered, for 5 minutes before fluffing with a fork.

ğŸ— 3. Grill the Chicken

ğŸ”¥ Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.

ğŸ— Remove the chicken from the marinade and discard any excess marinade.

ğŸ§´ Lightly oil the grill grates or grill pan. Place the chicken on the grill and cook for 6-7 minutes per side, or until the internal temperature reaches 165Â°F (75Â°C).

ğŸ§‚ Season the grilled chicken with a pinch of salt and black pepper after grilling.

ğŸ… 4. Prepare the Tomato Mozzarella Salad

ğŸ… Arrange the sliced tomatoes and fresh mozzarella on a serving platter or individual plates.

ğŸ§‚ Sprinkle with salt and black pepper to taste.

ğŸ§´ Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze (optional) for added richness.

ğŸŒ¿ Top with fresh chopped basil for a burst of freshness and color.

ğŸ½ï¸ 5. Serve

ğŸš Serve the grilled balsamic chicken alongside the white rice.

ğŸ… Add a generous portion of the tomato mozzarella salad on the side.

ğŸ‹ Garnish the plate with extra fresh basil, a drizzle of balsamic glaze, or a squeeze of fresh lemon juice if desired.

ğŸ”¥ Pro Tips

âœ… Chicken Variations: You can also use chicken thighs instead of breasts for a juicier, more flavorful result.

âœ… Rice Options: If you prefer a different type of rice, you can use brown rice, jasmine rice, or quinoa for a more complex texture.

âœ… Balsamic Glaze: For a deeper balsamic flavor in the salad, drizzle some balsamic glaze over the tomatoes and mozzarella.

âœ… Grilling Tip: If you donâ€™t have a grill, you can also cook the chicken in a skillet on the stovetop for a similar result.

ğŸŒŸ Flavor Profile

âœ”ï¸ Chicken: Juicy with a tangy-sweet balsamic flavor

âœ”ï¸ Tomato Mozzarella Salad: Fresh, creamy, and savory with a burst of basil

âœ”ï¸ Rice: Fluffy, mild, and the perfect base to soak up all the flavors</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494450119_1405582210634508_3412634289199624905_n.jpg?stp=c0.120.960.960a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=MHNZz9OUgecQ7kNvwE5-qqI&amp;_nc_oc=AdnKBfwoRjyGv_b8E_-hD8oVFlNGL6Fw0FweR-lDcm0qoXjBHL38lvHo3noUI1SCbsVrxjNeGH77YdpWw2lFabfh&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=8am2KqZP4adufRb9FMR6Tg&amp;oh=00_AfNbiL0xgNSpSN_1CkAExnKxpgNw92d1NPAhuWVEzV3KqQ&amp;oe=6846C630"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/902050565099950/permalink/1071683104803361/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Honey Pepper Chicken with Creamy Garlic Butter Pasta ğŸ¯ğŸ”ğŸ§„ğŸ

Ingredients:
For the Chicken Bites:
1 lb chicken breast, cubed
Salt, pepper &amp; paprika
1/2 cup flour (or cornstarch for crispiness)
2 tbsp oil for frying

Honey Pepper Sauce:
1/4 cup honey
2 tbsp soy sauce
1 tsp black pepper
1 tbsp hot sauce (optional)
1 clove garlic, minced

For the Pasta:
8 oz spaghetti or fettuccine
2 tbsp butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 cup heavy cream
1/2 cup grated Parmesan

Salt &amp; pepper to taste
Fresh parsley for garnish

---
Instructions:
1. Cook the Pasta:
- Boil pasta until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. Fry the Chicken:
- Season chicken with salt, pepper, and paprika.
- Dredge in flour and pan-fry in oil until golden and crispy. Set aside.

3. Make the Honey Pepper Sauce:
- In a saucepan, combine honey, soy sauce, black pepper, hot sauce, and garlic.
- Simmer until slightly thickened.
- Toss fried chicken in the sauce.

4. Make the Creamy Pasta Sauce:
- In a skillet, melt butter and sautÃ© garlic.
- Add heavy cream and Parmesan. Stir until creamy.
- Toss in cooked pasta and mix well.

5. Plate &amp; Serve:
- Serve creamy garlic pasta with honey pepper chicken. Garnish with chopped parsley.
---
Dish Name: Honey Pepper Chicken &amp; Garlic Cream Pasta
Flavor: Sweet, peppery, creamy, buttery â€” total comfort combo!

The perfect sweet heat + creamy dream!
Dig in and enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/974655921060545/permalink/1188465959679539/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Celery Apple Crunch Salad
Ingredients:
- 2 cups chopped celery
- 2 medium apples, chopped
- 1/2 cup chopped walnuts
- 1/4 cup dried cranberries (optional)
- 1/4 cup mayonnaise or Greek yogurt
- 1 tsp lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. *Combine ingredients:* Mix celery, apples, walnuts, and cranberries (if using).
2. *Dress:* Mix mayonnaise or yogurt with lemon juice, then toss with salad.
3. *Season:* Add salt and pepper to taste.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1952776861842118/permalink/2182536858866116/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ§„Garlic Butter Steak Bites &amp; Creamy 
                         Parmesan Shells ğŸ§€

Ingredients for Garlic Butter Steak Bites:

1 lb sirloin steak, cut into bite-sized pieces
3 tbsp butter
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp fresh thyme (optional)
Â½ tsp salt
Â½ tsp black pepper

Ingredients for Creamy Parmesan Shells:
8 oz shell pasta
1 tbsp butter
1 cup heavy cream
1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
Â½ tsp garlic powder
Salt and pepper to taste
Fresh parsley for garnish

Instructions:

Cook Pasta: Boil shell pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Sear Steak Bites: In a skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add steak bites, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 4-5 minutes until browned. Stir in garlic and thyme, cooking for 30 seconds. Remove and set aside.

Make Creamy Sauce: In the same skillet, melt butter, then add heavy cream, garlic powder, and Parmesan. Stir for 3-4 minutes until thick.

Combine &amp; Serve: Toss pasta in the sauce, then add steak bites back in. Garnish with fresh parsley and enjoy!

x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/395710913049187/permalink/685603304059945/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Hawaiian Chicken-Stuffed Peppers with Teriyaki Drizzle

**Ingredients:**
- 4 large bell peppers, halved and seeded  
- 2 cups cooked shredded chicken  
- 1 cup cooked white rice  
- 1 cup crushed pineapple, drained  
- Â½ cup teriyaki sauce (plus extra for drizzling)  
- Â½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese  
- 2 green onions, sliced  

**Instructions:**
1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F.  
2. In a large bowl, mix chicken, rice, pineapple, teriyaki sauce, and half the cheese.  
3. Stuff pepper halves with the mixture, top with remaining cheese.  
4. Place in a baking dish, cover with foil, and bake for 30 minutes.  
5. Uncover and bake 10 more minutes. Drizzle with extra teriyaki and sprinkle green onions before serving!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/recipessmile/permalink/656324530615524/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Spaghetti Squash with Asparagus, Ricotta, Lemon, and Thyme

A light and refreshing dish featuring spaghetti squash, asparagus, creamy ricotta, zesty lemon, and fragrant thyme.

Ingredients:

- 1 medium spaghetti squash
- 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and cut into bite-sized pieces
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 cup ricotta cheese
- Zest of 1 lemon
- Juice of 1 lemon
- 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves
- Salt and pepper to taste

Directions:

1. Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
2. Cut the spaghetti squash in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds.
3. Drizzle the cut sides of the squash with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
4. Place the squash halves cut-side down on a baking sheet and roast for 30-40 minutes, or until tender.
5. While the squash is roasting, heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
6. Add the asparagus and sautÃ© for 5-7 minutes, or until tender-crisp.
7. In a bowl, combine the ricotta, lemon zest, lemon juice, thyme, salt, and pepper.
8. Once the squash is cooked, use a fork to scrape out the flesh into strands.
9. Toss the spaghetti squash with the asparagus and ricotta mixture until well combined.
10. Serve warm, garnished with additional thyme leaves and lemon zest.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 40 minutes | Total Time: 55 minutes | Servings: 4 servings | Kcal: 290 kcal

#spaghettisquash #asparagus #ricotta #lemon #thyme #healthyrecipe #vegetarian #glutenfree #lowcarb #easyrecipe #seasonalcooking #springrecipe #vegetarianmeal #lightmeal #vegetariancooking #lemonflavor</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/902050565099950/permalink/1069721354999536/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crispy Potato &amp; Cheese Bombs with Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
- 4 tablespoons butter
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C) and grease a baking sheet.
2. Boil the diced potatoes until tender, then mash them in a bowl.
3. Stir in cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, and parsley. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Shape the mixture into small balls and place them on the baking sheet.
5. In a small saucepan, melt butter and sautÃ© garlic until fragrant.
6. Brush the potato balls with the garlic butter mixture.
7. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden and crispy.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/898738678610001/permalink/1244898300660702/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494900240_1196596208825622_7862262534270725496_n.jpg?stp=c0.88.526.526a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=105&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=tWoT9yfHWYkQ7kNvwHcT2TI&amp;_nc_oc=AdmEc1Rblmtn9QFqmYgyorKgzMr9TMJrX99hNQAMv8utNscLn8E3yOLS3t3qbbt-SR3S293DGd6J6YYtgkOScvuk&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=tFeA3TpvBXIF3GnzFtWTeA&amp;oh=00_AfNhtYSXd5-qCIyhOXyM4SAoXikDlMqMWVz9MwELbd89GQ&amp;oe=6846BBD3"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/898738678610001/permalink/1244898300660702/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Albondigas Soup Mexican Meatball Soup

Ingredients:

1 pound ground beef

1/2 cup uncooked white rice

1 egg

1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro

1/2 cup diced onions

2 cloves garlic, minced

1 teaspoon ground cumin

1 teaspoon paprika

1 teaspoon salt

1/2 teaspoon black pepper

8 cups beef broth

1 (14.5-ounce) can diced tomatoes

1 cup diced carrots

1 cup diced zucchini

1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro

Salt and pepper, to taste

You my also like:

Baked Leche Flan

CAJUN SHRIMP AND STEAK ALFREDO PASTA

rack Proof: New York Style Cheesecake

EAT VEGETABLE BEEF SOUP

PREPARATION:

In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, rice, egg, cilantro, onions, garlic, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Form the mixture into 1-inch meatballs.

In a large pot, bring the beef broth to a boil. Add the meatballs and reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes.

Add the tomatoes, carrots, and zucchini to the pot and continue to simmer for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the meatballs are cooked through.

Stir in the cilantro and season with salt and pepper to taste.

Serve hot. Enjoy!

Enjoy !</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1683255939111209/permalink/1903885193714948/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Tzatziki Chiken Salad ğŸ¤¤ğŸ§‘&zwj;ğŸ³

Ingredients
1 cup plus 2 Tbsp Plain Greek Yogurt
Â½ Cucumber â€“ grated
2 to 3, pressed Garlic Cloves
2 Tbsp Olive Oil
2 Tbsp Fresh Dill chopped
Salt and Pepper to taste
2 Cups chopped Cooked Chicken
2 Cups chopped Romaine Lettuce
1 Cup halved Grape Tomatoes
1/2 Cup sliced Pepperoncini Peppers
1/2 sliced Kalamata Olives
1/4 Cup chopped Red Onion
1/2 Cup crumbled Feta Cheese

Instructions
Prepare the Tzatziki: Mix Greek yogurt, cucumber, garlic, olive oil, and dill in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper to achieve a smooth, creamy consistency.
Assemble the Salad: Toss romaine lettuce, tomatoes, pepperoncini, olives, and red onion in a large salad bowl.
Add Chicken: Layer the chicken over the salad base.
Dress with Tzatziki: Dollop the tzatziki over the salad and chicken.
Garnish: Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese on top.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq GUACAMOLE
2 large hass avocados
1/2 red onion diced
1 jalapeÃ±os diced
2 limes-juice
1/4 cup fresh diced cilantro
1 garlic cloves minced
Salt and pepper to taste

MANGO SALSA
2 mango diced
2 jalapenos diced
1/3 red onion diced
1/4 cup cilantro chopped
2 limes- juiced
Salt and pepper to taste

SHRIMP CEVICHE
2 cups cooked shrimp
3 fresh lime juice
2 Roma tomatoes, diced
1 medium red onion, diced
2 medium jalapeno, diced
1/4 cup cilantro, chopped 
Salt and pepper to taste

PICO DE GALLO
4 tomatoes
2 jalapenos
1 lime
1/2 onion diced
1/4 cup cilantro
1 clove garlic
Salt and pepper

AVOCADO TOMATO SALAD
2 avocados diced
1 cup grape tomatoes sliced
1 cup cooked shrimp sliced
1/4 cups fresh cilantro
2 limes- juiced
1/2 red onion diced
1/4 teaspoon salt
Dash of ground black pepper</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494537135_122156121314441364_8349268608107666150_n.jpg?stp=c0.160.1280.1280a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=c4KR9qlCMkcQ7kNvwHf7EWP&amp;_nc_oc=Adk2awsNMyeLLWwC0RYUsaeCD-tlOEfWepGR_RG7c-pKBFp22z7ER_J_XoTvXiZggJjJM4gywyqILOVms8EvFg_o&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=tFeA3TpvBXIF3GnzFtWTeA&amp;oh=00_AfNLyN_7OWMOyaxCDUsIkkO1bcvYcRY45Co-5PlxgJ6h7Q&amp;oe=6846D4E6"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/Katierecipes/posts/pfbid0dVxSH9PGRpGA7vWTeevgku4nD8b6JMag7M6Yoez6R5Ssf8D3wKJnXcrugM3sjTQ1l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Spicy Cajun Chicken Linguine Pasta in Creamy Garlic Parmesan 

Ingredients:

For the Cajun Chicken:
    â€¢ 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 6 oz each)
    â€¢ 2 tbsp Cajun seasoning
    â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
    â€¢ 1 tbsp butter
    â€¢ 1/2 cup chicken broth
    â€¢ 1/4 cup heavy cream
    â€¢ 1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley (for garnish)

For the Creamy Parmesan Pasta Linguine:
    â€¢ 1 lb linguine pasta
    â€¢ 4 tbsp butter
    â€¢ 2 cloves garlic, minced
    â€¢ 1 cup heavy cream
    â€¢ 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese (plus more for serving)
    â€¢ 1/4 cup reserved pasta water
    â€¢ 1/4 tsp salt
    â€¢ 1/4 tsp black pepper
    â€¢ 1/4 cup chopped fresh basil (for garnish)

Instructions:

Step 1: Cook the Pasta
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add linguine and cook until al dente, following package directions. Reserve 1/4 cup of pasta water before draining. Drain and set pasta aside.
Step 2: Season the Chicken
While pasta cooks, pat the chicken breasts dry with paper towels. Rub both sides generously with Cajun seasoning, pressing lightly to help it stick.
Step 3: Cook the Chicken
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter with olive oil. Sear chicken breasts for 5â€“7 minutes per side, or until golden and cooked through (internal temp should reach 165Â°F). Remove from skillet and tent with foil to keep warm.
Step 4: Deglaze the Pan
Lower heat to medium. Pour in chicken broth and 1/4 cup heavy cream. Scrape up browned bits from the skillet. Simmer for 3â€“4 minutes to reduce and slightly thicken. Remove from heat.
Step 5: Prepare Parmesan Sauce
In a separate skillet or pot, melt 4 tbsp butter over medium heat. Add garlic and sautÃ© for 1 minute. Stir in 1 cup heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Lower the heat and add Parmesan cheese, stirring until melted and creamy. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 6: Combine Pasta and Sauce
Add drained linguine to the Parmesan sauce, tossing to coat well. If the sauce is too thick, add reserved pasta water a little at a time until the desired consistency is reached.
Step 7: Serve
Slice or serve whole Cajun chicken breasts over the creamy linguine. Drizzle with pan sauce from step 4. Garnish with fresh parsley and basil, and sprinkle extra Parmesan on top if desired.

Servings: 4
Prep Time: 15 minutes 
Cook Time: 25 minutes</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494196037_122149845344594328_9051875442765063369_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=BSVR7A35Fv4Q7kNvwHQNKqV&amp;_nc_oc=AdlTTozj8v-0INX-pyeOlW7alYrHDgtmEcWFrCUmWFFLAUtw6FEtppgA44L1xIvTmQDkS0UUxvnzXrwdcTyPIzjS&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=tFeA3TpvBXIF3GnzFtWTeA&amp;oh=00_AfMX-a-BzMgkcTlpUGaXLLc7k-So0PdnUZnchmENWvWGmA&amp;oe=6846D4EA"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid025ujkvzwHadNTgsLpW58Vy4zfAiLYpy6BBNpBwD31DaXt5aQMzJ3fbQCjcWjoHTWnl&amp;id=61567829847916" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Slow Cooker Korean Beef

Ingredients ğŸ›’

2 lbs beef chuck roast, cut into chunks
1/2 cup low-sodium soy sauce
1/4 cup brown sugar
1/4 cup beef broth
1 tbsp sesame oil
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tbsp ginger, grated
1 tbsp rice vinegar
1 tbsp gochujang (Korean chili paste) or sriracha
1 tsp black pepper
1/2 tsp red pepper flakes (optional)
1 red bell pepper, chopped
1 tbsp cornstarch + 2 tbsp water (for thickening)
For Garnish:
2 green onions, sliced
1 tbsp sesame seeds

Directions ğŸ³

Prepare the beef: Place beef chunks into the slow cooker.
Mix the sauce: In a bowl, whisk soy sauce, brown sugar, beef broth, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, rice vinegar, gochujang, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.
Cook low &amp; slow: Pour the sauce over the beef, cover, and cook on low for 7-8 hours or high for 4 hours until tender.
Thicken the sauce: In the last 30 minutes, mix cornstarch with water and stir into the slow cooker. Add chopped bell peppers.
Serve &amp; enjoy: Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. Serve over rice or noodles.
Prep Time: 10 minutes ğŸ•’
Cook Time: 7-8 hours (low) / 4 hours (high) â³
Total Time: ~8 hours ğŸ•’
Servings: 6 ğŸ½ï¸
Calories: ~320 kcal/serving ğŸ”¥</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Taco Potatoes ğŸŒ®ğŸ¥”
Ingredients:
1 pound lean ground beef ğŸ–
4 to 6 medium Russet potatoes ğŸ¥”
1 packet (1 ounce) taco seasoning ğŸŒ®
Â½ cup water ğŸ’§
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese ğŸ§€
Â½ cup sour cream ğŸ¶
Â¼ cup chopped green onions ğŸŒ¿
Â½ cup diced tomatoes ğŸ…
Instructions:
Prepare the Potatoes: Wash and scrub the potatoes, then pierce them with a fork. Bake at 400Â°F (200Â°C) for 45-50 minutes, or until fork-tender.
Cook the Beef: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned. Drain any excess grease.
Add Seasoning: Stir in the taco seasoning and Â½ cup of water. Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened.
Assemble: Slice open the baked potatoes and fluff the insides with a fork. Spoon the seasoned beef on top.
Top &amp; Serve: Sprinkle with cheese, sour cream, green onions, and diced tomatoes. Serve hot!
Enjoy these cheesy, loaded taco potatoes!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/492257312_122153822648429436_1363926608224492952_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=e81rX_eWhH0Q7kNvwHqrszs&amp;_nc_oc=Adkgzwc8oAD1s7KLKn19AfQYrp3fTEaXAHva72c2RwhOMpA6j65W7Rxy_xXsd1EeapHn5rcJ_z25QRopM6P0cORP&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=2jHDKGdFuOl4yHjAblB_CA&amp;oh=00_AfM4NEuf0ANo-KTD0sgsPva3VdZMe3Ms6GiTM76rojap5A&amp;oe=6846C7FB"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0HJTeNMyweVQHmG6v1mwb38xthww6QfJi3Rk5McT6MQV4YTrMwrtwWh2Zkj5Hy99gl&amp;id=61562883100833" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Baked Jamaican Pineapple Jerk Chicken

Ingredients:

2 lbs bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs or drumsticks

2 tablespoons olive oil

1 tablespoon brown sugar

1 tablespoon soy sauce

1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar

1 tablespoon lime juice

1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated

4 cloves garlic, minced

1 small onion, chopped

1 Scotch bonnet pepper, seeded and minced (or use habanero for milder heat)

1 teaspoon ground allspice

1 teaspoon dried thyme

1/2 teaspoon cinnamon

1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg

Salt and pepper to taste

1/2 cup fresh pineapple juice

1 cup pineapple chunks

Fresh thyme and lime wedges for garnish

Directions:

Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Grease a large baking dish or line with foil.

In a blender or food processor, combine olive oil, brown sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, lime juice, ginger, garlic, onion, Scotch bonnet, allspice, thyme, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, pepper, and pineapple juice. Blend into a smooth marinade.

Pour the marinade over the chicken in a large bowl or zip-top bag. Marinate for at least 1 hour (preferably overnight).

Place chicken in the baking dish, skin-side up. Pour any extra marinade on top. Scatter pineapple chunks around the chicken.

Bake for 40â€“45 minutes, basting once or twice, until the chicken is golden, caramelized, and cooked through (internal temp 165Â°F/75Â°C).

Garnish with fresh thyme and lime wedges. Serve hot with rice, plantains, or a fresh salad.

Prep Time: 20 minutes | Marinate Time: 1 hour (min) | Cooking Time: 45 minutes | Total Time: 2 hours 5 minutes

Kcal: 460 kcal per serving | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ‹ Lemon Ricotta Greek Chicken Alfredo with Garlic Potatoes blends the fresh brightness of lemon, creamy ricotta, and Parmesan garlic potatoes for a Mediterranean-inspired twist on a classic Alfredo dish. ğŸ§„âœ¨

â¸»

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2â€“3)

ğŸ— Lemon-Herb Chicken
 â€¢ 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, diced
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ Zest and juice of 1 lemon ğŸ‹
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸ§„ Lemon Ricotta Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ 2 tbsp butter
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ Â½ cup heavy cream
 â€¢ Â¼ cup ricotta cheese
 â€¢ Â¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese
 â€¢ Zest and juice of Â½ lemon ğŸ‹
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸ¥” Garlic-Parmesan Potatoes
 â€¢ 2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, diced
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ 2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸƒ Garnish
 â€¢ 1 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped
 â€¢ Additional grated Parmesan cheese
 â€¢ Lemon wedges for serving ğŸ‹

â¸»

ğŸ”¥ Instructions

1. Marinate &amp; Cook the Chicken
 â€¢ In a bowl, combine olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Toss chicken pieces in the marinade and let sit for at least 15 minutes.
 â€¢ Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and cook chicken until golden and fully cooked, about 3â€“4 minutes per side.
 â€¢ Set aside and keep warm.

â¸»

2. Make the Lemon Ricotta Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ In the same skillet (or a saucepan), melt butter over medium heat.
 â€¢ Add garlic and sautÃ© until fragrant.
 â€¢ Stir in heavy cream, ricotta, Parmesan, lemon zest, and lemon juice.
 â€¢ Cook until the sauce is smooth and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes.
 â€¢ Season with salt and pepper to taste.
 â€¢ Keep warm.

â¸»

3. Roast the Potatoes
 â€¢ Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
 â€¢ Toss diced potatoes with olive oil, garlic, oregano, Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20â€“25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden and crispy.

â¸»

4. Assemble the Plate
 â€¢ Serve the lemon ricotta Alfredo sauce over the chicken.
 â€¢ Add garlic-Parmesan potatoes on the side.
 â€¢ Garnish with fresh parsley, additional Parmesan cheese, and a wedge of lemon for a bright, creamy finish.
 â€¢ Serve immediately.

â¸»

âœ¨ A creamy, vibrant dish thatâ€™s perfect for any occasion.

Juicy garlic herb chicken, creamy lemon Alfredo pasta, and crispy rosemary potatoes are finished with a sweet and tangy roasted tomato pesto drizzle. ğŸŒ¿ğŸ§„âœ¨

â¸»

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2â€“3)

ğŸ— Garlic Herb Chicken
 â€¢ 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ Zest and juice of Â½ lemon ğŸ‹
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸ‹ Creamy Lemon Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ 2 tbsp butter
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ Â½ cup heavy cream
 â€¢ Â¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese
 â€¢ Zest and juice of Â½ lemon ğŸ‹
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste
 â€¢ 6 oz pasta of choice (fettuccine, penne, or linguine)

â¸»

ğŸ¥” Garlic Rosemary Roasted Potatoes
 â€¢ 2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, diced
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried rosemary
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste
 â€¢ Optional: 2 tbsp grated Parmesan for extra flavor

â¸»

ğŸ… Creamy Roasted Tomato Pesto Drizzle
 â€¢ 2 tbsp roasted tomato pesto (store-bought or homemade)
 â€¢ 1 tbsp plain Greek yogurt or cream
 â€¢ Splash of water to thin, if needed

â¸»

ğŸƒ Garnish
 â€¢ Fresh basil or parsley
 â€¢ Extra Parmesan
 â€¢ Lemon wedges ğŸ‹

â¸»

ğŸ”¥ Instructions

1. Marinate &amp; Cook the Chicken
 â€¢ Mix olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
 â€¢ Toss in the chicken slices and marinate for 15â€“20 minutes.
 â€¢ Grill or pan-sear over medium-high heat for 4â€“5 minutes per side until cooked through. Set aside.

â¸»

2. Make the Lemon Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ Cook pasta according to package directions.
 â€¢ In a skillet, melt butter and sautÃ© garlic until fragrant.
 â€¢ Stir in cream, lemon zest, lemon juice, and Parmesan.
 â€¢ Simmer for 4â€“5 minutes until thickened.
 â€¢ Toss in the drained pasta and coat evenly.

â¸»

3. Roast the Potatoes
 â€¢ Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
 â€¢ Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25â€“30 minutes, flipping halfway through.
 â€¢ Add Parmesan in the last 5 minutes if desired.

â¸»

4. Make the Roasted Tomato Pesto Drizzle
 â€¢ Whisk together roasted tomato pesto and Greek yogurt/cream until smooth.
 â€¢ Thin with a splash of water if needed for drizzling consistency. Set aside.

â¸»

5. Assemble the Plate
 â€¢ Serve a bed of creamy lemon Alfredo pasta topped with garlic herb chicken.
 â€¢ Add garlic rosemary roasted potatoes on the side.
 â€¢ Drizzle with the creamy roasted tomato pesto sauce.
 â€¢ Garnish with fresh herbs, lemon wedges, and a sprinkle of Parmesan.

â¸»

âœ¨ This dish delivers comfort and Mediterranean sunshine in every biteâ€”rich, creamy, and perfectly balanced.

target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ¥¥ Coconut Lemon Herb Chicken Alfredo brings a bright tropical flavor to a creamy classic. Juicy chicken bathed in a velvety coconut-lemon Alfredo sauce, served over your choice of pasta or roasted garlic potatoes, and topped with fresh cilantro and lime zest for a dish that feels both indulgent and refreshing. ğŸ§„âœ¨

â¸»

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2â€“3)

ğŸ— Coconut Lemon Herb Chicken
 â€¢ 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
 â€¢ Zest and juice of 1 lime ğŸ‹
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸ¥¥ Coconut Lemon Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ 2 tbsp butter
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ Â½ cup full-fat coconut milk
 â€¢ Â½ cup heavy cream
 â€¢ Â¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese
 â€¢ Zest of Â½ lime ğŸ‹
 â€¢ 1 tsp chopped fresh cilantro (optional)
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸ¥” Garlic-Roasted Potatoes (or Pasta Option)
 â€¢ 2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, diced (or 8 oz pasta, cooked al dente)
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
 â€¢ 2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸƒ Garnish
 â€¢ 1 tbsp fresh cilantro, chopped
 â€¢ Additional lime zest
 â€¢ Lime wedges for serving ğŸ‹

â¸»

ğŸ”¥ Instructions

1. Cook the Chicken
 â€¢ In a bowl, mix olive oil, lime zest, lime juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Toss chicken pieces in the mixture and let sit for at least 15 minutes.
 â€¢ Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook chicken until golden and fully cooked, about 3â€“4 minutes per side.
 â€¢ Keep warm.

â¸»

2. Make the Coconut Lemon Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ In the same skillet (or a saucepan), melt butter over medium heat.
 â€¢ Add garlic and sautÃ© until fragrant.
 â€¢ Stir in coconut milk, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and lime zest.
 â€¢ Cook until the sauce is smooth and slightly thickened, about 5â€“7 minutes.
 â€¢ Season with salt and pepper to taste.
 â€¢ Stir in fresh cilantro, if using.
 â€¢ Keep warm.

â¸»

3. Prepare the Potatoes (or Pasta)
 â€¢ If using potatoes, preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
 â€¢ Toss diced potatoes with olive oil, garlic, oregano, Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20â€“25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden and crispy.
 â€¢ If using pasta, simply toss cooked pasta in the coconut Alfredo sauce before serving.

â¸»

4. Assemble the Plate
 â€¢ Serve the coconut lemon Alfredo sauce over the roasted garlic potatoes or pasta.
 â€¢ Top with the cooked chicken.
 â€¢ Garnish with fresh cilantro, additional lime zest, and a wedge of lime for brightness.
 â€¢ Serve immediately.

â¸»

âœ¨ A creamy, tropical dish perfect for a bright, refreshing meal.

class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ‹ Creamy Lemon Artichoke Greek Chicken Alfredo is Mediterranean-inspired indulgence on a plate! Juicy lemon-herb grilled chicken pairs with a rich Alfredo sauce tossed with marinated artichokes and garlic, crispy garlic-Parmesan potatoes on the side, and a final drizzle of creamy lemon-artichoke pesto to brighten every bite. ğŸŒ¿ğŸ§„âœ¨

â¸»

ğŸ§¾ Ingredients (Serves 2â€“3)

ğŸ— Lemon-Herb Grilled Chicken
 â€¢ 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ Zest and juice of 1 lemon ğŸ‹
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced ğŸ§„
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

â¸»

ğŸ‹ Creamy Artichoke Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ 1 tbsp butter
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced
 â€¢ Â½ cup heavy cream
 â€¢ Â¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese ğŸ§€
 â€¢ Â½ cup marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
 â€¢ Zest of Â½ lemon
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste
 â€¢ 6 oz pasta (penne, fettuccine, or linguine)

â¸»

ğŸ¥” Garlic Parmesan Roasted Potatoes
 â€¢ 2 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, diced
 â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
 â€¢ 1 clove garlic, minced
 â€¢ 1 tsp dried rosemary
 â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste
 â€¢ 2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese

â¸»

ğŸŒ¿ Creamy Lemon-Artichoke Pesto Drizzle
 â€¢ 2 tbsp artichoke pesto (or blended marinated artichokes with basil and olive oil)
 â€¢ 1 tbsp plain Greek yogurt or cream
 â€¢ Â½ tsp lemon juice
 â€¢ Pinch of salt

â¸»

ğŸƒ Garnish
 â€¢ Fresh parsley or basil
 â€¢ Extra Parmesan
 â€¢ Lemon wedges

â¸»

ğŸ”¥ Instructions

1. Roast the Potatoes
 â€¢ Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
 â€¢ Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Roast for 25â€“30 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden and crispy.
 â€¢ Sprinkle Parmesan over potatoes during the last 5 minutes of roasting.

â¸»

2. Grill the Chicken
 â€¢ Toss chicken slices with olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
 â€¢ Grill or sear over medium-high heat until golden and cooked through, about 4â€“5 minutes per side. Set aside.

â¸»

3. Make the Artichoke Alfredo Sauce
 â€¢ Cook pasta according to package instructions.
 â€¢ In a skillet, melt butter and sautÃ© garlic until fragrant.
 â€¢ Stir in cream, Parmesan, lemon zest, and chopped artichokes.
 â€¢ Simmer for 4â€“5 minutes until thickened.
 â€¢ Season with salt and pepper.
 â€¢ Toss cooked pasta in the sauce.

â¸»

4. Prepare the Lemon-Artichoke Pesto Drizzle
 â€¢ Whisk together artichoke pesto, Greek yogurt (or cream), lemon juice, and a pinch of salt.
 â€¢ Thin with a little water if needed for drizzling consistency.

â¸»

5. Assemble the Plate
 â€¢ Place a generous scoop of creamy artichoke Alfredo pasta on the plate.
 â€¢ Top with lemon-herb grilled chicken slices.
 â€¢ Add crispy Parmesan potatoes on the side.
 â€¢ Drizzle everything with the lemon-artichoke pesto for a pop of fresh, tangy flavor.

â¸»

âœ¨ Creamy, zesty, herby, and luxuriousâ€”this bowl brings fresh Greek vibes to cozy Alfredo comfort!

Ingredients:

2 salmon fillets

1 bunch of asparagus, trimmed

2 tablespoons olive oil

3 tablespoons unsalted butter

4 garlic cloves, minced

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02SHwKnswdBWDpB7bJGQ6aqg9skrQR9VzsiniSxprDK85EdGYapv9dtQX4FMTBcUrQl&amp;id=100086213482065" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">GRILLED SALMON WITH MANGO SALSA AND RICEâ€¼ï¸

â—For the Salmon:

4 salmon fillets
1 tbsp lemon juice
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp chili powder (optional)
Salt and pepper, to taste
1 tbsp olive oil

For the Mango Salsa:
1 ripe mango, diced
1/2 cup diced tomatoes
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped
1 avocado, diced
2 tbsp fresh cilantro, chopped
Juice of 1 lime
Salt and pepper, to taste

For the Rice:
2 cups cooked white or jasmine rice
1 tbsp fresh cilantro, chopped (for garnish)

â—Instructions:

Prepare the Salsa:
In a medium bowl, combine diced mango, tomatoes, red onion, avocado, and cilantro.
Squeeze lime juice over the salsa, season with salt and pepper, and gently toss. Set aside.

Marinate the Salmon:
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Brush the mixture over the salmon fillets and let them marinate for 15-20 minutes.

Grill the Salmon:
Preheat the grill or a grill pan over medium heat.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.

Assemble the Dish:
Serve the grilled salmon over a bed of cooked rice.
Top with the prepared mango salsa and garnish with avocado slices and cilantro.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Steak, Avocado &amp; Roasted Corn Bowl with Cilantro Cream Sauce

Ingredients
For the steak:

1 lb boneless steak, cut into bite-sized pieces

1 tbsp olive oil

1 tsp garlic powder

Â½ tsp onion powder

Â¼ tsp salt

â…› tsp black pepper

For the bowl:

1 cup cooked rice (any kind you love)

1 ear corn, kernels removed

1 avocado, sliced

Â¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro

For the cilantro cream sauce:

Â½ cup mayonnaise

Â¼ cup chopped cilantro

1 garlic clove, minced

1 tbsp fresh lime juice

Â¼ tsp salt

â…› tsp black pepper

Letâ€™s make it step by step:
Step 1: Cook the Steak
Start by preheating your grill (or a grill pan) to medium-high.
In a bowl, toss your steak pieces with olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Thatâ€™s it.
Grill the steak for 2â€“3 minutes per side until beautifully seared and cooked through.
Donâ€™t overthink it â€” it cooks fast!

Step 2: Roast the Corn
Preheat your oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Toss the corn kernels with a little olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread them on a baking sheet and roast for 10â€“15 minutes until slightly charred.
The roasted flavor is everything here.

Step 3: Make the Cilantro Cream Sauce
In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, chopped cilantro, garlic, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
This sauce is creamy, herby, and just a little tangy. It brings the whole dish together.

Step 4: Assemble the Bowls
Now for the fun part.
Spoon warm rice into bowls. Add grilled steak, roasted corn, and slices of creamy avocado.
Sprinkle with fresh cilantro. Drizzle generously with that gorgeous cilantro cream sauce.
And if you're like me, go back and drizzle a little more â€” it's too good.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=668387909338747&amp;set=a.234796079364601" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Baked Cod with Lemon and Garlic

Ingredients:
4 (6 oz) cod fillets
2 tbsp olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 lemon, zested and juiced
1/2 tsp salt
1/4 tsp black pepper
1/4 tsp paprika (optional, for a bit of color and flavor)
2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)
Lemon slices, for serving

Instructions:
Preheat the Oven:
Preheat your oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Lightly grease a baking dish or line it with parchment paper.
Prepare the Marinade:
In a small bowl, combine olive oil, minced garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and paprika. Mix until well combined.
Season the Cod:
Place the cod fillets in the baking dish. Spoon the lemon garlic mixture evenly over each piece, making sure to coat the tops of the fillets.
Bake the Cod:
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Cooking time may vary depending on the thickness of the fillets.
Garnish and Serve:
Remove from the oven, garnish with fresh parsley and lemon slices. Serve immediately with your favorite sides.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/5692834530750799/permalink/9989105191123690/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/491815766_122135187848628080_405963838721450429_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=nDR9ZGpcWDYQ7kNvwHKQKX9&amp;_nc_oc=AdmTXyvnZSr10lJFHIVlBU7ywVyonw5tai2YunCx6WIQ7Vus4LPyKLA-vDGi2prKRYb5dOl4nukAmTPSLRL0NqtC&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0nmuNIAyVLHgBhte1VLctQ&amp;oh=00_AfPg2Q2vcwjTmV6vJKK9PpT1WVCGzJW_Oy6EDDE4aqwx1w&amp;oe=6846D364"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/5692834530750799/permalink/9989105191123690/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Loaded Potato &amp; Meatloaf Casserole

Ingredients:

For the Meatloaf Base:

- 1.5 pounds ground beef
- 1 small onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/2 cup breadcrumbs
- 1/4 cup milk
- 1 large egg
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper

For the Potato Topping:

- 4 large russet potatoes, peeled and cubed
- 1/2 cup milk
- 1/4 cup unsalted butter
- 1/2 cup sour cream
- 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste

For the Garnish:

- 4 slices beef bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 2 green onions, thinly sliced

Directions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, chopped onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, milk, egg, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Mix until just combined; avoid overmixing to keep the meatloaf tender.

3. Press the meat mixture evenly into the prepared baking dish to form a flat layer.

4. Bake the meatloaf base in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove from the oven and carefully drain any excess grease.

5. While the meatloaf is baking, prepare the mashed potatoes. Place the cubed potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium and cook until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes.

6. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot. Add milk, butter, sour cream, salt, and pepper. Mash until smooth and creamy.

7. Spread the mashed potatoes evenly over the baked meatloaf layer. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese on top.

8. Return the casserole to the oven and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

9. Remove from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes. Sprinkle the crumbled beef bacon and sliced green onions over the top before serving.

Prep Time: 20 minutes | Cooking Time: 40 minutes | Total Time: 1 hour

Kcal: 520 kcal | Servings: 6 servings

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0N5CSxgqkJJZQHMvBfTqA8fKH1682JBxtGpazFnynqTS6thJv6AYjLrYxY3dQRfsfl&amp;id=61557696719506" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Garlic Butter Mushroom Stuffed Chicken with Creamy Parmesan Sauce

A rich and flavorful chicken dish packed with garlicky mushrooms, gooey cheese, and an optional creamy Parmesan sauce. A dream meal for garlic mushroom lovers!

Ingredients
For the Mushrooms:
8 tbsp butter
8 oz brown mushrooms, sliced
4 cloves garlic, minced
2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped
Salt and pepper, to taste
For the Chicken:
4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts
Salt and pepper, to taste
1 tsp onion powder
1 tsp dried parsley
8 slices mozzarella cheese
Â¼ cup fresh Parmesan cheese, grated
For the Creamy Garlic Parmesan Sauce (Optional):
1 tbsp olive oil
2 large garlic cloves, minced
1 tbsp Dijon mustard
1Â½ cup alf-and-half (or substitute with Â¾ cup whole milk + Â¾ cup reduced-fat cream)
Â½ cup Parmesan cheese, finely grated
Salt and pepper, to taste
Â½ tsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tsp water (optional, for thickening)
2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped

Instructions
1. Prepare the Mushrooms:
Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Heat butter in a large oven-safe skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and sautÃ© for about 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in mushrooms, salt, pepper, and parsley. Cook until mushrooms soften.
Set aside to cool while you prepare the chicken.
Prepare the Chicken:
Pat chicken breasts dry with a paper towel.
Season with salt, pepper, onion powder, and dried parsley, rubbing to coat evenly.
Slice a pocket into the thickest part of each chicken breast.
Stuff each pocket with 2 slices of mozzarella and a portion of the mushroom mixture.
Sprinkle 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese on top of the mushrooms in each breast.
Secure the opening with 2â€“3 toothpicks to keep the filling in place.
 Cook the Chicken:
In the same skillet with leftover garlic butter, heat over medium-high heat.
Sear the stuffed chicken on both sides until golden brown.
Cover the skillet and transfer it to the preheated oven.
Bake for 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through (internal temp: 165Â°F/75Â°C).
Remove from the oven and let rest while you prepare the sauce (if making).
4. Make the Cream Sauce (Optional):
In the same skillet, heat olive oil over low heat.
Add garlic and sautÃ© for 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in Dijon mustard and half-and-half (or cream substitute).
Bring to a gentle simmer, then add any remaining mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
Let the sauce cook until the Parmesan melts slightly.
(Optional) For a thicker sauce, add the cornstarch mixture and stir quickly to combine.
Season with salt and pepper, then stir in fresh parsley.
Return the chicken to the pan and coat with the sauce before serving.
5. Serve &amp; Enjoy:
Half-and-half substitute: If you donâ€™t have half-and-half, use Â¾ cup whole milk + Â¾ cup reduced-fat cream.
Make it low-carb: Serve with zucchini noodles, cauliflower rice, or a simple green salad.
Notes
Half-and-half substitute: If you donâ€™t have half-and-half, use Â¾ cup whole milk + Â¾ cup reduced-fat cream.
Make it low-carb: Serve with zucchini noodles, cauliflower rice, or a simple green salad</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w
