class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02jXKTqVXEgz8gVgAqpianWxu8PFSfdy1iHa9N4hsrXeoFfkVb9GzTN6Epb5inXwSMl&amp;id=61571173409189" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Savory Cajun Chicken over Creamy Parmesan Linguine
Ingredients:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips

12 oz linguine pasta

2 tablespoons olive oil

2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning

1 teaspoon smoked paprika

Â½ teaspoon garlic powder

4 cloves garlic, minced

1 cup heavy cream

Â½ cup chicken broth

Â½ cup grated Parmesan cheese

Salt and pepper, to taste

Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Instructions:
1. Season the Chicken:
In a small bowl, combine the Cajun seasoning, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Toss the chicken strips in the spice blend until well coated.

2. Cook the Chicken:
Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the seasoned chicken and cook for 6â€“7 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown and fully cooked.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set it aside.

3. Cook the Pasta:
While the chicken is cooking, boil the linguine in a large pot of salted water according to package directions.
Drain the pasta, reserving a little of the pasta water just in case the sauce needs thinning.

4. Make the Sauce:
In the same skillet used for the chicken, add a bit more olive oil if needed.
SautÃ© the minced garlic over medium heat for about 1 minute, just until fragrant.
Pour in the chicken broth, scraping up any browned bits from the pan.
Stir in the heavy cream and bring it to a gentle simmer. Let it cook for 2â€“3 minutes until slightly thickened.

5. Combine Everything:
Add the drained linguine to the skillet and toss to coat it in the creamy sauce.
Stir in the Parmesan cheese until fully melted and the sauce is rich and smooth.
Return the cooked chicken to the pan and toss everything together.

6. Garnish and Serve:
Top with freshly chopped parsley and serve hot!

Recipe Notes:
Prep Time: 10 minutes

Cook Time: 20 minutes

Total Time: 30 minutes

Servings: 4</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">This Grilled Chicken &amp; Avocado Rice Bowl is not only a feast for the eyes but also for the taste buds! Perfect for a weeknight dinner! ğŸšğŸ˜

- Grilled Chicken &amp; Avocado Rice Bowl

Ingredients:
- 2 chicken breasts
- 1 cup jasmine rice
- 2 cups water or chicken broth
- 1 ripe avocado, sliced
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1 cup corn (fresh or canned)
- 1/4 cup red onion, diced
- 1 lime, juiced
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh cilantro, for garnish

Directions:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a medium saucepan, combine the jasmine rice and water or chicken broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
3. While the rice is cooking, season the chicken breasts with olive oil, cumin, salt, and pepper. Grill the chicken for about 6-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove from the grill and let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, cherry tomatoes, corn, red onion, and lime juice. Stir gently to mix.
5. To assemble, divide the rice mixture among bowls, top with sliced grilled chicken and avocado, and garnish with fresh cilantro.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes  
Kcal: 540 kcal | Servings: 2 servings

src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/491951697_122152511756429436_5297279531561888406_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=109&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=XhtyjUnzmE4Q7kNvwEbKoPp&amp;_nc_oc=Adl5MdMrtkFg4FjYTaN4sh85BECQXm9mt08Tyhbk86NbfUvUq8FbJ0FJEGOGJwUhtz3s-A9jFLrKzeL2BG5Y0cIK&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0nmuNIAyVLHgBhte1VLctQ&amp;oh=00_AfNVH7Zeuf_0dT0y-_-lILqMvNFRluP_YDODeSgeHSIacg&amp;oe=6846D0E4"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02yc6qqFBfy5mEg5qSDb6Mv6WANvGxLvr7SR4ymRdYV44CohbU5NEYCKs9yZwL65ULl&amp;id=61562883100833" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Peruvian Chicken &amp; Rice with Green Sauce 

Ingredients:

1 tablespoon olive oil

4 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs

Salt and pepper, to taste

1 small onion, chopped

3 cloves garlic, minced

1 cup cilantro leaves (packed)

1 jalapeÃ±o, seeded and chopped

1/2 teaspoon ground cumin

1 1/2 cups chicken broth

1 cup long grain rice

1/2 cup green peas (fresh or frozen)

1/2 cup diced carrots

Juice of 1 lime

Fresh cilantro, for garnish

Directions:

Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper. Heat olive oil in a large skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.

Sear the chicken thighs skin-side down until golden brown, about 4-5 minutes per side. Remove and set aside.

In a blender or food processor, blend cilantro, jalapeÃ±o, garlic, and 1/2 cup chicken broth until smooth.

In the same pan, sautÃ© onion for 2-3 minutes. Add cumin and stir to combine.

Pour in the cilantro mixture and cook for 2 minutes until fragrant.

Add rice, remaining chicken broth, peas, and carrots. Stir well, then nestle the seared chicken back into the pot.

Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 25-30 minutes until rice is tender and chicken is cooked through.

Remove from heat, squeeze lime juice over the top, and garnish with fresh cilantro.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes
Kcal: 495 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Keto Air Fryer Tuna Bites ğŸŸ  
Flaky, crispy, and zesty bites that are simply irresistible!  
INGREDIENTS:  
ğŸŸ 15 ounces Canned Tuna (drained well)  
ğŸ§€ 2 cups Shredded Cheddar Cheese  
ğŸ§„ 1/2 tsp Garlic Powder  
ğŸ§… 1/2 tsp Onion Powder  
ğŸ¥š 2 large Eggs  
ğŸ§‚ Salt and Pepper to taste  

INSTRUCTIONS:  
Place the tuna, cheese, onion powder, garlic powder, eggs, and salt and pepper to taste into a mixing bowl, and blend to combine well.  
Form the mixture into small patties, and place into the air fryer.  
Cook at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes, flipping halfway through the cook time.  

PREP TIME &amp; NUTRITION:  
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 10 minutes, Total Time: 20 minutes, Servings: 4 servings, Calories: 195 kcal, Net Carbs: 3, Fats: , Protein:

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/DailyRecipeHaven/posts/pfbid02hCfQqbw81gNzfMQRuYTn3GZ5k5dQ3gWdqh4iUP1xvmfWmib4MMXg7TXBkzN93YZGl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Cauliflower Fried Rice ğŸš  
A delightful mix of fresh veggies and savory flavors awaits!  
INGREDIENTS :  
ğŸ¥¦ 1 (10-15oz) bag frozen cauliflower rice  
ğŸ¥„ 2 tbsp olive oil  
ğŸ§… 1/2 yellow or white onion (diced)  
ğŸ¥• 2 medium carrots (diced)  
ğŸ§„ 1 tbsp minced garlic  
ğŸŒ± 1/2 cup frozen peas  
ğŸ¥š 2 eggs  
ğŸ¥¢ 1 tsp toasted sesame oil  
ğŸœ 2 tbsp soy sauce  
ğŸŒ¾ toasted sesame seeds for garnish (optional)  
INSTRUCTIONS :  
Cook the frozen cauliflower rice according to the package directions; open the bag and set it aside to allow the steam to dissipate.  
In a large pan or wok, heat the olive oil over medium/high heat. Add the diced onions and carrots and cook until tender (about 5 minutes).  
When your onions and carrots are close to being done, add the minced garlic and allow it to cook for about 1 minute. Stir in the frozen peas and pre-cooked cauliflower rice and cook for an additional few minutes or until the peas are warmed through.  
Make a hole in the middle of your mixture so that you can see the bottom of the pan. Crack your eggs and cook them until scrambled, then stir to combine with everything else.  
Stir in the sesame oil and soy sauce. I think about 2 tbsps is perfect, but start with less and do a taste test if you're salt sensitive.  
Serve warm with toasted sesame seeds and store any leftovers in the fridge for up to 4 days.  
PREP TIME &amp; NUTRITION :  
Prep Time : 10 mins, Cook Time : 15 mins, Total Time : 25 mins, Servings : 4, Calories : 180, Net Carbs : 8g, Fats : 10g, Protein : 8g

class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/beautifulsoulsofficiel/posts/pfbid0N5xne78AoC9uZmCZqu7fibwM2mrs5qhyMF7fMyYm1w9ZEUVEmpXQX4BH48MepW4vl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Hawaiian Chicken Sheet Pan
Ingredients
1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 large red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 large yellow or orange bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 red onion, cut into wedges
1 (20 oz) can pineapple chunks, drained (reserve juice)
1/4 cup soy sauce
3 tablespoons brown sugar
2 tablespoons pineapple juice (from the can)
1 tablespoon cornstarch
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1/2 teaspoon ginger
1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)
1 tablespoon olive oil
Instructions
Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Prepare the chicken and vegetables: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, bell peppers, onion, and pineapple chunks.
Make the sauce: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, brown sugar, pineapple juice, cornstarch, garlic powder, ginger, and red pepper flakes (if using).
Combine chicken and sauce: Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetable mixture and toss to coat evenly.
Spread on sheet pan: Spread the mixture in a single layer on a large rimmed baking sheet.
Bake: Roast in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid01QBSaqFDZupNJhRPWUg1kL1om4oApwsU6wUHrrCkzr642ZGvjMAsepftXg8X6SFPl&amp;id=61571173409189" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ¥’ğŸ„ Spanish Mushroom &amp; Ricotta Stuffed Zucchini Boats ğŸ„ğŸ¥’

Ingredients:

4 medium zucchini

1 tablespoon olive oil

1 small onion, finely chopped

2 cloves garlic, minced

8 oz mushrooms (cremini or white), finely chopped

1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika

1/4 teaspoon ground cumin

1/4 teaspoon chili flakes (optional, for a kick)

Salt and black pepper to taste

1 cup ricotta cheese

1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (plus more for topping)

2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley or cilantro

Juice of 1/2 lemon

Directions:

Prep the Zucchini:
Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Slice the zucchini in half lengthwise and use a spoon to gently scoop out the center flesh, leaving a 1/4-inch border to create â€œboats.â€ Chop up the scooped-out flesh and set it aside.

SautÃ© the Filling:
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and sautÃ© for 2â€“3 minutes until softened. Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds more. Stir in mushrooms and the chopped zucchini flesh. Cook until the moisture evaporates and the mixture is golden, about 6â€“8 minutes.

Season &amp; Mix:
Add smoked paprika, cumin, chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Stir well. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Then mix in ricotta, Parmesan, lemon juice, and chopped herbs.

Stuff the Boats:
Place the zucchini boats in a greased baking dish. Spoon the mushroom and ricotta filling evenly into each boat. Sprinkle a bit of Parmesan on top for extra flavor and browning.

Bake:
Bake uncovered for 25â€“30 minutes, or until the zucchini is tender and the tops are golden brown. For a crispier top, broil for the last 2â€“3 minutes.

Serve:
Garnish with more herbs and a squeeze of lemon if desired. Serve warm as a main dish or alongside grilled chicken or fish.

Nutritional Information:

â° Prep Time: 20 minutes | ğŸ”¥ Cooking Time: 30 minutes | â³ Total Time: 50 minutes
âš¡ Calories per serving: Approx. 200 | ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/491774742_122236355762209775_1160169877464897619_n.jpg?stp=c0.203.1620.1620a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=ppGxi5ga-TkQ7kNvwEEzS-P&amp;_nc_oc=Adk7zQbDiFSIJl89AYQZcWNO3QmXIsZ0JetpHaUtHfv741QJg-gUvPGINg2262kfKmD140TzOPG9TfEF-zkDkUuO&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=0nmuNIAyVLHgBhte1VLctQ&amp;oh=00_AfOdNytU7auDcUPCk-q5xGzkoW0Ugue3usjvikRgEO_N3g&amp;oe=6846C2A9"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/DailyRecipeHaven/posts/pfbid02999Dpn4YfQaTfMvbPEVcFpVoNpVVRrfLSbygQfW29vcdXmqo7TmM5gdkgfxVnBaal" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Keto Sausage Lasagna Roll Ups ğŸ½ï¸  
Savory sausage and creamy cheeses create a delightful, satisfying meal.  
INGREDIENTS:  
ğŸ– 1 pound Natural ground Italian sausage  
ğŸ§€ 2 cups Shredded mozzarella cheese  
ğŸ¥„ 1/3 cup Ricotta Cheese  
ğŸ§… 1/4 Onion chopped  
ğŸ¥› 2 ounces Cream Cheese softened  
ğŸ§‚ 3 tbsp Parmesan Cheese grated  

INSTRUCTIONS:  
Heat the oven to 400 degrees.  

Add the ground sausage and onions to a skillet over medium high heat. Saute until the meat is browned and onions have softened. Drain the excess grease.  

Remove from the heat, and stir in the cream cheese until melted.  

Mix in the ricotta and parmesan cheese, and set aside to cool.  

Form the mozzarella cheese into 8 evenly sized circles on a parchment lined baking sheet.  

Bake for 6-8 minutes, or until the edges are beginning to brown and turn crispy.  

Remove the cheese from the oven, and let cool for a minute.  

Place a layer of the filling down the center of each cheese circle.  

Carefully fold the cheese circles up and over the filling.  

Allow the rollups to cool and crisp up before serving.  

PREP TIME &amp; NUTRITION:  
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 10 minutes, Total Time: 20 minutes, Servings: 8 servings, Calories: 185 kcal, Net Carbs: 3 Net Carbs, Fats: , Protein:

class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/mayraketo.low.carb.love/posts/pfbid0LuAGufHFmJ51YzMybQGekTiCvsWQtzyP2xMkCg57fm3fjuVztzSEqGovdCCy7BFtl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Keto Fried Chicken Tenders
Crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, these keto-friendly fried chicken tenders are perfect for low-carb lovers and fried chicken fans alike. Packed with flavor and gluten-free, they're great for the whole familyâ€”even the picky eaters!

Time &amp; Serving:
Prep: 45 min
Cook: 6 min
Bake (optional): 20 min
Total: 1 hr 11 min
Servings: 5 (3 tenders per serving)

---

Ingredients

Chicken:

1 lb chicken tenderloins (flattened and sliced)

Avocado or refined coconut oil (for frying)

Marinade:

1 cup heavy whipping cream

2 tsp Tabasco (optional)

1 tbsp apple cider vinegar

1/4 tsp ground black pepper

1 tsp sea salt

Keto Breading:

1/2 cup almond flour (sifted)

1/4 cup coconut flour

1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (from container)

1 tsp paprika

1/2 tsp garlic powder

1/2 tsp onion powder

1/4 tsp ground black pepper

1 tsp salt

1/4 tsp cayenne pepper (or to taste)

2 large eggs (lightly beaten)

---

Instructions

1. Prep Chicken: Rinse and pat dry tenderloins. Flatten with a meat mallet between cling wrap. Cut into tenders.

2. Marinate: Mix marinade ingredients in a bowl, add chicken, and refrigerate for 30 minutes to overnight.

3. Breading Station: Set two bowlsâ€”one with all dry breading ingredients, another with beaten eggs.

4. Coat Chicken: Dip each tender in egg wash, then breading. Repeat for a double coating. Shake off excess.

5. Fry: Heat oil over medium-high heat. Fry tenders in batches until golden brown on both sides.

6. Optional Baking: Bake in a preheated 375Â°F oven for 20â€“25 minutes on a parchment-lined sheet. Drizzle with melted butter.

7. Optional Air Frying: Set air fryer to 375Â°F. Cook tenders for 15 minutes. Add melted butter to the bottom to prevent sticking.

---

Nutrition (Per Serving - 3 Tenders):
Calories: 495
Fat: 30.3g
Saturated Fat: 14.6g
Cholesterol: 201mg
Sodium: 735mg
Carbs: 9g
Net Carbs: 4.5g
Fiber: 4.5g
Sugar: 0.2g
Protein: 42.3g

---

class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/2337655909846972/permalink/4043905345888678/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/490968611_10236607182427316_4373243776349396586_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=106&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=NUCYKuaD8mYQ7kNvwGifYjq&amp;_nc_oc=Adkr9Da8_IEhio9c_aryXj34hdRZE7HmTV_XvFyQ9hKrsLLWqcHC2ggdkcwXew_EhXsucaYKct2W1wn8iLwgQeSs&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=aNfkWUBR1Z2VD168CgnFng&amp;oh=00_AfMdcIXKSvWpOhyqwR7kaRYayFejrmiyqgaO7gICnQLA2g&amp;oe=6846C2E9"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/2337655909846972/permalink/4043905345888678/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Southwest Grilled Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
For the chicken:

2 chicken breasts (about 250â€“300 grams each, total 500â€“600 grams)

15 ml olive oil (1 tbsp)

2 g ground cumin (1 tsp)

2 g chili powder (1 tsp)

1 g garlic powder (1/2 tsp)

1 g paprika (1/2 tsp)

Salt and pepper to taste

1 lime (juice, about 30 ml)

For the salad:

120 g mixed greens (romaine, spinach, or arugula)

150 g cherry tomatoes (halved)

60 g red onion (thinly sliced)

75 g corn (fresh or frozen)

80 g black beans (drained and rinsed)

40 g red bell pepper (diced)

30 g shredded cheese (cheddar or Mexican blend)

50 g avocado (sliced)

For the dressing:

60 g sour cream or Greek yogurt (1/4 cup)

15 g mayonnaise (1 tbsp)

15 ml lime juice (1 tbsp)

5 g chipotle in adobo sauce (or a pinch of smoked paprika)

Salt and pepper to taste

5 g cilantro (chopped, optional)

Instructions:
Prep the chicken:

In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper, and lime juice.

Rub this mixture over the chicken breasts and let it marinate for at least 20-30 minutes (or up to 2 hours in the fridge).

Grill the chicken:

Heat a grill pan or outdoor grill over medium-high heat.

Grill the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 75Â°C (165Â°F). Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before slicing.

Assemble the salad:

In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens, tomatoes, red onion, corn, black beans, red bell pepper, and cheese.

Toss gently to combine.

Make the dressing:

In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream (or Greek yogurt), mayonnaise, lime juice, chipotle or smoked paprika, and salt and pepper to taste. Add cilantro if desired.

Serve:

Slice the grilled chicken and add it on top of the salad.

Drizzle the dressing over the salad or serve on the side.

Optional toppings:

Add a few slices of avocado for extra creaminess.

Sprinkle extra cheese or tortilla strips for crunch.

Enjoy your Southwest Grilled Chicken Salad! ğŸ˜‹</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489986258_122224902776221232_7731716347473789534_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=106&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=EDsF6Tf4Y30Q7kNvwGIyQNm&amp;_nc_oc=AdngKhYizHsGtF-2QFhNN8Nlisqd01c1IO1MHZV7zZ4rYCxRNu3CRjfIGHDTk-ppRhrqQDK2sKhFEIhDtKEOQ26b&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=aNfkWUBR1Z2VD168CgnFng&amp;oh=00_AfPgP2o7HcI_OmVbtNsBJr07Esrqqf_6jCnRjsomiFNmYA&amp;oe=6846B7BC"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/KetoditeOlivia/posts/pfbid0aAYcmTPW8MvXxt8cQLQFWnj8YEsnjsFPDAYFFSwwWc7yRHm28c9PrcxVVgWPabcSl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Keto Sausage and Cauliflower Rice Skillet

1 pound Italian sausage (mild or spicy, casings removed)  
1 medium head of cauliflower (about 2 to 3 cups riced)  
1 tablespoon olive oil  
1 small onion, diced  
2 cloves garlic, minced  
1 bell pepper (any color), diced  
1 teaspoon Italian seasoning  
Salt and pepper to taste  
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese  
2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)  

1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and bell pepper, sautÃ©ing until softened, about 3-4 minutes.  
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1 minute, until fragrant.  
3. Add the Italian sausage to the skillet, breaking it apart with a spatula. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.  
4. Stir in the riced cauliflower and Italian seasoning. Cook for another 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is tender.  
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.  
6. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese over the skillet and cover for 2-3 minutes, allowing the cheese to melt.  
7. Remove from heat and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.  

Serves 4  

Nutritional Information (per serving):  
Calories: 350  
Net Carbs: 5g  
Protein: 22g  
Fat: 25g  

Tips &amp; Variations:  
For added flavor, try using different types of sausage, such as chorizo or chicken sausage.  
To make it spicier, add red pepper flakes or diced jalapeÃ±os during cooking.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/DailyRecipeHaven/posts/pfbid02jP24k6AN8icocdR4dtu2a5AeeroCj67so8eigivkeiMeY6kfU2NnMoHJEb2oCxKQl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Keto Egg Roll Wraps ğŸ¥¢  
Crispy, savory, and packed with flavor, these wraps delightfully satisfy!  
INGREDIENTS:  
ğŸ¥© 1/2 pound Ground Pork  
ğŸ¥¬ 2 cups Coleslaw Mix  
ğŸ§… 1/3 cup Green Onions, chopped  
ğŸ¥¢ 2 tbsp Soy Sauce  
ğŸ§„ 1 tsp Ginger Paste  
ğŸ«’ 1 tbsp Olive Oil  
ğŸ¥š 8 Egg Wraps  
INSTRUCTIONS:  
Saute the ground pork in a skillet over medium high heat until cooked through. Drain the excess grease, and reduce the heat to medium.  

Mix in the garlic, ginger, soy sauce, green onions, and coleslaw mix. Saute for 2 minutes longer.  

Let the meat mixture cool a bit.  

Place a layer of the filling down the center of each egg wrap. Fold in the sides of the wraps, and then roll tightly closed around the filling to form an egg roll shape.  

Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium high heat. Add the egg rolls seam side down to the heated skillet, and sear until light brown and crispy on the outside.  
 
PREP TIME &amp; NUTRITION:  
Prep Time: 20 minutes, Cook Time: 20 minutes, Total Time: 40 minutes, Servings: 8 Egg Rolls, Calories: 315 kcal, Net Carbs: 2, Fats: , Protein:

x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x78zum5 x1n2onr6 xh8yej3"><div class="x1n2onr6 x1ja2u2z x1jx94hy x1qpq9i9 xdney7k xu5ydu1 xt3gfkd x9f619 xh8yej3 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 xquyuld x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid08hb5iaMSrfcQJg5BG3pquLnFVCNPxkJywegXzN9U8tnLeB2DWYmTA6BCzxE5fh8sl&amp;id=61571173409189" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489417623_122126349344705780_5395835936166259097_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=8A2_a6wEz1UQ7kNvwEgr82_&amp;_nc_oc=Admg1ELqklXzOENW8ahx6dd_Mmg90-JEU5JIbr_VtE2BYC55FA_P4NNHTU2t8QfG9YG4T-Gf36TVZ6eTJ4_Icy54&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=aNfkWUBR1Z2VD168CgnFng&amp;oh=00_AfNyF38iI5735TZXEjmKdx7rwUSPj5d2pmQs-HXcmpupGw&amp;oe=6846E5AB"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid08hb5iaMSrfcQJg5BG3pquLnFVCNPxkJywegXzN9U8tnLeB2DWYmTA6BCzxE5fh8sl&amp;id=61571173409189" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Chicken Street Corn Tacos with JalapeÃ±o Lime Ranch ğŸŒ®ğŸŒ½
Ingredients:
For the chicken:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 tbsp olive oil
1 tsp chili powder
1/2 tsp smoked paprika
1/2 tsp garlic powder
1/2 tsp cumin
1/2 tsp salt
1/4 tsp black pepper
Juice of 1 lime
For the street corn topping:

1 cup corn kernels (fresh, frozen, or canned)
1 tbsp butter
1/4 cup mayonnaise
1/4 cup crumbled cotija cheese (or feta)
1 tbsp chopped cilantro
1/2 tsp chili powder
Juice of 1/2 lime
For the jalapeÃ±o lime ranch:

1/2 cup sour cream
1/4 cup mayonnaise
1 tbsp fresh lime juice
1 small jalapeÃ±o, seeds removed, finely chopped
1 tbsp chopped fresh cilantro
1/2 tsp garlic powder
1/4 tsp salt
For serving:

6 small corn tortillas
Extra cotija cheese &amp; cilantro for garnish
Lime wedges
Directions:

Marinate the chicken: In a bowl, mix olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, cumin, salt, black pepper, and lime juice. Coat the chicken and let it marinate for at least 15 minutes (or up to 2 hours for deeper flavor).

Cook the chicken: Heat a grill pan or skillet over medium heat. Cook the chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until fully cooked (165Â°F internal temperature). Let it rest for 5 minutes, then slice or shred.

Make the street corn topping: In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add corn and sautÃ© until slightly charred, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and mix with mayonnaise, cotija cheese, cilantro, chili powder, and lime juice.

Prepare the jalapeÃ±o lime ranch: In a small bowl, mix sour cream, mayonnaise, lime juice, jalapeÃ±o, cilantro, garlic powder, and salt. Stir until smooth.

Assemble the tacos: Warm the tortillas on a dry pan for 30 seconds per side. Fill each with chicken, street corn topping, and a drizzle of jalapeÃ±o lime ranch. Garnish with extra cheese, cilantro, and lime wedges.

Serve &amp; enjoy: Dig into these flavorful, creamy, and slightly spicy tacos!

â° Prep Time: 15 minutes | ğŸ”¥ Cooking Time: 20 minutes | â³ Total Time: 35 minutes
âš¡ Calories per serving: ~300 | ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6 tacos

x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Smoked JalapeÃ±o Popper Chicken Bombs   

ğŸ›’ Ingredients :  

4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts  
4 large jalapeÃ±os, halved and seeded  
8 oz cream cheese, softened  
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese  
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder  
1/2 teaspoon onion powder  
1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika  
1/4 teaspoon black pepper  
8 slices of bacon  
Toothpicks (to secure)  
BBQ sauce (optional, for glazing)  

ğŸ“ Instructions :  

Step 1.Prepare the Chicken: 
Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Using a sharp knife, create a pocket in each chicken breast by cutting horizontally, being careful not to cut all the way through.

Step 2.Make the Filling: 
In a mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, and black pepper. Mix until well combined.

Step 3.Stuff the Chicken: 
Take a jalapeÃ±o half and fill it with the cheese mixture. Insert the stuffed jalapeÃ±o into the pocket of each chicken breast. Secure the opening with toothpicks.

Step 4.Wrap with Bacon: 
Take 2 slices of bacon and wrap them around each stuffed chicken breast, ensuring the filling is completely covered. Secure with toothpicks if necessary.

Step 5.Bake the Chicken Bombs: 
Place the wrapped chicken bombs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the bacon is crispy.

Step 6.Glaze and Serve: 
If desired, brush the chicken bombs with BBQ sauce during the last 5 minutes of baking for an extra layer of flavor. Remove from the oven, let cool slightly, and serve warm. Enjoy these spicy, cheesy, and savory delights!

Enjoy ğŸ¤¤</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crispy Honey Chilli Chicken

Ingredients:
500g (1.1 lbs) boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 teaspoon salt
Â½ teaspoon black pepper
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1 teaspoon paprika
1 cup all-purpose flour
Â½ cup cornstarch
2 large eggs, beaten
Vegetable oil, for frying
For the Honey Chilli Sauce:
Â¼ cup honey
2 tablespoons soy sauce
2 tablespoons ketchup
1 tablespoon sriracha sauce (adjust to taste)
1 tablespoon rice vinegar
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger
1 red chili, finely chopped (optional, for extra heat)
1 teaspoon cornstarch mixed with 1 tablespoon water
Garnish:
1 tablespoon sesame seeds
2 green onions, chopped
Directions:
Prepare the Chicken:
In a bowl, season the chicken pieces with salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and paprika. Mix well to ensure even coating.
In a separate shallow dish, combine the all-purpose flour and cornstarch.
Dip each chicken piece into the beaten eggs, then dredge in the flour mixture, pressing lightly to adhere.
Fry the Chicken:
Heat vegetable oil in a deep frying pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Once the oil is hot (around 350Â°F or 175Â°C), carefully add the coated chicken pieces in batches. Fry until golden brown and crispy, about 4-5 minutes per batch.
Remove the fried chicken and drain on paper towels to remove excess oil.
Prepare the Honey Chilli Sauce:
In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine honey, soy sauce, ketchup, sriracha sauce, rice vinegar, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped red chili.
Bring the mixture to a gentle simmer, stirring occasionally.
Add the cornstarch slurry and continue to cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 2 minutes.
Combine and Serve:
In a large mixing bowl, toss the fried chicken pieces with the honey chilli sauce until thoroughly coated.
Transfer to a serving plate and garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions.
Serve immediately, ideally with steamed rice or noodles.
Prep Time: 20 minutes | Cooking Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 40 minutes
Kcal: Approximately 450 kcal per serving | Servings: 4</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0sVw7Ryqcrc7irL7zrdxsTjMMEMU2mCUKxiQx8nuCoLVe9wsUQ2pTWpA3AJHSkitsl&amp;id=61562131926422" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Teriyaki Chicken &amp; Veggie Bowls with Sriracha Mayo ğŸ¤¤  Ready in 30 minutes â€“ Flavor explosion in every bite!

Ingredients:

 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
 1/2 cup teriyaki sauce
 1 tbsp olive oil
 1 cup broccoli florets
 1 cup sliced carrots
 1 red bell pepper, sliced
 1/2 cup cooked brown rice
 1/4 cup mayonnaise
 1 tbsp sriracha (or more, to taste)
 1 tbsp sesame seeds (optional, for garnish)
 Green onions, chopped (optional, for garnish)

Instructions:

1. Prepare the chicken: In a medium bowl, combine the cubed chicken with 1/4 cup of the teriyaki sauce.  Marinate for at least 15 minutes (longer is better!).
2. Cook the chicken: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through (about 5-7 minutes).  Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. Stir-fry the vegetables: Add the broccoli, carrots, and red bell pepper to the skillet. Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
4. Combine and sauce: Return the cooked chicken to the skillet. Pour the remaining teriyaki sauce over the chicken and vegetables. Stir to coat everything evenly and heat through for another minute.
5. Make the sriracha mayo: In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise and sriracha. Adjust the amount of sriracha to your preferred level of spiciness.
6. Assemble the bowls: Divide the cooked brown rice among bowls. Top with the teriyaki chicken and vegetable mixture. Drizzle generously with the sriracha mayo.
7. Garnish and serve: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions, if desired. Serve immediately and enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div x1ja2u2z x1t137rt x1o1ewxj x3x9cwd x1e5q0jg x13rtm0m x1q0g3np x87ps6o x1lku1pv x1a2a7pz xzsf02u x1rg5ohu" href="https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61562131926422&amp;__tn__=%3C" role="link" Fiery Brazilian Chicken in Creamy Coconut Sauce

Ingredients:

2 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 large onion, finely chopped
4 garlic cloves, minced

class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/490329604_122234775026224080_6218412317546137149_n.jpg?stp=c0.252.1536.1536a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=101&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=53tgvv2sjLYQ7kNvwHW1QCj&amp;_nc_oc=Adm_C7HEZtSxEtHOCgdPk9vGojHrcVv5SqetDM1AeFpIbnijxTwQXRbsm2V-_0O667C3YKFLQeXfLn9-u1PuJ73P&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=VyI7NK5C87D4rx8v8TKsZQ&amp;oh=00_AfP0xe8_8BaayW2W56HQfD2j7g7T3MgcHd6x78A-PfJuuw&amp;oe=6846E6DA"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02vyXz47pX2zxUpARsws46EpqGjfYL88eMY3GHiurX4Xtweths4z5x8EbLDum1nkDGl&amp;id=61556722404142" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Jalapeno Pepper Jack Chicken Burger
Ingredients
2 lbs ground chicken
4 garlic cloves minced
1/2 onion finely diced
1-2 jalapeno peppers seeded and finely diced
2 teaspoons paprika
1 teaspoon kosher salt
1/2 teaspoon fresh ground pepper
3/4 cup shredded pepper jack cheese
1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro
vegetable or olive oil
8 slices of cheese optional I use American or white cheddar
8 hamburger Buns
Roasted Garlic Mayo
1 head of roasted garlic
1/3 cup mayonnaise
salt and pepper to taste
Guacamole
2 large avocados
Juice of 1 lime
2 tablespoons cilantro finely chopped
salt and pepper to taste
Instructions
In a small bowl, mix roasted garlic and mayo together until combined. Add salt and pepper and mix. Cover and store in the refrigerator until ready to use.
Preheat grill to a medium-high heat
In a mixing bowl add the ground chicken and the remaining ingredients and gently mix together.
Divide the chicken mixture into 8 patties.
Put a little vegetable oil on a paper towel and run it over the grill grate to coat lightly.
Grill burgers covered over direct heat for 8 minutes on each side or until it reaches 165 degrees. Right before the patties are done add a piece of cheese if desired.
Serve on toasted buns with your favorite toppings. Serves 6-8
Roasted Garlic
To roast garlic place a head of garlic on a piece of foil, drizzle a teaspoon olive oil over garlic. Wrap it in the foil and bake in the oven at 400 for 40 minutes or until garlic is soft. Squeeze garlic out of the skin and place into a bowl.
Add in mayonnaise, salt and pepper and mix until combined.
For the Guacamole
Cut avocados in half, remove the seed and scoop out the center into a bowl. Mash with a fork.
Mix in cilantro, lime juice, and salt and pepper.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02CNmMUxhMbu1nsWnNxGwWkdHDRSFf3RaaBmKnjVuLsAwFC43q9JbsbTEkDvYNL5sNl&amp;id=61566115651371" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489790395_122149907894537188_3489772784241217991_n.jpg?stp=c0.180.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=124JyVf-hHQQ7kNvwEBe3_v&amp;_nc_oc=Adnv9-1jnwmeLalb04a633Xg-HDyq6d02ztVkr74O0umyHrdHeDQxsVGqBtzneHZ-fewEQ-ei5qzsq3VkO33KWiF&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=VyI7NK5C87D4rx8v8TKsZQ&amp;oh=00_AfOBq6NN4XadHWrFEHWViuKxV_z8CqXZoQpZSIhTMerxug&amp;oe=6846CFA2"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02CNmMUxhMbu1nsWnNxGwWkdHDRSFf3RaaBmKnjVuLsAwFC43q9JbsbTEkDvYNL5sNl&amp;id=61566115651371" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Mediterranean Baked Fish with Herb-Infused Tomatoes and Olives

Ingredients:
4 fillets of white fish (such as cod or tilapia)
2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved
1 cup Kalamata olives, pitted and halved
1/4 cup olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp dried oregano
1 tsp dried thyme
Salt and pepper to taste
Fresh parsley, chopped for garnish
Lemon wedges for serving

Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). In a large baking dish, combine the cherry tomatoes, Kalamata olives, olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat the vegetables evenly.

Place the fish fillets on top of the tomato and olive mixture, and season the fish with salt and pepper. Spoon some of the tomato and olive mixture over the fish.

Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

Remove the foil and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes to allow the top to brown slightly. 

Garnish with fresh parsley and serve with lemon wedges on the side. 

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 35 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes  
Kcal: 320 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Cod in Roasted Red Pepper Sauce

Tender Cod Fillets Simmered in a Creamy Roasted Red Pepper &amp; Garlic Sauce

Ingredients:

4 cod fillets (about 6 oz each)

1 tablespoon olive oil

Salt &amp; black pepper, to taste

1/2 teaspoon paprika

1 tablespoon butter

3 cloves garlic, minced

1/2 onion, finely chopped

1 (12 oz) jar roasted red peppers, drained

1/2 cup heavy cream

1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese

1 teaspoon lemon juice

1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)

Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Directions:

Pat cod fillets dry with paper towels. Season both sides with salt, pepper, and paprika.

Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cod fillets and cook for 2â€“3 minutes per side until golden but not fully cooked through. Remove and set aside.

In the same skillet, reduce heat to medium. Add butter, then sautÃ© garlic and onion until soft and fragrant, about 3â€“4 minutes.

Add roasted red peppers to the skillet. Cook for 2 minutes, then transfer everything to a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth.

Return the sauce to the skillet. Stir in heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, and red pepper flakes (if using). Simmer for 3â€“4 minutes, stirring often.

Add cod fillets back into the sauce. Cover and simmer on low for 5â€“7 minutes or until fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot over rice, mashed potatoes, or pasta.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 30 minutes
Kcal: 360 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">âœ°Avocado Toast with Scrambled Eggs &amp; Fresh Fruit ğŸ³ğŸ
A delicious, nutritious, and energizing breakfast!
ğŸ“ğŸ…¸ğŸ…½ğŸ…¶ğŸ†ğŸ…´ğŸ…³ğŸ…¸ğŸ…´ğŸ…½ğŸ†ƒğŸ†‚ :
âœ°For the Avocado Toast:
â¤1 slice whole-grain bread, toasted
â¤1/2 ripe avocado, mashed
â¤1/2 tsp lemon juice
â¤1 tbsp crumbled feta cheese
â¤Salt &amp; black pepper to taste
â¤Red pepper flakes (optional, for spice)

âœ°For the Eggs:
â¤2 large eggs
â¤1/2 tbsp olive oil or butter
â¤Salt &amp; black pepper to taste

âœ°For the Side Salad:
â¤1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
â¤1/2 cup arugula
â¤1 tsp olive oil
â¤1/2 tsp balsamic vinegar
â¤1 tbsp crumbled feta cheese
â¤Salt &amp; pepper to taste

âœ°ğŸ½ï¸ Step by Step:
â¤1:Make the Avocado Toast:
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread it over toasted whole-grain bread.
Sprinkle crumbled feta and red pepper flakes on top.

â¤2:Cook the Eggs:
Heat olive oil or butter in a pan over medium-low heat.
Crack the eggs into the pan and cook until the whites are set but the yolks remain runny (about 3-4 minutes).
Season with salt and black pepper.

â¤3:Prepare the Side Salad:
In a bowl, toss arugula and cherry tomatoes with olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Sprinkle with feta cheese.

â¤3:Assemble &amp; Serve:
Plate the avocado toast, eggs, and salad together.
Enjoy a healthy, balanced meal!

src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489818089_122228966852208273_4439220236694071747_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=_vQevcWYf0UQ7kNvwEH2EaW&amp;_nc_oc=AdkBK_wxz2UsAIJRaOa4ZqFITaXLPRyw8okJgy4au_TcaSlaEt4lVPDOllaCw18PHpMcUJuf3y85pYTujZWYTtiv&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=VyI7NK5C87D4rx8v8TKsZQ&amp;oh=00_AfMrA_hECnC34vu-vseXuq_bYy7rRD6j1yumBqBecEEbtw&amp;oe=6846B4A4"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Easy Ginger Soy Cod

Flaky Cod Fillets in Sweet and Savory Ginger Soy Glaze

Ingredients:

4 cod fillets (about 5â€“6 oz each)
Salt and black pepper, to taste
2 tablespoons olive oil (or sesame oil for extra flavor)
3 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce
1 tablespoon honey
1 tablespoon rice vinegar (or lime juice)
1 tablespoon freshly grated ginger
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 teaspoon cornstarch (optional, for thickening sauce)
2 green onions, sliced (for garnish)
1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds (optional, for garnish)
Cooked white or jasmine rice, for serving
Directions:
Season the Cod:
Pat cod fillets dry with paper towels. Lightly season both sides with salt and pepper.
Make the Ginger Soy Sauce:
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, grated ginger, garlic, and cornstarch (if using). Set aside.
Cook the Cod:
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add cod fillets and sear for about 3â€“4 minutes on one side until golden brown. Flip and cook another 3 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Add Sauce and Glaze:
Reduce heat to low. Pour in the ginger soy mixture. Spoon the sauce over the fish as it simmers and thickens slightly (1â€“2 minutes). Remove from heat.
Serve:
Plate the cod over hot rice. Drizzle with extra sauce from the pan. Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds if desired. Serve immediately.
Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cook Time: 10 minutes | Total Time: 20 minutes
Kcal: ~280 kcal per serving (without rice) | Servings: 4</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489820421_122228888624208273_273074888106318744_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=106&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=1G5Ec6OilmUQ7kNvwFSiquX&amp;_nc_oc=AdkLdYtvC09YeA7tv-zQVpQluAuT1k9XMtvvhR4z86v3lHn7-fZdFBQqOM1htABrDWIdoprt-sFqhLxt58eayVxo&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=VyI7NK5C87D4rx8v8TKsZQ&amp;oh=00_AfMsvTI6e7OSKonXyaiX4687A_NZ0HpBc7-iTAhBAW0Cjw&amp;oe=6846B2D9"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crack Chicken Tenders

Irresistible Crispy Chicken Tenders with a Creamy Ranch Coating

Ingredients:

For the Chicken Tenders:

1.5 lbs chicken tenders

1 cup grated cheddar cheese

1/2 cup cream cheese, softened

1 packet ranch seasoning mix

1/2 cup mayonnaise

1/2 teaspoon garlic powder

1/2 teaspoon onion powder

Salt and pepper to taste

1 tablespoon olive oil (for cooking)

For Garnish (optional):

Fresh parsley, chopped

Directions:

Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).

In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated cheddar cheese, cream cheese, ranch seasoning, mayonnaise, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Mix until smooth and well combined.

Coat each chicken tender with the creamy mixture, ensuring it is fully covered.

Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot, add the coated chicken tenders to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden and crispy.

Transfer the chicken tenders to a baking sheet and place in the oven. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165Â°F (75Â°C).

Remove from the oven and sprinkle with fresh parsley, if desired. Serve immediately.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 18 minutes | Total Time: 28 minutes
Kcal: 380 kcal per serving | Servings: 4</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/Katierecipes/posts/pfbid02esF2AJ4aqEp4Bpq4SqPLKeUfkAMTNAHtH6xTt4DNunJ9heTKfbxCFDZSnsA7msURl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Garlic Butter Chicken and Rotini in Parmesan Sauce

Ingredients:

    â€¢ 12 oz rotini pasta
    â€¢ 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cubed
    â€¢ 3 tbsp butter
    â€¢ 3 cloves garlic, minced
    â€¢ 1 tsp Italian seasoning
    â€¢ 1/2 tsp garlic powder
    â€¢ Salt and pepper, to taste
    â€¢ 1 cup heavy cream
    â€¢ 1/2 cup chicken broth
    â€¢ 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
    â€¢ 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
    â€¢ Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Instructions:

    1. Start by boiling a large pot of salted water. Add the rotini and cook until perfectly al dente. Drain the pasta and set it aside while you work on the rest.
    2. In a deep skillet or sautÃ© pan, melt 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Toss in the cubed chicken and season it with garlic powder, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Sear the chicken until itâ€™s golden on the outside and fully cooked inside, then remove it from the pan and keep it warm.
    3. Drop the last tablespoon of butter into the same pan. Once melted, stir in the minced garlic and let it cook for a minute, just until it smells amazing. Pour in the heavy cream and chicken broth, whisking gently to bring it all together.
    4. Once the sauce starts to warm through, stir in the Parmesan and mozzarella. Let everything melt down into a silky, cheesy sauce, giving it a few minutes to thicken slightly.
    5. Return the chicken to the pan along with the cooked rotini. Stir everything together so the pasta and chicken are well coated in that luscious garlic-Parmesan sauce.
    6. Top it off with a sprinkle of fresh parsley and serve it hot. Creamy, cheesy, and garlicky in the best way.

Prep Time: 10 minutes
Cook Time: 25 minutes
Servings: 4</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/Katierecipes/posts/pfbid02ShRB6TDAnKtX1wLAsrssQS59kZSTDcP3HvUwabAKV6RKd55WVbCDB8wHZy678Sb7l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Garlic Chicken Lo Mein

Ingredients:

For the Chicken:
â€¢ 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cubed
â€¢ 1 tablespoon garlic powder
â€¢ Salt and pepper, to taste
â€¢ 1 tablespoon fish sauce
â€¢ 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, grated

For the Vegetables:
â€¢ 10 garlic cloves, minced
â€¢ 2 teaspoons fresh ginger, grated
â€¢ 2 cups cabbage, shredded
â€¢ 2 cups broccoli florets
â€¢ 2 carrots, shredded
â€¢ 4 green onions, sliced
â€¢ 6 ounces mushrooms, sliced
â€¢ 2 celery stalks, sliced

For the Noodles &amp; Sauce:
â€¢ 8 ounces buckwheat lo mein noodles
â€¢ 1/4 cup soy sauce
â€¢ 1 tablespoon hoisin sauce
â€¢ 1 teaspoon fish sauce
â€¢ 1 teaspoon black pepper
â€¢ 2 tablespoons Szechuan garlic butter (see note)
â€¢ Cooking oil (e.g., canola or vegetable oil)

Instructions:

1. Prepare the Chicken:
â—¦ In a bowl, mix cubed chicken, garlic powder, salt, pepper, fish sauce, and grated ginger until evenly coated.
2. Cook the Noodles:
â—¦ Boil lo mein noodles according to package directions, undercooking by 1â€“2 minutes for a firmer texture. Drain and set aside.
3. SautÃ© the Chicken:
â—¦ Heat 1 tablespoon of cooking oil in a hot skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
â—¦ Add the seasoned chicken and cook for 6â€“8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden brown.
â—¦ In the last 2 minutes, add 1 tablespoon of Szechuan garlic butter and half of the minced garlic, sautÃ©ing until fragrant.
â—¦ Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
4. SautÃ© the Vegetables:
â—¦ In the same pan, add another tablespoon of cooking oil if needed.
â—¦ Add the remaining minced garlic and grated ginger, sautÃ©ing for 1 minute.
â—¦ Toss in cabbage, broccoli, carrots, green onions, mushrooms, and celery. Stir-fry for 5â€“7 minutes, until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
5. Combine Everything:
â—¦ Return the cooked chicken to the pan with the vegetables.
â—¦ Add the undercooked noodles to the pan.
â—¦ Pour in soy sauce, hoisin sauce, fish sauce, black pepper, and the remaining Szechuan garlic butter.
â—¦ Stir-fry everything together over medium heat for 2â€“3 minutes, until the noodles are fully cooked and coated in sauce.
6. Serve &amp; Enjoy:
â—¦ Remove from heat and serve immediately.

Servings: 4
Prep Time: 20 minutes
Cook Time: 20 minutes</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸŒ¿ğŸ”¥ Chimichurri Grilled Steak Quesadilla with Avocado Chimichurri: A Flavorful Journey
ğŸ”¥ Bold steak. Zesty herbs. Creamy avocado. Cheese. All grilled to perfection.
Ingredients:
For the Steak:
1 lb (450g) flank or skirt steak

Salt &amp; black pepper

1 tbsp olive oil

For the Chimichurri:
1 cup fresh parsley (packed)

Â½ cup fresh cilantro (optional for twist)

3 garlic cloves

Â½ tsp red pepper flakes

2 tbsp red wine vinegar

Â½ cup olive oil

Salt &amp; pepper to taste

For the Avocado Chimichurri:
Â½ ripe avocado

Â¼ cup chimichurri (from above)

Juice of Â½ lime

Optional: a touch of honey or more vinegar to balance

For the Quesadilla:
4 large flour tortillas

1Â½ cups shredded cheese (like Monterey Jack or mozzarella)

Sliced red onions or roasted peppers (optional)

Butter or oil for grilling

Instructions:
Make the Chimichurri:
In a food processor or blender, combine parsley, cilantro (if using), garlic, red pepper flakes, vinegar, and olive oil. Blend until finely chopped but still textured. Season with salt &amp; pepper.

Marinate the Steak:
Rub steak with salt, pepper, olive oil, and 2 tbsp chimichurri. Let sit at least 30 minutes (or overnight in the fridge for more flavor).

Grill the Steak:
Heat grill or pan to high. Cook steak 4â€“5 minutes per side for medium-rare. Rest for 5â€“10 minutes, then slice thinly across the grain.

Make Avocado Chimichurri:
Mash avocado in a bowl. Stir in chimichurri and lime juice. Adjust flavor to taste.

Assemble Quesadillas:
On half of each tortilla, layer cheese, steak slices, optional onions/peppers, and a dollop of avocado chimichurri. Fold over.

Grill Quesadillas:
Heat a pan or griddle over medium. Add a little butter/oil and cook quesadillas until golden brown and crispy, about 3â€“4 minutes per side.

To Serve:
Slice into wedges, drizzle with more avocado chimichurri, and enjoy the epic flavor combo!

Would you like a version with grilled chicken or even a vegetarian twist?</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">best healthy start ğŸ¥‘ğŸ³

Your best power-packed breakfast to fuel the whole day strong!

ğŸ“ Ingredients:

2 large eggs, scrambled

1 small sweet potato, sliced

1 tsp olive oil

Salt, pepper, paprika (to taste)

1/2 avocado, sliced

1/2 cup spinach, sautÃ©ed

1 chicken or turkey sausage link, sliced and cooked

ğŸ½ï¸ How to Make It :

1ï¸âƒ£ Roast the Sweet Potato:

Toss sweet potato slices in olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400Â°F (200Â°C) for 20â€“25 mins until tender and golden. These crispy sweet potato rounds are a Facebook-worthy comfort food win!

2ï¸âƒ£ SautÃ© the Spinach &amp; Sausage:

In a hot skillet, lightly sautÃ© spinach until wilted. In the same pan, brown sliced sausage until itâ€™s golden. This duo brings a super satisfying protein punch and healthy flavor combo to your bowl.

3ï¸âƒ£ Scramble the Eggs:

Whisk eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper. Cook on low heat until fluffy. This is your easy breakfast base and a must for clean eating fans.

4ï¸âƒ£ Prep the Avocado:

Slice your avocado just before serving and season with salt and pepper. Itâ€™s creamy, dreamy, and Instagram-level breakfast fuel.

5ï¸âƒ£ Assemble Your Bowl:

Layer scrambled eggs, roasted sweet potatoes, sautÃ©ed spinach, sausage slices, and avocado into a large bowl. This power breakfast bowl is packed with flavor, texture, and everything you need for a strong start.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cook Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 30 minutes

Ingredients:
1. 4 chicken breasts or thighs
The full recipe is in the FIRST (C.O.M.M.E.N.T) ğŸ‘‡

class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/490588630_122166316712347372_1999039825801136030_n.jpg?stp=c0.204.1092.1092a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=AMsM2CRE__cQ7kNvwG8RSe9&amp;_nc_oc=AdlLpURpwLdn5TjRFL1woPKyeFcAo8AudxQUUQ6Du-znvCAtq8eUSf2KLFft1ANf63xGat73WWKVug_Un9_HpbOA&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=k6c7o4tsuWPtnjcFKorFhw&amp;oh=00_AfPRDJVWuPX_lRYsHn8u7ofwwKuCmyyyqzsezmkn6O6pjQ&amp;oe=6846E030"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02zcJwS2pSx16r6oXms3AbcRoeUnwr5M3pBj4x572Cs8qCxGjXvHQoNsiHiv8a2rJDl&amp;id=61560421185266" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Savory Cajun Chicken with Creamy Parmesan Pasta Linguine
Ingredients:
For the Cajun Chicken:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 6 oz each)
2 tbsp Cajun seasoning
1 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp butter
1/2 cup chicken broth
1/4 cup heavy cream
1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, for garnish
For the Creamy Parmesan Pasta Linguine:
1 lb linguine pasta
4 tbsp butter
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 cup heavy cream
1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving
1/4 cup reserved pasta water
1/4 tsp salt
1/4 tsp black pepper
1/4 cup chopped fresh basil, for garnish
Directions:
Get started by cooking the linguine according to package directions until al dente. Make sure to reserve about 1/4 cup of the pasta water before draining!
While the pasta is cooking, let's get that chicken going. Pat the chicken breasts dry with paper towels and season them generously on both sides with the Cajun seasoning.
Heat the olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the skillet is hot, add the chicken breasts and cook for about 5-7 minutes per side, until they are golden brown and cooked through. A meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part should read 165Â°F.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside on a plate to rest.
Now, for the sauce! Add the chicken broth and heavy cream to the skillet. Bring to a simmer, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan. Let it simmer for a few minutes to thicken slightly.
While the chicken is resting, let's whip up that creamy pasta. In a large pot or skillet (the same one you cooked the chicken in, after wiping it out, works great!), melt the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant. Be careful not to burn it!
Pour in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth and creamy.
Add the cooked linguine to the creamy Parmesan sauce and toss to coat. If the sauce is too thick, add a little of the reserved pasta water until it reaches your desired consistency.
Slice the Cajun chicken breasts and place them on top of the creamy Parmesan pasta linguine. Garnish with fresh parsley and basil, and sprinkle with extra Parmesan cheese, if desired. Serve immediately and enjoy!
Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Servings: 4 | Calories: Approximately 750 per serving</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x1n2onr6 x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1ja2u2z x1t137rt x1o1ewxj x3x9cwd x1e5q0jg x13rtm0m x1q0g3np x87ps6o x1lku1pv x1a2a7pz xzsf02u x1rg5ohu" class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489849251_122224096520209615_672135438125837865_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=pOytac3qdV0Q7kNvwHqwunG&amp;_nc_oc=AdnaXlGhwqRnidG3eRDJE0PLebsBSSpCzMDxwekBvRJ9NiT_sqQHnJBAH-qkbaQ1nEEJfvQyIg6yDRIbNS7hhR1e&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=k6c7o4tsuWPtnjcFKorFhw&amp;oh=00_AfMydzxrAPaKA66ZvKpEotff5bjqJtAQfNq8VaAx7bim5A&amp;oe=6846E116"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02K7r3sUmCFhq8WTqogpWzURnAt1PQYdEGVDRXt2JgMc35UcokXEGx2FjqBr3deSyRl&amp;id=61556288462044" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Braised Beef Short Ribs with Rigatoni

Ingredients:
2 lbs beef short ribs
Salt &amp; black pepper
2 tbsp olive oil
1 chopped onion
1 chopped carrot
1 chopped red bell pepper
4 minced garlic cloves
1/2 cup tomato paste
1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes
1 cup beef broth 
Fresh thyme, oregano, and bay leaves
1 lb rigatoni
1 cup shredded mozzarella
Fresh basil

Directions:
Preheat oven to 300Â°F. Season the beef short ribs with salt and black pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large oven-safe pot over medium-high heat. Sear the short ribs on all sides until browned. Remove and set aside.
In the same pot, add the chopped onion, carrot, and red bell pepper. SautÃ© until the vegetables are softened.
Add the minced garlic and tomato paste, stirring well to combine.
Pour in the beef broth to deglaze the pot, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom.
Add the crushed tomatoes, fresh thyme, oregano, and bay leaves. Return the short ribs to the pot.
Cover the pot with a lid and transfer to the preheated oven. Braise for 3 hours or until the short ribs are tender and the sauce is rich.
Remove the short ribs from the pot, shred the meat, and discard the bones. Blend the sauce with an immersion blender until smooth, if desired. Return the shredded meat to the sauce.
Cook the rigatoni according to package instructions. Drain and add to the pot with the sauce and meat, stirring to combine.
Garnish with shredded mozzarella and fresh basil before serving.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7
