x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/2337655909846972/permalink/4041084359504110/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/490576449_10236563490855054_40910292978602791_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=f679wSBZ908Q7kNvwHE7Ywq&amp;_nc_oc=AdkJhpG2in98_kSZvzHOdj_jlScySwd0bG9oVcFHt3Vpzjsa_7eR4klACUDRvaPJoefg2lFLV_Clku2ix0mOcXRB&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=k6c7o4tsuWPtnjcFKorFhw&amp;oh=00_AfOH3ug3WMKe8Jng_URhi8lOUKu0c1Cb5boGKCc0YwPbfg&amp;oe=6846BC3B"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/2337655909846972/permalink/4041084359504110/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Pineapple Chicken and Rice, a sweet and savory tropical dish thatâ€™ll bring the flavors of the tropics right to your kitchen:

Ingredients:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (cut into bite-sized cubes)

1 cup jasmine rice (or any rice you prefer)

1 cup pineapple chunks (fresh or canned)

1 small onion (diced)

2 cloves garlic (minced)

1 bell pepper (diced)

1/4 cup soy sauce

2 tbsp honey or brown sugar (for sweetness)

1 tbsp rice vinegar or white vinegar

1/2 tsp ground ginger

1/4 tsp red pepper flakes (optional, for a bit of heat)

2 tbsp olive oil (or any cooking oil)

Salt and pepper to taste

Fresh cilantro or green onions for garnish (optional)

Instructions:
Cook the Rice:

Start by cooking your rice according to the package instructions. Once done, set it aside.

Cook the Chicken:

Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.

Season the chicken cubes with a pinch of salt and pepper, then add them to the skillet.

Cook until the chicken is browned and cooked through, about 7-8 minutes.

Remove the chicken from the skillet and set it aside.

Prepare the Sauce:

In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of olive oil.

Toss in the diced onion, garlic, and bell pepper. SautÃ© until softened, about 3-4 minutes.

Add the pineapple chunks and cook for an additional 2 minutes.

Mix the Sauce:

In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, honey (or brown sugar), rice vinegar, ginger, and red pepper flakes (if using).

Pour this sauce mixture into the skillet with the vegetables and pineapple. Let it simmer for about 3-4 minutes, allowing the sauce to thicken slightly.

Combine:

Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir well to coat the chicken in the sauce.

If the sauce is too thick, you can add a little water or chicken broth to reach your desired consistency.

Serve:

Serve the pineapple chicken over the cooked rice.

Garnish with fresh cilantro or chopped green onions for a fresh pop of flavor.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0EY94Qr2noP7ydXK8STQyrhLs2BLE9sJ4U3iQoz7jmqyKJPgTTbM2GmNdwdLRH5vJl&amp;id=61562131926422" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">BBQ Chicken  &amp; Corn Rice Bowls with Ranch Drizzle ğŸ¤¤ğŸ”

Ingredients:

 1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts
 1 cup BBQ sauce (your favorite kind!)
 1 tbsp olive oil
 1 cup long-grain rice
 2 cups chicken broth
 1 cup frozen corn (or 2 ears of fresh corn, kernels removed)
 1 red bell pepper, diced
 1/2 red onion, diced
 1/4 cup chopped cilantro (optional)
 Ranch dressing, for drizzling

Instructions:

1. Cook the rice: Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Combine rice and chicken broth in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed. Fluff with a fork and set aside.
2. Prepare the chicken: Cut the chicken breasts into 1-inch cubes. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides and cooked through (about 5-7 minutes). 
3. Add BBQ sauce: Pour BBQ sauce over the chicken and cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened slightly and coated the chicken.
4. SautÃ© vegetables: While the chicken is cooking, heat a separate skillet over medium heat. Add the diced red bell pepper and red onion and sautÃ© for 5-7 minutes, until softened.  Stir in the frozen corn (or fresh corn kernels) during the last 2 minutes of cooking.
5. Assemble the bowls: Divide the cooked rice evenly among bowls. Top with the BBQ chicken, sautÃ©ed vegetables, and a sprinkle of cilantro (if using).
6. Drizzle with ranch: Drizzle each bowl generously with ranch dressing. Serve immediately and enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Blackened Chicken Alfredo (One Pan)

Stealth Health Simple, Episode 7

Made entirely in one pan - this is the ultimate recipe for minimizing effort/cleanup, while maximizing flavor and reward (you get 2 weeks worth of lunches for the effort) ğŸ¤

Store in your freezer for up to 3-4 months, pop in the microwave with a splash of milk or broth, and you have a high protein, indulgent meal ready to go whenever you want it ğŸ”¥

Per Serving (Makes 15)
500 Calories
41g Protein
50g Carbs
14g Fat

â€”â€”â€”

Blackened Chicken:
1344g (48oz) chicken breast, salted
Blackened or Cajun Seasoning*
20g (4 tsp) Olive Oil
15g (1 Tbsp) Butter

Vegetables/Aromatics:
2 diced sweet onions
4-5 diced bell peppers
~10 cloves minced garlic
30g (2 Tbsp) butter
30g (2 Tbsp) Dijon mustard

Pasta:
896g (32oz) rigatoni
(Cook for ~80% of time shown on box)
Save ~2 cups of starchy pasta water

Blended Alfredo Sauce:
800g (28oz) 2% blended cottage cheese
180g (6oz) parmigiano reggiano
120g (4oz) 1/3 fat cream cheese
240ml (8oz) fat free milk
Salt &amp; pepper to taste

Finishing/Garnish:
Handful of chives 
60g (2oz) Mozzarella

â€”â€”â€”

*HOMEMADE BLACKENING SEASONING:
2 tablespoons paprika
1 tablespoon onion powder
2 teaspoons garlic powder
1 teaspoon ground black pepper
1 teaspoon dried oregano
Â½ teaspoon dried thyme
1/2 teaspoon cayenne 

*When selecting a â€œblackenedâ€ or â€œCajunâ€ seasoning, I recommend finding one where the first/primary ingredient is paprika, and one that contains no salt. They will all be more or less the same.

vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">A hearty, protein-packed lentil curry simmered in a rich, fragrant coconut sauceâ€”perfect for a cozy and nutritious meal! ğŸŒ±ğŸ›ğŸ¥¥

ğŸ›’ Ingredients:
ğŸ«’ 2 tbsp olive oil
ğŸ§… 1 small onion (diced)
ğŸ§„ 3 cloves garlic (minced)
ğŸŒ¶ï¸ 1 tbsp fresh ginger (grated)
ğŸ› 2 tsp curry powder
ğŸŒ¿ 1 tsp ground cumin
ğŸŒ¶ï¸ Â½ tsp turmeric
ğŸ… 1 (14-oz) can diced tomatoes
ğŸ¥£ 1 cup dry lentils (green or brown)
ğŸ¥¥ 1 (14-oz) can coconut milk
ğŸ² 2 cups vegetable broth
ğŸ§‚ Salt &amp; black pepper (to taste)
ğŸ‹ 1 tbsp lemon juice
ğŸŒ¿ Fresh cilantro (for garnish)
ğŸš Cooked rice (for serving)

ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³ Instructions:
1ï¸âƒ£ SautÃ© aromatics: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger, sautÃ©ing until fragrant.
2ï¸âƒ£ Add spices: Stir in curry powder, cumin, and turmeric. Cook for 30 seconds to release flavors.
3ï¸âƒ£ Simmer the lentils: Add diced tomatoes, lentils, coconut milk, and broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender.
4ï¸âƒ£ Season &amp; finish: Stir in salt, pepper, and lemon juice for a burst of flavor.
5ï¸âƒ£ Serve hot! Garnish with fresh cilantro and enjoy with steamed rice.

â³ Prep Time: 10 mins | Cook Time: 30 mins
ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ”¥ Tips &amp; Nutrition:
Swap coconut milk for cashew cream for a different richness! ğŸ¥¥

Use red lentils for a creamier texture and faster cooking time.

Approx. 350 kcal per serving (without rice).

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02vdzAXqirraxj3QKUuSFdWtdH4chsrnpKf9sGp6p6MecoKyYcumdUWEinCWFPGsNTl&amp;id=100076411203350" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Mexican Chicken with Cheese Sauce
Spicy Grilled Chicken with Creamy Cheddar Sauce

Ingredients:
Chicken:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1 teaspoon chili powder
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1 teaspoon onion powder
1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
2 teaspoons paprika
1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
Cheese Sauce:
2 tablespoons flour
2 tablespoons butter
1 cup milk
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1/4 teaspoon paprika
1 cup extra sharp cheddar cheese, shredded

Directions:
Chicken:
Mix together chili powder, garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, oregano, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Season both sides of the chicken breasts with the spice mixture.
Grill over medium to high heat until internal temperature reaches 165Â°F (about 6 to 8 minutes per side).
Set aside to rest.
Cheese Sauce:
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Whisk in flour and cook until it begins to bubble.
Gradually add milk, whisking constantly to prevent lumps.
Continue heating until the mixture is hot enough to melt the cheese (not boiling).
Gradually whisk in the shredded cheese until smooth.
Stir in paprika and cayenne pepper. Adjust salt to taste.
Serve the sauce hot over the grilled chicken.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 25 minutes | Total Time: 35 minutes
Kcal: 546 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/489319410_122221030772077208_3296283190873637223_n.jpg?stp=c0.75.600.600a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=110&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=6NNZ66h1NqUQ7kNvwHaGPqE&amp;_nc_oc=Admz9RYcZz0PgvcSf7Mkfiv4bBCpNS7Z4yw8wZGQPDmb5G4rSnn33ObafqLZooibKD0YIjOIeNoKwVtdRYTUbfcX&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=lM0mZ7ji8gXW4eEHoV36QQ&amp;oh=00_AfNyS1zPAN_lWFMzORSXuULBxIZ3Y0RZK5BZ8VYhfqlW2g&amp;oe=6846C99B"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/Linarecipes37/posts/pfbid0g1kbkwbVe8Q2FRLv7FkTqbuzsDDob7zVEm4fVHytk15xaU5mHz5Jm2Bz5Wb2DRnEl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Szechuan-Style Fiery Shredded Crispy Beef

Ingredients:

- 1 lb beef flank steak, thinly sliced against the grain ğŸ¥©
- 1/4 cup cornstarch ğŸŒ½
- 1/4 cup vegetable oil for frying ğŸ›¢ï¸
- 2 cloves garlic, minced ğŸ§„
- 1-inch piece ginger, minced ğŸ¥¢
- 2-3 dried red chilies, chopped ğŸŒ¶ï¸
- 1/4 cup Szechuan peppercorns ğŸŒ¶ï¸
- 1/4 cup soy sauce ğŸœ
- 2 tbsp rice vinegar ğŸš
- 2 tbsp sugar ğŸ¬
- 1 tbsp hoisin sauce ğŸ¯
- 1/2 cup bell peppers, sliced ğŸŒ¶ï¸
- 1/2 cup green onions, chopped ğŸ§…
- Optional: sesame seeds for garnish ğŸŒ±
Directions:
Begin by marinating the sliced beef in soy sauce, rice vinegar, and sugar for about 30 minutes. After marinating, drain the beef and toss it in cornstarch until well coated. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Fry the beef in batches until golden and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per batch. Remove and drain on paper towels.
In the same skillet, add minced garlic, ginger, dried red chilies, and Szechuan peppercorns. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Add the crispy beef back into the skillet along with bell peppers and hoisin sauce. Toss everything together until well combined and heated through.
Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds if desired. Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles for a delicious meal that packs a spicy punch!
Prep Time: 30 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes  
Kcal: 350 kcal per serving | Servings: 4 servings
This Szechuan-Style Fiery Shredded Crispy Beef is a perfect dish for those who love bold flavors and a bit of heat. The combination of crispy beef with the aromatic spices creates a delightful experience for your taste buds. Ideal for a weeknight dinner or a special occasion, this recipe is sure to impress your family and friends with its vibrant flavors and satisfying crunch!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid033UrbeLRrZ6As7QT6DWGbqdRgcuwXmAxb4pBoc591Rn7idKXVNM1Y995MPGMKKe1gl&amp;id=61562883100833" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Spicy Korean BBQ Beef Bowls with Gochujang Sauce

Ingredients:

For the Beef:

1 lb ground beef

1 tablespoon sesame oil

3 cloves garlic, minced

1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated

3 tablespoons gochujang (Korean chili paste)

2 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce

1 tablespoon rice vinegar

1 tablespoon brown sugar or honey

1 teaspoon sesame seeds (plus more for garnish)

Salt and pepper to taste

For Serving:

2 cups cooked jasmine or brown rice

1 cup shredded carrots

1 cup thinly sliced cucumber

1/2 cup kimchi (optional)

2 green onions, chopped

Fried or soft-boiled eggs (optional)

Directions:

Heat sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.

Add garlic and ginger, sautÃ© for 1 minute.

Stir in gochujang, soy sauce, rice vinegar, brown sugar (or honey), and sesame seeds. Mix well to coat the beef.

Simmer for 3â€“5 minutes until sauce thickens slightly and beef is coated and flavorful. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

To assemble, divide rice into bowls and top with the spicy beef mixture. Add shredded carrots, cucumber, green onions, and kimchi if using.

Top with a fried or soft-boiled egg and a sprinkle of sesame seeds for extra flavor. Serve warm.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 25 minutes
Kcal: 510 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/326899156878801/permalink/643642175204496/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Mediterranean Ground Beef Stir Fry

Organic Ingredients:  
- 1 lb ground beef  
- 1 tbsp olive oil  
- 1 small onion, diced  
- 3 cloves garlic, minced  
- 1 bell pepper, chopped  
- 1 zucchini, diced  
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved  
- Â½ cup Kalamata olives, sliced  
- 1 tsp oregano  
- Â½ tsp cumin  
- Â½ tsp paprika  
- Salt &amp; pepper to taste  
- Â¼ cup feta cheese, crumbled  
- Fresh parsley, for garnish  

**Directions:  
1. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. SautÃ© onion and garlic until fragrant.  
2. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it apart as it cooks.  
3. Stir in bell pepper, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes; cook until softened.  
4. Season with oregano, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix well.  
5. Toss in olives and cook for another 2 minutes.  
6. Remove from heat, sprinkle with feta cheese, and garnish with parsley.  
7. Serve as is or with rice, quinoa, or pita bread. Enjoy! 
Source:MediterraneanKitchenRecipes 

**Makes 4 servings
**Approx. 350-400 calories (varies based on ingredients and portion sizes)</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486252464_643883401855655_6777387299546967170_n.jpg?stp=c0.252.1536.1536a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=101&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=4qmLHmZoKUYQ7kNvwGJMIM6&amp;_nc_oc=Adnlhd5UbsXriZxcMZFfz_-E-MWN3CtGNoXMlvRc0yJcdZpb6UfO0HBIq7W57997plQtxtZMiQVN73NVkIyevmB-&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=lM0mZ7ji8gXW4eEHoV36QQ&amp;oh=00_AfOF1PWAMR-jgqU6ykMgOu5hr2-HgFoQR94xnIQDlbLuDQ&amp;oe=6846D93F"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0cTtfAuvKfUcH4uPKm8924HY34joFgcSwcq18jBDzFUSpamrd9fE7184mWVRUfNdxl&amp;id=100087020023239" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Ground Beef Totchos
Ingredients :
1 (32 ounce) bag tater tots
1 teaspoon olive oil
1 pound ground beef
1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning
2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
salsa, for serving
shredded lettuce, for serving
pickled jalapenos, for serving

Directions:
Preheat oven to 425F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place tater tots in a single layer. Bake 28 - 30 minutes, until golden brown and crispy.
While tater tots are baking, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook, breaking up the beef, until no pink remains.
Add taco seasoning and Â¼ cup water to the skillet and let simmer, stirring, until all the liquid is absorbed.
Once tater tots are baked, top with ground beef and shredded cheddar cheese.
Return baking sheet to oven and back another 5 minutes or so, until the cheese is melted.
Remove from oven and add toppings. Serve immediately</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Balsamic Grilled Flank Steak Caprese ğŸ¥©ğŸ…ğŸ§€

Bold, juicy steak meets fresh Caprese flavor in this quick grilled favorite!

Ingredients
Marinade &amp; Dressing:

Balsamic vinegar â€“ 1/4 cup

Olive oil â€“ 1/4 cup

Dijon mustard â€“ 1 tbsp

Honey â€“ 1 tsp

Garlic â€“ 1 large clove, minced

Salt â€“ 1/4 tsp

Pepper â€“ 1/4 tsp

For the Steak Caprese:

Flank steak â€“ 2 lbs

Cherry or grape tomatoes â€“ 2 cups

Fresh mozzarella â€“ 1 cup, diced

Basil â€“ 2 tbsp, sliced thin

Instructions
Mix Marinade:
Combine all marinade ingredients in a bowl.

Marinate Steak:
Coat steak with half the marinade. Chill overnight.

Grill Steak:
Grill on medium-high heat, 3â€“5 mins per side. Let it rest 5 mins.

Grill Tomatoes:
Grill or pan-blister tomatoes until slightly charred, about 3â€“5 mins.

Assemble &amp; Serve:
Slice steak thinly. Top with tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and remaining marinade.

Serves: 4
Calories per serving: 450 kcal</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Todayâ€™s Colorado Recipe!  ğŸ˜‹ ğŸ˜‹ ğŸ˜‹
Garlic Butter Honey BBQ Beef Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb ground beef
2 tablespoons unsalted butter
3 cloves garlic, minced
Â¼ cup honey
Â¼ cup BBQ sauce
1 teaspoon smoked paprika
Â½ teaspoon ground cumin
Â½ teaspoon chili powder
Salt and pepper to taste
8 small soft taco tortillas
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
1 cup shredded lettuce
1 small red onion, thinly sliced
Fresh cilantro for garnish (optional)
Directions:
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring frequently until fragrant.
Add the ground beef to the skillet and season with smoked paprika, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper. Cook, breaking the beef apart with a spoon, until browned and fully cooked, about 5-7 minutes.
Once the beef is cooked through, drain any excess fat, then stir in the honey and BBQ sauce. Simmer for an additional 2-3 minutes, allowing the sauce to thicken and coat the beef. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
Warm the taco tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave for 20-30 seconds until soft and pliable.
To assemble the tacos, spoon the BBQ beef mixture onto each tortilla.
Top with shredded cheddar cheese, lettuce, sliced red onion, and a sprinkle of fresh cilantro for added flavor.
Serve the tacos immediately while warm and enjoy the sweet, savory, and slightly smoky flavors!
Credit: Grandma's Tasty recipes https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100087744836600</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w Hearty, healthy, and bursting with bold Mediterranean flavorâ€”this one-pan wonder is your go-to for a quick, balanced meal.

Ingredients

1 lb lean ground beef (85â€“90%)

1 red bell pepper, sliced

1 zucchini, chopped

1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

1 small onion, chopped

3 garlic cloves, minced

1 tbsp olive oil

1 tsp smoked paprika

1 tsp ground cumin

1 tsp dried oregano

Salt and black pepper to taste

Crushed red pepper flakes (optional)

2 tbsp lemon juice

Â½ cup crumbled feta cheese

Â¼ cup chopped fresh parsley

Instructions

1. Cook the Aromatics:

Heat olive oil in a large skillet.

Add onion and garlic; sautÃ© for 2â€“3 minutes until fragrant.

2. Brown the Beef:

Add ground beef. Break it up and cook until browned.

Drain any excess fat if needed.

3. Add the Veggies &amp; Spices:

Stir in bell pepper, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes.

Season with cumin, paprika, oregano, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes if using.

Cook for 5â€“6 minutes until veggies are tender but crisp.

4. Finish with Freshness:

Drizzle in lemon juice.

Stir in feta and parsley just before serving.

5. Serve Your Way:

Enjoy as-is, or serve over rice, quinoa, or with warm pita</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/237257332737277/permalink/550406998088974/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">CARNE ASADA
Ingredients:
For the Carne Asada:
- 1 pound flank or skirt steak
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- Juice of 1 lime
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1/2 teaspoon paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
For the Tostadas:
- 6 tostada shells
- 1 cup guacamole
- 1 cup pico de gallo (fresh tomato salsa)
- Optional: shredded lettuce, sour cream, or cheese
Directions:
1. Marinate the Carne Asada:
- In a bowl, combine olive oil, minced garlic, lime juice, cumin, chili powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
- Rub the mixture all over the steak and let it marinate for at least 30 minutes (or up to 2 hours for more flavor).
2. Cook the Steak:
- Heat a grill pan or skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the steak for 4-5 minutes per side, or until desired doneness is achieved.
- Let the steak rest for 5 minutes, then slice it thinly against the grain.
3. Assemble the Tostadas:
- Spread a layer of guacamole on each tostada shell.
- Top with slices of carne asada.
- Add pico de gallo or any additional toppings you like.
4. Serve:
- Garnish with fresh lime wedges and cilantro</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq Spiced Chicken Shawarma Wraps with Luscious Garlic Yogurt Sauce

Ingredients:

For the Chicken Marinade:

2 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs

3 tablespoons plain Greek yogurt

1/4 cup olive oil

xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Marry Me Salmon Recipe

Ingredients:

For the Salmon:
    â€¢ 4 salmon fillets (6 oz each, skinless or with skin)
    â€¢ 2 Tbsp olive oil
    â€¢ 1 tsp garlic powder
    â€¢ 1 tsp onion powder
    â€¢ 1/2 tsp smoked paprika
    â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

For the Sauce:
    â€¢ 2 Tbsp unsalted butter
    â€¢ 3â€“4 garlic cloves, minced
    â€¢ 1 cup heavy cream
    â€¢ 1/3 cup chicken broth (or vegetable broth)
    â€¢ 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
    â€¢ 1/2 tsp chili flakes (optional, for heat)
    â€¢ 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped
    â€¢ 1 tsp dried basil (or Italian seasoning)
    â€¢ 1/2 cup fresh spinach, chopped
    â€¢ Salt &amp; pepper to taste

Instructions:

    1. Prep the Salmon:
â€¢ Pat the salmon fillets dry with a paper towel.
â€¢ Season with garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper.
    2. Cook the Salmon:
â€¢ Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
â€¢ Sear the salmon fillets for 3â€“4 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked to your desired doneness.
â€¢ Remove from the skillet and set aside.
    3. Make the Sauce:
â€¢ In the same skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
â€¢ Add minced garlic and sautÃ© for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
â€¢ Stir in heavy cream, chicken broth, and Parmesan cheese.
â€¢ Mix well until the cheese is melted and the sauce thickens slightly.
    4. Add Flavor:
â€¢ Stir in chili flakes (if using), sun-dried tomatoes, and dried basil.
â€¢ Let the sauce simmer for 2â€“3 minutes.
    5. Combine &amp; Finish:
â€¢ Add the fresh spinach and stir until wilted.
â€¢ Return the salmon fillets to the skillet, spoon the creamy sauce over them, and let everything simmer for 2 minutes to blend the flavors.
    6. Serve:
â€¢ Garnish with fresh basil or parsley, if desired.
â€¢ Serve warm with rice, mashed potatoes, or pasta for a perfect meal!

Servings: 4
Prep Time: 10 minutes
Cook Time: 20 minutes</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/3621749484743882/permalink/3835708203348008/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Spicy Brazilian Coconut Chicken

This Spicy Brazilian Coconut Chicken recipe reflects Brazilâ€™s rich culinary traditions, blending African and tropical influences. The spicy seasoning balanced with smooth coconut milk brings comfort and warmth to your table, making it perfect for both family dinners and special gatherings.

1 teaspoon cumin
1 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1 teaspoon turmeric
1 teaspoon ground coriander
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
4 chicken breasts
3 tablespoons olive oil
1 onion, chopped
1 jalapeÃ±o, chopped
1 tablespoon ginger, chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tablespoons lemon juice
14 oz. coconut milk
2 tablespoons parsley, chopped

Directions:
1. Mix spices and coat chicken.
2. In skillet, heat oil and cook chicken 6-8 min per side.
3. Set chicken aside.
4. Add oil, sautÃ© onion, jalapeÃ±o, ginger, garlic 5 min.
5. Add tomatoes, lemon juice, cook 5 min.
6. Pour in coconut milk, simmer 5 min.
7. Return chicken to pan, cook on low 5 min.
8. Garnish with parsley.

Prep Time: 10 min
Kcal: 410</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02JBgHzxQynHu9bvRc8g7DTFkSYC9nqWEJeZ56149nFKMbJA69zYY9yuR4Jzk2udGMl&amp;id=61564994772401" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crispy Poblano Chicken Tacos with Avocado-JalapeÃ±o Salsa

Ingredients:
For the tacos:

1Â½ lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs

2 tablespoons olive oil

1Â½ teaspoons chili powder

1 teaspoon cumin

1 teaspoon smoked paprika

1 teaspoon salt

Â½ teaspoon black pepper

2 garlic cloves, minced

2 tablespoons chopped cilantro (leaves and stems)

2 poblano peppers, deseeded and diced

1 small white onion, thinly sliced

6â€“8 corn tortillas

2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese

Shredded lettuce, for serving (optional)

Lime wedges, for serving (optional)

For the avocado-jalapeÃ±o salsa:

1 large avocado

1 medium jalapeÃ±o, deseeded and chopped

Â½ cup water

Â¼ cup chopped cilantro (leaves and stems)

1 tablespoon white vinegar

1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

Make the salsa: In a food processor or blender, combine avocado, jalapeÃ±o, water, cilantro, vinegar, and salt. Blend until smooth and creamy. Chill in the fridge while you prep the tacos.

Bake the chicken: Preheat the oven to 400Â°F. Toss chicken thighs with olive oil, spices, garlic, cilantro, poblano peppers, and onion. Spread in a greased baking dish and bake for 20â€“22 minutes, until chicken is cooked through (internal temp of 165Â°F) and veggies are soft.

Shred and mix: Use two forks to shred the chicken right in the pan. Mix everything together so the juices coat the meat and veggies.

Prep the tortillas: Increase oven to 425Â°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Lay out tortillas, spray one side with cooking spray, flip them over, and bake for 2â€“3 minutes to soften.

Assemble the tacos: On one half of each tortilla, layer shredded cheese, the chicken mixture, and a bit more cheese. Fold over and press gently to seal.

Bake until crispy: Bake the filled tacos for 15â€“17 minutes, or until golden and crispy with melted cheese inside.

Serve: Serve hot with avocado-jalapeÃ±o salsa drizzled on top or on the side. Add shredded lettuce and lime wedges if you'd like.

Notes:

If tortillas crack while folding, warm them a little longer first.

Parchment paper helps prevent sticking and makes cleanup easy.

The salsa can be made ahead and kept in the fridge for 2â€“3 days.

Swap the chicken for sautÃ©ed mushrooms and black beans for a vegetarian version.

x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Mediterranean Ground Beef Stir Fry 

Ingredients:

For the Stir Fry:
    â€¢ 1 lb lean ground beef (90% or leaner)
    â€¢ 1 tbsp olive oil
    â€¢ 1 small red onion, diced
    â€¢ 2 cloves garlic, minced
    â€¢ 1 small zucchini, diced
    â€¢ 1 red bell pepper, diced
    â€¢ Â½ cup cherry tomatoes, halved
    â€¢ â…“ cup Kalamata olives, sliced
    â€¢ 1 tsp dried oregano
    â€¢ Â½ tsp smoked paprika
    â€¢ Â½ tsp ground cumin
    â€¢ Â¼ tsp red pepper flakes (optional)
    â€¢ Salt &amp; black pepper, to taste
    â€¢ Â¼ cup crumbled feta cheese
    â€¢ 1 tbsp lemon juice
    â€¢ 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped

Optional Serving Ideas:
    â€¢ Cooked quinoa or rice
    â€¢ Pita bread or naan
    â€¢ Lettuce wraps for a low-carb option

Instructions:

    1. Heat the Oil:
â—¦ In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium heat.
    2. Cook the Beef:
â—¦ Add ground beef and cook for 5â€“6 minutes, breaking it apart with a spatula until browned.
â—¦ Drain excess fat if necessary.
    3. SautÃ© Aromatics:
â—¦ Add diced onion and minced garlic to the skillet.
â—¦ Cook for 2 minutes until fragrant.
    4. Add Veggies &amp; Spices:
â—¦ Stir in zucchini, red bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, olives, oregano, paprika, cumin, and red pepper flakes.
â—¦ Cook for another 5â€“6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables soften.
    5. Finish with Lemon &amp; Feta:
â—¦ Turn off the heat and stir in lemon juice and crumbled feta cheese.
    6. Garnish &amp; Serve:
â—¦ Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve warm over your choice of quinoa, rice, pita, or lettuce wraps.

Servings: 4
Prep Time: 10 minutes
Cook Time: 15 minutes</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/878325880467102/permalink/1185562823076738/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Balsamic Caprese Grilled Flank Steak Recipe
Servings: 4-6
Prep Time: 15 minutes
Cook Time: 12-15 minutes
Total Time: 27-30 minutes
Ingredients:
- 1 lb flank steak
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 8 oz fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 2 tablespoons balsamic glaze (or reduced balsamic vinegar)
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. *Preheat the Grill*: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. *Marinate the Flank Steak*: In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper. Rub the mixture all over the flank steak.
3. *Grill the Flank Steak*: Grill the flank steak for 5-7 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Let it rest for 5 minutes before slicing it thinly against the grain.
4. *Assemble the Caprese*: Arrange the sliced mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, and chopped basil leaves on a large platter or individual plates.
5. *Drizzle with Balsamic Glaze*: Drizzle the balsamic glaze over the Caprese salad.
6. *Serve with Grilled Flank Steak*: Slice the grilled flank steak and serve it with the Caprese salad.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, cubed
1 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp garlic powder

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/878325880467102/permalink/1185462746420079/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crab Rangoon Bombs ğŸ¦€
INGREDIENTS:
1 package (8 ounces) cream cheese, softened
1 cup cooked crab meat, finely chopped
1/4 cup green onions, finely chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
1 teaspoon soy sauce
1/2 teaspoon black pepper
24 wonton wrappers
Oil for frying
Sweet chili sauce, for dipping
DIRECTIONS:
In a bowl, mix together cream cheese, crab meat, green onions, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, and black pepper until well combined.
Place a wonton wrapper on a flat surface. Spoon about 1 tablespoon of the crab mixture into the center of the wrapper. Moisten the edges of the wrapper with water, then bring the corners together and twist to seal, forming a "bomb."
Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Fry the crab bombs in batches, turning occasionally, until they are golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
Serve hot with sweet chili sauce for dipping.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div class="x14vqqas"><div class="x6s0dn4 x78zum5"><div aria-hidden="true" class="html-div xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x1n2onr6 x1vqgdyp x1fns5xo"><div class=""><span class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/watch/?ref=saved&amp;v=1103095881582109" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Tuscan Beef Pasta âœ¨

This 30-minute, one-pot pasta is rich, creamy, and packed with flavorâ€”perfect for a busy weeknight!

Ingredients:
 â€¢ 12 oz Campanelle pasta
 â€¢ 1 lb ground beef (80/20)
 â€¢ 1 medium onion, diced
 â€¢ 6 garlic cloves, minced
 â€¢ 2 cups spinach, packed
 â€¢ 1/3 cup sun-dried tomatoes, roughly chopped
 â€¢ 2 tbsp tomato paste
 â€¢ 1 tbsp oil from sun-dried tomatoes
 â€¢ 2 tbsp butter
 â€¢ 2 cups milk
 â€¢ 2 cups beef broth
 â€¢ 1 cup Parmesan cheese, freshly grated
 â€¢ 2 tsp garlic powder
 â€¢ 2 tsp onion powder
 â€¢ 2 tsp Italian seasoning
 â€¢ 1 tsp paprika
 â€¢ 1/2 tsp black pepper
 â€¢ 2 tsp pink salt

Instructions:

1. Brown the beef: In a deep skillet or pot, cook ground beef over medium-high heat with 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp salt, and 1/2 tsp black pepper. Break it into small pieces and cook for 5 minutes.

2. SautÃ© the aromatics: Add onion, garlic, butter, sun-dried tomatoes, oil from the tomatoes, and tomato paste. Cook for 5 minutes until fragrant.

3. Cook the pasta: Stir in pasta, beef broth, milk, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, and 1 1/2 tsp salt. Spread pasta evenly in the pot. Bring to a simmer, cover, and cook for 10-12 minutes on medium-low heat (stir at 10 minutes and check for doneness).

4. Finish &amp; serve: Stir in spinach until wilted. Remove from heat and mix in Parmesan cheese. Serve and enjoy!

class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487870745_122213586350245645_2656916143697259410_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=107&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=pVRLp90RKHUQ7kNvwHE_Tc_&amp;_nc_oc=Adnd7uNKfKrojqypwI9en8RR3tyAhSPudPYH5EOOP_0U1rr_tlXW97ZbWMOrFn6uE8HIy4GOQAGsba4qHv7Iz92Z&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=oNwf_2lNG87RAhEcLM7fCA&amp;oh=00_AfN4sD9nJ5v0yi4zdfoUla703fV16LW2rpTZ8ZYyes55-g&amp;oe=6846D0F7"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0knP6QJLdCny2hYSJFfk8si6qfTqhMVh2451YuBvm9NnqvUfDbTecpwZEx7o3AZn8l&amp;id=61557369375357" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Keto JalapeÃ±o Popper Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground beef
- 8 oz cream cheese, softened
- 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- 4 oz canned diced jalapeÃ±os, drained (or fresh jalapeÃ±os, diced)
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise
- 1 tsp garlic powder
- 1 tsp onion powder
- 1/2 tsp paprika
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 cup chopped green onions (for garnish)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
2. In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned. Drain any excess fat.
3. In a mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix until smooth.
4. Stir in the diced jalapeÃ±os, half of the cheddar cheese, and half of the mozzarella cheese into the cream cheese mixture.
5. Add the cooked ground beef to the mixture and stir until well combined.
6. Transfer the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish and spread it evenly.
7. Top with the remaining cheddar and mozzarella cheeses.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
9. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes
Kcal: 360 kcal | Servings: 6 servings

style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crockpot Beef Tips &amp; Noodlesâ€”OMG, DONâ€™T MISS THIS RECIPE! 

Ingredients:

 â€¢ 1 lb stew meat

 â€¢ 1 pack Lipton onion soup mix

 â€¢ 1 pack brown gravy mix

 â€¢ 1 can cream of mushroom (10.5 oz)

 â€¢ 1 small can mushrooms

 â€¢ 1 can beef broth (use the can from cream of mushroom)

 â€¢ Egg noodles

Instructions:

 Dump all ingredients (except noodles) into the crockpot and mix.

 Cook on low for 8 hours.

 When done, cook noodles and serve.

 For more meat, use 2 lbs with the same measurements.

Enjoy this easy, flavorful meal! 2 cups cherry tomatoes halved
1 hass avocado cubed

15 ounces marinated artichoke hearts one can or jar, quartered

1/4 cup minced parsley

1 tablespoon Dijon mustard
2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice

x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0xzpxf1JdY6NvqSdpsAmHiU4djqcwRx8F1b2nRrECAuSSVZa8MpGSLSHTPbPs8L3Ll&amp;id=61562883100833" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488805349_122150599976429436_1258930943444556592_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=109&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=br04-pFVTAQQ7kNvwGlplNt&amp;_nc_oc=AdlW955aUlBeDpBnCjBRcNG9NLP_QwDCPlFQiamQBBi4td2OQ4TerWCgR7z9XY_Fy2qq0Q8maBRfSbY4Kp0sVdOk&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=oNwf_2lNG87RAhEcLM7fCA&amp;oh=00_AfNuBQ2cILkBLW_hF8AyVGkYswbEFLhRcyLeQ2-HvZoyHA&amp;oe=6846E2FB"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0xzpxf1JdY6NvqSdpsAmHiU4djqcwRx8F1b2nRrECAuSSVZa8MpGSLSHTPbPs8L3Ll&amp;id=61562883100833" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Beijing Beef

Recipe

Ingredients:

For the Beef:

1 lb flank steak, thinly sliced against the grain

1 egg

1/2 cup cornstarch

1/4 cup flour

Salt and pepper, to taste

Vegetable oil, for frying

For the Sauce:

1/4 cup ketchup

2 tablespoons hoisin sauce

2 tablespoons soy sauce

2 tablespoons rice vinegar

1 tablespoon oyster sauce

2 tablespoons brown sugar

1 teaspoon sesame oil

1 teaspoon garlic, minced

1 teaspoon fresh ginger, minced

1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes (optional)

For the Stir Fry:

1 red bell pepper, sliced

1 green bell pepper, sliced

1 small onion, sliced

1 tablespoon vegetable oil

Directions:

In a bowl, whisk together egg, salt, pepper, cornstarch, and flour. Toss in the sliced beef until fully coated.

Heat vegetable oil in a deep skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Fry the beef in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.

In a small bowl, whisk all sauce ingredients together. Set aside.

In a clean wok or large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and stir-fry the bell peppers and onions for 2-3 minutes until crisp-tender.

Add the sauce to the vegetables and bring to a simmer. Cook until slightly thickened, about 2 minutes.

Add the crispy beef to the skillet and toss until evenly coated in the sauce.

Serve hot over steamed white rice or noodles.

Prep Time: 20 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 35 minutes

Kcal: 480 kcal | Servings: 4 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02jeXX6sLMxokHrjdV7FArdCmgMD5XHcjPhNeXXFDGU258qtzSGzRZxJ4Ayo2Dz1dMl&amp;id=61564711302637" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Chicken Pesto Pasta with Garlic Roasted Cherry Tomatoes, Toasted Pine Nuts, and Basil Pesto

Ingredients:
12 oz penne or rigatoni pasta

2 tbsp olive oil

2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cubed

Salt and pepper to taste

1 tsp Italian seasoning

2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved

3 cloves garlic, minced

Â½ cup basil pesto (store-bought or homemade)

Â¾ cup heavy cream

Â¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

Â¼ cup toasted pine nuts

Fresh basil leaves, for garnish

Directions:
Roast Tomatoes: Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Toss cherry tomatoes and garlic with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes until blistered and fragrant.

Cook Pasta: While tomatoes roast, cook pasta in salted water according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.

Cook Chicken: In a large skillet, heat remaining olive oil over medium heat. Season chicken with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning. SautÃ© until golden and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes.

Make Sauce: Reduce heat to low. Add pesto, heavy cream, and Parmesan to the skillet. Stir until smooth and combined.

Combine: Add the cooked pasta and roasted tomatoes to the skillet. Toss everything together until well coated.

Finish &amp; Serve: Sprinkle with toasted pine nuts and garnish with fresh basil. Serve warm with extra Parmesan if desired.

Prep Time: 15 minutes Cooking Time: 20 minutes Total Time: 35 minutes Kcal: 520 per serving Servings: 4 servings

V 6.1 --ar 4:5</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">GARLIC BUTTER SHRIMP SCAMPI LASAGNA ğŸ¦ğŸ§„ğŸ§€

Decadent layers of shrimp, creamy garlic butter, and melted cheese â€” a seafood twist on a comfort classic.

ğŸ“‹ Ingredients:

9 lasagna noodles

1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

4 tablespoons unsalted butter

4 cloves garlic, minced

1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)

1 cup heavy cream

1 cup grated Parmesan cheese

2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese

1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped

Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©&zwj;ğŸ³ Instructions:

1ï¸âƒ£ Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2ï¸âƒ£ In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper flakes; sautÃ© for 1â€“2 minutes until fragrant.
3ï¸âƒ£ Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 3â€“4 minutes until pink and opaque.
4ï¸âƒ£ Stir in heavy cream and half of the Parmesan cheese. Mix until creamy and well blended, then remove from heat.
5ï¸âƒ£ In a 9x13-inch baking dish, spread a thin layer of shrimp mixture. Add 3 lasagna noodles, then layer with half the remaining shrimp mixture, half the mozzarella, and a sprinkle of parsley.
6ï¸âƒ£ Repeat layers, ending with noodles on top. Spread remaining shrimp mixture over the top layer and finish with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan.
7ï¸âƒ£ Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake another 15 minutes until bubbly and golden.
8ï¸âƒ£ Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Garnish with fresh parsley.

â± Preparation time: 20 minutes
â± Cooking time: 40 minutes
â± Total time: 1 hour
ğŸ”¥ Calories: ~550 kcal per serving
ğŸ½ Servings: 6 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0pJAgiUg5YHESGHCLHhtXMq97TG231BVkZ3pBNJRUdwWLJxpgephkBN5E4XVtedFql&amp;id=61571286411500" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Italian Sausage and Pepper Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 pound Italian sausage
- 1 onion, diced
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 1 green bell pepper, sliced
- 1 yellow bell pepper, sliced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 can diced tomatoes
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F.
2. In a large skillet, cook Italian sausage until browned. Add in onion, bell peppers, and garlic, and cook until vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in diced tomatoes and season with salt and pepper.
4. Transfer sausage and pepper mixture to a casserole dish and top with shredded mozzarella cheese.
5. Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/KinsleyRecipes/posts/pfbid0mLAKN3KwWwwoCrB6iB5EtME4znwHB89RpUW3W5MPqZQ6SoEW2PzS94wMGyX6D4F4l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Vegetarian Pasta Salad ğŸ…ğŸ¥‘
This Vegetarian Pasta Salad is a fresh and flavorful twist on the classic BLT-inspired dish. Packed with juicy cherry tomatoes, creamy avocado, and a vibrant avocado-ranch dressing, itâ€™s a light and satisfying meal perfect for picnics, potlucks, or a quick lunch.
________________________________________
Recipe Overview
â€¢ Prep Time: 30 minutes
â€¢ Cook Time: 10 minutes
â€¢ Total Time: 40 minutes
â€¢ Servings: 6â€“8
â€¢ Cuisine: American
â€¢ Skill Level: Easy
________________________________________
Ingredients
Salad
â€¢ 1 (16-ounce) package rotini pasta
â€¢ Â½ teaspoon salt
â€¢ Â½ teaspoon pepper
â€¢ 1 (0.75-ounce) packet fresh dill (finely chopped)
â€¢ 6 cups shredded romaine lettuce
â€¢ 2Â½ cups halved cherry tomatoes
â€¢ 1 cup thinly sliced red onion
â€¢ 1 large avocado (diced)
Avocado-Ranch Dressing
â€¢ 2 small avocados
â€¢ Â½ cup low-fat buttermilk
â€¢ Â½ cup mayo
â€¢ 2 large lemons (zested and juiced)
â€¢ 1Â½ teaspoons dried parsley
â€¢ 1Â½ teaspoons onion powder
â€¢ 1Â½ teaspoons garlic powder
â€¢ Salt and pepper (to taste)
________________________________________
Instructions
Prepare the Pasta
1. Cook the rotini pasta according to package instructions in well-salted water.
2. Drain the pasta but do not rinse it. Cover and refrigerate, tossing occasionally, until fully cooled.
Prep the Veggies
1. Finely chop the fresh dill and set aside Â¼ cup for the dressing.
2. Shred the romaine lettuce and ensure itâ€™s completely dry.
3. Halve the cherry tomatoes, thinly slice the red onion, and dice the avocado.
Make the Dressing
1. Zest the lemons to get Â½ teaspoon zest and juice them to get Â¼ cup lemon juice.
2. Mash the avocados to measure 1Â¼ cups flesh.
3. Add avocado flesh, buttermilk, mayo, lemon zest, lemon juice, parsley, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to a blender.
4. Blend until smooth. The dressing will be thick.
Assemble the Salad
1. In a large bowl, toss the cooled pasta with the shredded lettuce.
2. Add cherry tomatoes, red onion, and diced avocado.
3. Scoop the dressing over the salad and add the remaining chopped dill.
4. Gently toss to combine. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper if needed.
________________________________________
Serving Suggestions
â€¢ Serve immediately for the best texture and flavor.
â€¢ Pair with garlic bread or a side of fresh fruit for a complete meal.
________________________________________
Tips
â€¢ Storage: Best enjoyed fresh, but leftovers can be stored in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 1 day.
â€¢ Make Ahead: Prepare the pasta and dressing in advance. Assemble just before serving.
â€¢ Variations: Add grilled vegetables, chickpeas, or crumbled feta cheese for extra flavor and protein.
________________________________________
This Vegetarian Pasta Salad is a light, refreshing, and delicious dish thatâ€™s perfect for any occasion! ğŸ…ğŸ¥‘

class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t51.75761-10/489314930_18495749962034711_4423758194405273953_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_p206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=109&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=282d23&amp;_nc_ohc=602vKQ1NkAoQ7kNvwExM0I9&amp;_nc_oc=Adn_2l_rbCkKqV9mywglOZgXAOweWjEhLbuVa_RttXGefov-dGb14OJUytWE4RqNisR-6JXUrlFydJ_sq-uzlTnx&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=DBrQf1BkmDwvcqSXNqZqRA&amp;oh=00_AfPii-gANslrCO2ZqvPpYiTThDQDsxl-dImFSAFTEF3zSA&amp;oe=6846BF95"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/watch/?ref=saved&amp;v=1718628025733361" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Cabbage wedges roast in the oven, then are slathered with a lemon- and garlic-infused butter that seeps into the crevices of each leaf.&nbsp;

Ingredients
 âƒ 1&nbsp;medium head&nbsp;green cabbage
 âƒ 2&nbsp;tablespoons&nbsp;extra-virgin olive oil
 âƒ 1 1/2&nbsp;teaspoons&nbsp;grated lemon zest
 âƒ 1&nbsp;tablespoon&nbsp;lemon juice
 âƒ 1/4&nbsp;teaspoon&nbsp;salt
 âƒ 5&nbsp;tablespoons&nbsp;unsalted butter
 âƒ 2&nbsp;teaspoons&nbsp;grated garlic
 âƒ 1&nbsp;teaspoon&nbsp;garlic salt
 âƒ 1&nbsp;teaspoon&nbsp;salt-free lemon-pepper seasoning
 âƒ 1/2&nbsp;teaspoon&nbsp;crushed red pepper
 âƒ Chopped fresh flat leaf parsley for garnish (optional) 
 âƒ Lemon&nbsp;wedges&nbsp;for serving (optional)

Directions
 1. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with foil; place in oven. Preheat the oven to 400Â°F. Remove any wilted or damaged leaves from cabbage. Cut the cabbage into 8 (1 1/4-inch) wedges, leaving the root end intact to help the wedges stay together.
 2. Brush both sides of the cabbage wedges with oil and lemon juice; sprinkle with salt.
 3. Remove the baking sheet from the oven; arrange the cabbage wedges on it in a single layer. Roast until tender and slightly browned, 40 to 45 minutes, flipping halfway through.
 4. Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat, about 1 minute. Stir in lemon zest, garlic, garlic salt and lemon-pepper. Spoon or brush the mixture evenly over both sides of the roasted cabbage (about 1 1/2 teaspoons per side). Return the cabbage wedges to the oven; roast for 5 minutes more.
 5. Sprinkle crushed red pepper evenly over the cabbage wedges. Garnish with parsley and serve with lemon wedges, if desired.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487604691_122155164068461661_5382078962203992524_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=dENvzAwH14MQ7kNvwEjcKqd&amp;_nc_oc=AdmIjRMnDf8QUMhsrSY8-gCd551xwv4cgAbukzuc0Nw36DE9AZGB_7FlW5e-oyjF52TVhaeoXAWb4LvdrZml6438&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=DBrQf1BkmDwvcqSXNqZqRA&amp;oh=00_AfMVhxDcT7B61G5LEwqv8wbAc6S6zik3tt1v0m38mQW-Zg&amp;oe=6846D0E8"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02Po1rowQhEhD959ForCZVFzNekj2r17xSrTryLLk9XNEiqwJ9xve4SJT3nBtVTjCpl&amp;id=61563849830964" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">The Best Taco Rice
Ingredients:
1 pound ground beef
1 packet taco seasoning
2 cups water
2 cups Minute Rice, uncooked
1 cup salsa
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook and crumble ground beef until browned. Drain any grease.
Add taco seasoning and water to the skillet. Stir well and bring to a boil.
Lower the heat, then add uncooked Minute Rice. Stir to combine.
Cover the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, or until the rice is fully tender.
Remove the lid and mix in salsa and cheddar cheese until thoroughly blended.
Serve hot and enjoy!
Servings: 4-6</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488851325_122213843024245645_8449463285101529751_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=105&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=nWJtCbjMLvMQ7kNvwEC1k67&amp;_nc_oc=AdlfIFbOVpooyJDE-6vNyd38PztDvflIRgiepAg41wZAjVDFQg_5_B6VKuuYR76gGfTbaZF65OKo4wY2AFuINb1d&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=DBrQf1BkmDwvcqSXNqZqRA&amp;oh=00_AfM6Hu3SwgcTB51EQVP6ITDJql7ad7LrFHLz7Y3sbanIPQ&amp;oe=6846E397"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0s9Be8i5YJkUPusZYG5oHcE5TJKSz6a4aR8ppSbZyTp3EXEDH6jJETnzGjPv7hpSql&amp;id=61557369375357" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crispy Bang Bang Salmon Bites

Ingredients:
For the Salmon Bites:
- 1 1/2 pounds salmon fillets (skin removed, cut into bite-sized pieces)
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon onion powder
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional, for extra heat)

For the Bang Bang Sauce:
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise
- 1/4 cup Thai sweet chili sauce
- 1 tablespoon sriracha sauce (adjust for preferred heat level)
- 1 tablespoon honey
- 1 tablespoon lime juice (freshly squeezed)

Optional Garnish:
- Fresh parsley or cilantro, chopped
- Green onions, sliced
- Sesame seeds

Directions:
Step 1: Prep the Salmon
Pat the salmon fillets dry with paper towels to ensure a crispy texture. Remove any skin and cut the salmon into 1-inch bite-sized cubes.
Place the salmon pieces in a large bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper (if using).
Toss gently to coat the salmon evenly with the seasoning.

Step 2: Make the Bang Bang Sauce
In a small mixing bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, Thai sweet chili sauce, sriracha, honey, and lime juice until smooth and creamy.
Taste and adjust the sauceâ€”add more sriracha for heat or honey for sweetness. Set aside.

Step 3: Cook the Salmon
Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat and add a small amount of olive oil to prevent sticking.
Once the oil is hot, add the salmon pieces in a single layer, making sure not to overcrowd the pan. Work in batches if needed.

Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 30 minutes | Servings: 4 servings | Kcal: 325 kcal

#salmonbites #seafoodlovers #bangbangsalmon #spicysweet #homemadesauce #healthyseafood #easyrecipe #partyfood #glutenfree #dairyfree #pescatarian #fishlover #weeknightdinner #tastyfish #foodphotography</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">âœ¨Street Corn Chicken Casseroleâœ¨DELICIOUS!!

In a casserole dish add:
1 block of softened cream cheese
About 2 cups of shredded cooked chicken (I used fajita blend shredded chicken from Walmart)
1 cup of sour cream
3 cans of corn (I used the southwest blend)
2 cups shredded fiesta blend cheese
Season with a 2-3 tsps each of chili powder, onion powder, garlic powder, and slap your mama seasoning
Mix well
Top with grated Parmesan cheese around 1/2 a cup
Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until a bit golden and bubbly
Enjoy!!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0xvgG7JdCFtkxNSiGfFbT11Dp2aftoFPMRFdnGQNgEXepUoYhVtkDmbhGmfr9czhvl&amp;id=61557696719506" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crispy Bang Bang Chicken Recipe for Delicious Dinners

Discover the ultimate Crispy Bang Bang Chicken recipe with spicy sauce. Perfectly crispy chicken for your dinner table.

Ingredients

4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 cup panko breadcrumbs
1/2 cup mayonnaise
2 tablespoons sweet chili sauce
1 tablespoon honey
1 tablespoon Sriracha sauce
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1 teaspoon paprika
Salt and pepper to taste
Vegetable oil for frying

Directions

In a shallow dish, combine the panko breadcrumbs, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, sweet chili sauce, honey, and Sriracha sauce until well combined.
Take each chicken breast and dip it into the mayonnaise mixture, ensuring it is fully coated.
Next, roll the chicken in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing gently to make sure the crumbs adhere to the chicken.
In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. Carefully place the coated chicken breasts into the skillet and cook for about 6-8 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy.
Once cooked, transfer the chicken to a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
Serve your Crispy Bang Bang Chicken hot and enjoy the explosion of flavors!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n aria-hidden="true" style="background-image: url(&quot;https://static.xx.fbcdn.net/rsrc.php/v4/yF/r/aI2ybVCJ0LG.png&quot;); background-position: 0px -567px; background-size: auto; width: 16px; height: class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl
