xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t51.75761-10/484118639_18492773488003907_8736576701778583829_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_p206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=282d23&amp;_nc_ohc=sBm1l3mxx_kQ7kNvwG7ido2&amp;_nc_oc=AdnkNWZKyowou1Kvt_vCaSFpl3AIoOfDcIQXLdBaIuSh8uwzYnqt0wvAn0zqtOAXrjxGGWAqhRtsF1fL2_iDbc_s&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=DBrQf1BkmDwvcqSXNqZqRA&amp;oh=00_AfM2gagy88Tmv6bbVAt4NH57-oRpdfQJisctXv_rCHKehA&amp;oe=6846C41B"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/watch/?ref=saved&amp;v=1729434217950535" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Greek Stuffed Cabbage Rolls with Avgolemono Sauce&NoBreak; - you will want to save this recipe. &NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
This comforting and flavorful dish features tender cabbage leaves filled with a fragrant mixture of ground beef, herbs, and rice. Perfect for a hearty and satisfying meal, this traditional Greek recipe brings warmth and depth to every bite.&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
Ingredients for the Cabbage Rolls&NoBreak;:&NoBreak;
â€¢ 1 large cabbage&NoBreak;
â€¢ 450g ground beef&NoBreak;
â€¢ 1 small red onion, finely chopped&NoBreak;
â€¢ 4 sprigs green onion, finely chopped&NoBreak;
â€¢ 3 tsp salt, divided&NoBreak;
â€¢ 1 bunch fresh dill, finely chopped&NoBreak;
â€¢ 1 bunch fresh mint, finely chopped&NoBreak;
â€¢ 1 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped&NoBreak;
â€¢ 4 cloves garlic, minced&NoBreak;
â€¢ 1 cup (230g) rice&NoBreak;
â€¢ 3 tbsp olive oil&NoBreak;
â€¢ Freshly ground black pepper, to taste&NoBreak;
â€¢ Chicken stock (enough to just cover the rolls)&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
Ingredients for the Avgolemono Sauce:&NoBreak;
â€¢ 4 egg yolks&NoBreak;
â€¢ Zest of 1 lemon&NoBreak;
â€¢ Juice of 3 lemons&NoBreak;
â€¢ 2 tbsp cornstarch&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
Servings 4-6&NoBreak;
 Prep Time 30 minutes&NoBreak;
 Cook Time 60 minutes&NoBreak;
 Total Time 1 hour 30 minutes&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
Method:&NoBreak;
1. Carefully remove the core of the cabbage.&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
2. Bring a large pot of water to a boil and place the whole cabbage in, stem-side down. Boil for 10-15 minutes until the leaves soften slightly.&NoBreak;
Remove the cabbage from the pot and carefully separate the leaves. Let them cool slightly.&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
3. Prepare the Filling&NoBreak;: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, red onion, green onions, 2 tsp of salt, dill, mint, parsley, garlic, rice, olive oil, and black pepper. Mix well and knead until thoroughly combined.&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
4. Assemble the Rolls&NoBreak;: Lay out the cabbage leaves on a work surface. Cut out the thick center rib from each leaf. If a leaf is too large, cut it in half.&NoBreak;
Place about 1 tbsp of filling in the center of each leaf. Fold the sides over the filling and roll tightly into a log shape.&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
5. Pour the avgolemono sauce over the plated cabbage rolls.&NoBreak;
Serve warm, garnished with extra fresh herbs if desired.&NoBreak;
&NoBreak;
A great addition to a family style meal. Be sure to tag us in your cooking adventures. &NoBreak;
.&NoBreak;
.&NoBreak;
.&NoBreak;

x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Reel â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486608807_122197584950251312_4234898654515874219_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=YbrLezQurdMQ7kNvwHbK5_h&amp;_nc_oc=Adm49-lpbYPoApdG8yqRKx5BgzjOE_Rnkt9AVDEWIEGjbZ4y-8NCrwUy9liZ3XDHCSUUu6mLRSvBstuWF99osjGk&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=DBrQf1BkmDwvcqSXNqZqRA&amp;oh=00_AfPTUXBYoj_SfqNIlb_KqoivNJMrcdIG92SY2lOLvJkfwg&amp;oe=6846E709"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/EatsRecipeswithElyna/posts/pfbid0tgQftHhQnXADFv2LQUnJYPoad2gWwFDntkeLinYxjf3JruLAuSNaUYgXckApesKRl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ—ğŸ’° Million Dollar Chicken Casserole ğŸ’°ğŸ—  
A creamy, cheesy, and comforting dish that combines tender chicken with a rich sauce and a crunchy topping, perfect for family dinners or potlucks.  

Ingredients:  
3 cups cooked chicken, shredded or diced  
1 can (10.5 oz) condensed cream of chicken soup  
1 cup sour cream  
1/2 cup mayonnaise  
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese  
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese  
1 sleeve Ritz crackers, crushed  
1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted  
Salt and pepper to taste  
Chopped parsley, for garnish (optional)  

Directions:  
Preheat the Oven: Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.  
Mix the Base: In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, and mayonnaise. Mix until well blended.  
Spread the Mixture: Spread the mixture evenly into the prepared baking dish.  
Add the Cheeses: Sprinkle the shredded cheddar and mozzarella cheeses evenly over the top of the chicken mixture.  
Prepare the Cracker Topping: In a small bowl, combine the crushed Ritz crackers with the melted butter. Mix until the crackers are evenly coated.  
Top the Casserole: Sprinkle the cracker mixture over the top of the cheese layer.  
Bake the Casserole: Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the casserole is bubbly and the top is golden brown.  
Cool and Garnish: Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired.  

Nutritional Information:  
â° Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Total Time: 45 minutes  
ğŸ”¥ Kcal: 350 kcal per serving | ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6 servings

x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488245501_122146046066581860_8796900600331091426_n.jpg?stp=c0.90.720.720a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=MZVrWjDvI40Q7kNvwE1IhYK&amp;_nc_oc=AdlP3hjuaE5Or8VnT06a_MK72nNAc3pzmYX_rvEgYr03Fwqf6MuO_jPNh-JbRdApx89tWbn2lgN3zyGXqxmlAj78&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=DBrQf1BkmDwvcqSXNqZqRA&amp;oh=00_AfOn2-8DUzksd1JUoPS_DbIVC5hNSyjpSjXT4PKOPgNNag&amp;oe=6846CAEE"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1647858309385507/permalink/1824212768416726/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Strawberry Cucumber Salad ğŸ¥’ğŸ“

Ingredients:
1 1/2 pounds strawberries, quartered 
4 cups cucumbers, chopped 
1 small red onion, chopped 
8 ounces feta cheese, cubed 
1/2 cup fresh mint, minced 
1/3 cup olive oil 
1/3 cup golden balsamic vinegar 
2 tablespoons lemon juice 
1/4 teaspoon pepper 

Instructions:

Prepare the Ingredients:
Quarter the strawberries.
Chop the cucumbers and red onion.
Cube the feta cheese.
Mince the fresh mint.

Make the Dressing:
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, golden balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, and pepper.

Combine and Toss:
In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, cucumbers, red onion, feta cheese, and fresh mint.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/974655921060545/permalink/1168643101661825/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487473753_4130513800604863_427101260473450837_n.jpg?stp=c0.90.720.720a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=BmZ4OkM37RAQ7kNvwFtq33y&amp;_nc_oc=AdlGjpPgLKBmQWx0SieIYng4UTRU2f4-McgaPrybpXMwvaUbTaqmdnbqwxTPWO5W_jdmIh0h8A7WxEwDv1wxGyOF&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=U2BeAw5_cYdm938PtUk_6w&amp;oh=00_AfNwOX2GOENliKDrnyxN5_D5c3gpm762FrAxM7nnhHlMDg&amp;oe=6846CA67"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/974655921060545/permalink/1168643101661825/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Oven-Baked Cabbage Burgers

If you're looking for a unique, healthy burger alternative, these oven-baked cabbage burgers are a must-try. Roasted cabbage provides a slightly sweet, crispy base, complementing the juicy, seasoned beef patties. Topped with tomato sauce and melted cheese, this dish is both satisfying and nutritious. Whether you're following a keto diet or just want a lighter meal, these cabbage burgers are an easy and flavorful option.

1 head green cabbage, cut into 1-inch slices
1 lb lean ground beef
1/2 cup tomato sauce (or ketchup)
1/2 cup shredded cheese (mozzarella, Monterey Jack), divided
1/2 tsp salt and black pepper
1/2 tsp red chili pepper flakes
1 tsp grated garlic
1/2 cup chopped green onion
1/2 cup chopped parsley

Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400ÂºF (200ÂºC). Arrange cabbage slices on a baking sheet, brush with oil, and season with salt and pepper.
2. Roast for 10 minutes until slightly tender.
3. In a bowl, combine ground beef with garlic, green onion, parsley, red chili flakes, half the cheese, salt, and pepper. Shape into four patties.
4. Top each cabbage slice with tomato sauce, cheese, a beef patty, and another sprinkle of cheese.
5. Bake for 10-12 minutes until the cheese melts and patties are cooked through. Serve hot.

Prep Time: 12 min
Kcal: 310</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">One-Pan Taco Zucchini Skillet ğŸŒ®ğŸ¥’
Ingredients:

1 lb ground beef

1 small onion, diced

2 cloves garlic, minced

2 medium zucchinis, diced

1 bell pepper, diced

1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, drained

1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce

1 tbsp taco seasoning

Â½ tsp salt

Â½ tsp black pepper

Â½ cup shredded cheddar cheese

Â¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro (optional)

1 avocado, sliced (optional)

Instructions:
1ï¸âƒ£ In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned. Drain excess grease if needed.
2ï¸âƒ£ Add the diced onion and garlic, cooking for 2-3 minutes until fragrant.
3ï¸âƒ£ Stir in the diced zucchini and bell pepper, cooking for another 5 minutes until slightly tender.
4ï¸âƒ£ Add the diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, salt, and black pepper. Stir well to combine.
5ï¸âƒ£ Simmer for 5-7 minutes until the vegetables are fully cooked and flavors meld.
6ï¸âƒ£ Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over the top, cover, and let it melt for about 2 minutes.
7ï¸âƒ£ Garnish with fresh cilantro and sliced avocado if desired.

A flavorful, low-carb taco-inspired skillet that's quick, easy, and delicious! ğŸŒ®âœ¨</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Chicken &amp; Avocado Lettuce Wraps ğŸ¥¬ğŸ—ğŸ¥‘
Ingredients:

Large romaine lettuce leaves ğŸ¥¬

Cooked and shredded chicken breast ğŸ—

Diced avocado ğŸ¥‘

Cherry tomatoes, halved ğŸ…

Cooked bacon, crumbled ğŸ¥“ (optional)

Chopped fresh cilantro or parsley ğŸŒ¿

Fresh lemon or lime juice ğŸ‹

Salt &amp; pepper to taste ğŸ§‚

Instructions:

Lay out the lettuce leaves on a plate.

In a bowl, mix the chicken, avocado, tomatoes, and bacon.

Squeeze in some lemon or lime juice, add salt and pepper, and mix well.

Spoon the mixture into each lettuce leaf.

Top with chopped herbs and serve cold.

Tips:

Add a dollop of yogurt garlic sauce or ranch dressing for extra flavor ğŸ§„

Want a spicy kick? href="https://www.facebook.com/RecipesByEmily/posts/pfbid038Q18iGQJgk1Bku5coUWEcdHmWtEciNv4SnbrMHsqRSpcYCJgmZSdHgLjUXHgv3p5l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488600127_122219177456234928_5713908151885849669_n.jpg?stp=c0.120.960.960a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=105&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=sQfNYJrV_jgQ7kNvwGpwwK6&amp;_nc_oc=AdkOWOhPc2FMoVU83RtXRWZ76rT5Gtk-2eT-OJkqsA3YFo9vSv4FHarxA7NhMfSg1tw2-lzTgs-C2tDkyPGO52Y-&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=U2BeAw5_cYdm938PtUk_6w&amp;oh=00_AfNp75ZGz54ucleKEcuf9YtKJA-vVy2vv5tr39IT9tWmQA&amp;oe=6846C331"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/RecipesByEmily/posts/pfbid038Q18iGQJgk1Bku5coUWEcdHmWtEciNv4SnbrMHsqRSpcYCJgmZSdHgLjUXHgv3p5l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Halloumi Tray Bake with Pesto Rice and Roasted Vegetables

This hearty vegetarian tray bake brings together caramelized sweet potatoes, juicy cherry tomatoes, roasted mushrooms, and peppers for a comforting one-dish meal. Topped with crispy halloumi and paired with pesto-infused rice, it's a delicious option for a weeknight dinner that feels anything but ordinary.

2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-1.5 inch rounds
1 red pepper, sliced
150g (5 oz) mushrooms, sliced
1 red onion, cut into wedges
2 Tbsp olive oil
1 Tbsp balsamic glaze or vinegar
150g (5 oz) cherry tomatoes
250g (1 cup) prepared rice
3 Tbsp pesto
225g (8 oz) halloumi cheese, cut into 6 slices
Hummus, for topping

Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 200C / 390F. Oil a roasting dish and add sweet potatoes. Brush with oil and roast 20 mins.
2. Flip sweet potatoes. Add mushrooms, onion, pepper, and tomatoes. Drizzle with oil and balsamic.
3. Roast another 30 mins until veggies are charred and soft.
4. Heat rice and mix with pesto. Add to pan to fill spaces.
5. Add halloumi slices on top. Brush with oil.
6. Grill for 5 mins until halloumi is browned.
7. Serve with hummus.

Prep Time: 10 minutes
Kcal: 530</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488578732_617353934628213_5577557857573769998_n.jpg?stp=c0.120.960.960a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=x0fsaPXvCZ8Q7kNvwEGdSa-&amp;_nc_oc=Adkfncjfu0PCz3U-lL2zalH9RoP0SqjZQaR-Q1zYYuQiO1L4akYnpZaOqv2aZzS4O81SvuM-PZPZGfyh5l-hR78a&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=U2BeAw5_cYdm938PtUk_6w&amp;oh=00_AfOWzeIqfA-R5Z1HP8iDTByBzsJMqg81cyoQvFdbHZIaCg&amp;oe=6846EB2C"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid036eSN92919CxuLUKT7j5hdB9bx6fQgnMjhP7vurUszyy7N3AJXXHHYfRPVFWhFbNLl&amp;id=100090608353680" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Roasted Halloumi and Veggie Tray Bake with Pomegranate Drizzle

Inspired by the ease of sheet-pan dinners, this colorful tray bake brings together the salty bite of halloumi, a medley of root and sweet vegetables, and a cool minted yoghurt topping. It's a hearty vegetarian meal that's equal parts simple and satisfying.

A drizzle of olive oil
500g potatoes, chopped
2 bell peppers, chopped
2 red onions, in eighths
6 baby beets, halved
1 tsp paprika
2 tsp mixed herbs
1 tsp turmeric
Salt and pepper
100g cherry tomatoes
225g halloumi, torn
Pumpkin seeds, a handful
20ml balsamic vinegar
Â½ pomegranate seeds
100ml Greek yoghurt
1 tsp dried mint
1 garlic clove, minced
Juice of Â¼ lemon

Directions:
1 Heat oven to 180C (fan). Coat tray with olive oil.
2 Layer in potatoes, peppers, onions, and beetroot. Add seasoning and mix. Roast 45 min.
3 Remove, add balsamic, tomatoes, halloumi. Roast 10 more min.
4 Add pumpkin seeds, raise heat to 200C. Roast 5 min more.
5 Combine yoghurt, mint, garlic, lemon juice in bowl.
6 Serve roasted veggies with yoghurt and pomegranate seeds.

Prep Time: 10 minutes
Kcal: 530</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02Hjo7iABVbbMdq3RaJtvFu8jYjacMCrhRrENaz1VZCU4boSbuVr22gMkv5XrvUcvRl&amp;id=61562824363032" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Comforting Vegan Bourguignon: A Delicious Mushroom Stew Recipe ğŸŒ¿ğŸ¥”ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·

Ingredients:
For the Stew:
2 tablespoons / 30ml olive oil
1 lb / 450g mixed mushrooms (cremini, shiitake, button), thickly sliced or quartered
1 large onion, chopped
2 carrots, peeled and diced
2 celery stalks, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 tablespoons / 18g all-purpose flour (or gluten-free blend)
4 cups / 950ml rich vegetable broth
1 cup / 240ml water or additional broth
2 tablespoons / 30ml tomato paste
1 tablespoon / 15ml soy sauce or tamari
1 teaspoon / 3g dried thyme
1 bay leaf
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

For the Potato Cauliflower Mash:
1 lb / 450g potatoes (like Russet or Yukon Gold), peeled and cubed
1 medium head cauliflower, cut into florets (about 1 lb / 450g)
1/4 cup / 60ml unsweetened plant-based milk (almond, soy, oat)
2 tablespoons / 30ml olive oil or vegan butter
1-2 tablespoons / 5-10g nutritional yeast (optional, for cheesy flavor)
Salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
Stew:
1. Heat olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and slightly crispy, about 8-10 minutes. Remove mushrooms and set aside.
2. Add onion, carrots, and celery to the pot. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes. Add minced garlic and cook for another minute until fragrant.
3. Sprinkle the flour over the vegetables and stir constantly for 1 minute.
4. Gradually whisk in the vegetable broth and water, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom. Bring to a simmer.
5. Stir in the tomato paste, soy sauce (or tamari), thyme, and bay leaf. Return the cooked mushrooms to the pot.
6. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer gently for at least 30-40 minutes, or until vegetables are tender and the stew has thickened. Stir occasionally.
7. Remove the bay leaf. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Mash:
8. While the stew simmers, place the cubed potatoes and cauliflower florets in a large pot. Cover with cold water and add a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil and cook until very tender, about 15-20 minutes.
9. Drain the potatoes and cauliflower well. Return them to the pot or a large bowl.
10. Add the plant-based milk, olive oil (or vegan butter), nutritional yeast (if using), salt, and pepper. Mash until smooth and creamy using a potato masher or immersion blender.

Serving:
11. Serve the Vegan Bourguignon hot, spooned over generous servings of the potato cauliflower mash. Garnish with fresh parsley.

Recipe Information:
Preparation Time: 25 minutes | Cooking Time: 50-60 minutes | Total Time: 1 hour 15 minutes - 1 hour 25 minutes | Calories per Serving: Approx. 350-400 | Number of Servings: 4-6

xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487428953_630764629844643_4376497417254352530_n.jpg?stp=c0.90.720.720a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=103&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=KOe3p9xLyFEQ7kNvwFl_t3F&amp;_nc_oc=Adk75-tXxq39ZTeTuKLM7nyIK6ONBEwcYPGjWUbyyh-dxREzq7w5BL7f4jgGqn8g1S36J953MEWS2YVDgssF9RRs&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=U2BeAw5_cYdm938PtUk_6w&amp;oh=00_AfOnWSKOCKqEhuQ9fFUNhYTpY4ULjaDdJ7fQ8gXLfufuHQ&amp;oe=6846DE03"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/898738678610001/permalink/1223609809456218/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Vegetable FrittersğŸ¥’ğŸ¥•ğŸ¥¬ğŸ¥šğŸ§€
Crispy, colorful, veggie delight!â¤ï¸
Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup grated zucchiniğŸ¥’
â€¢ 1 cup grated carrotsğŸ¥•
â€¢ 1 cup chopped spinach (or any leafy green)ğŸ¥¬
â€¢ 1/2 cup all-purpose flour (you can use chickpea flour for a gluten-free option)
â€¢ 2 large eggsğŸ¥š
â€¢ 1 teaspoon garlic powderğŸ§„
â€¢ 1 teaspoon onion powderğŸ§…
â€¢ Salt and pepper to tasteğŸ§‚
â€¢ Olive oil for frying
â€¢ 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (optional)ğŸ§€
Instructions:
1. Start by grating the zucchini and carrots.
2. If using spinach, chop it finely.
3. Place the grated zucchini in a clean kitchen towel and squeeze out excess moisture.
4. In a large bowl, combine the grated zucchini, carrots, chopped spinach, flour, Parmesan cheese (if using), eggs, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
5. Mix everything until well combined.
6. In a large skillet, heat about 1/4 inch of oil over medium heat. You can test if the oil is hot enough by dropping a small amount of the batter into the oil; it should sizzle.
7. Drop spoonfuls of the vegetable mixture into the hot oil, flattening them slightly with the back of the spoon.
8. Fry for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy.
9. Do not overcrowd the pan; you may need to work in batches.
10. Once cooked, transfer the fritters to a plate lined with paper towels to drain excess oil.
11. Serve the fritters warm with a dipping sauce like yogurt, sour cream, or your favorite salsa.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/cook.withroyss/posts/pfbid0qk3Li8JzXZ7uq4iciDZBCCyECNgCKVuyoxJE6QZmDz36DzD7oSKTR87cizPu6CzMl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Fajita Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pound chicken breasts, cooked and shredded
1 packet (1 oz) fajita seasoning mix
1 bell pepper (any color), sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 cup cooked rice
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 cup sour cream
1/2 cup salsa
2 tablespoons olive oil
Directions:
Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. SautÃ© the bell pepper and onion until tender, about 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine shredded chicken, cooked rice, fajita seasoning, sour cream, salsa, sautÃ©ed vegetables, and half of the shredded cheeses. Mix well.
Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and spread evenly. Top with the remaining cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot, optionally garnished with chopped cilantro or a dollop of sour cream. This casserole pairs wonderfully with a side of tortilla chips or a fresh salad.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487995947_631104973143942_2695441037707315494_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=106&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=ELJyqkW8OtoQ7kNvwGzEB75&amp;_nc_oc=AdmMnG-89HqpXWl-NhHvmhEFnkkUBE6366KBQIh8vnSwy8-VNBf9qJPFoJYpwxvvhoikZL3po3TVfI_GjUjiLlfX&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=UHQz7ygL5UJqYiH8zdV2PQ&amp;oh=00_AfMCVWyXNA94Dpj7u9bkM1Yk7IpmcvTQ0SoEOTGAJ7Uvag&amp;oe=6846C268"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/898738678610001/permalink/1223946039422595/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Rich and Comforting Creamy Beef Shells CasseroleğŸ¥©ğŸ§€ğŸ…ğŸğŸ¥˜
Hearty, cheesy, comforting pasta bake!â¤ï¸
Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 lb (450 g) ground beefğŸ¥©
â€¢ 1 small onion, dicedğŸ§…
â€¢ 2 cloves garlic, mincedğŸ§„
â€¢ 2 cups (500 ml) beef broth
â€¢ 1 cup (240 ml) heavy cream
â€¢ 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoesğŸ…
â€¢ 2 cups (200 g) shell pastağŸ
1 cup (100 g) shredded cheddar cheeseğŸ§€
â€¢ 1 tablespoon olive oil
â€¢ 1 teaspoon dried basil
â€¢ 1 teaspoon dried oregano
â€¢ Salt and pepper to tasteğŸ§‚
â€¢ Fresh parsley for garnish (optional)
Directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add diced onion and minced garlic, cooking until the onion is translucent.
3. Add ground beef to the skillet, cooking until browned.
4. Drain any excess fat.
5. Stir in beef broth, heavy cream, diced tomatoes, dried basil, and dried oregano.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
7. Add shell pasta to the skillet, stirring to combine.
8. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
9. Stir in shredded cheddar cheese until melted and well incorporated.
10. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Garnish with fresh parsley if desired and serve warm.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">These Caprese Stuffed Garlic Butter Portobellos are bursting with flavor and are perfect for any occasion! You won't want to miss this recipe! ğŸ˜ğŸ…

- Caprese Stuffed Garlic Butter Portobellos

Ingredients:
- 4 large portobello mushrooms
- 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1 cup fresh mozzarella balls, halved
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze (optional)

Directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
2. Clean the portobello mushrooms and remove the stems. Place them on a baking sheet, gill side up.
3. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter with minced garlic, salt, and pepper. Brush this mixture over the mushrooms.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and basil. Season with salt and pepper.
5. Spoon the tomato and mozzarella mixture into each portobello cap, distributing evenly.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender and the cheese is melted.
7. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving, if desired.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 25 minutes | Total Time: 35 minutes  
Kcal: 290 kcal | Servings: 4 servings

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/cookingbylisaa/posts/pfbid0tfCzg4Pta71fvTgXAepAhPeAkP481KqC3pq8rdxYXkHierXg4tPGTb2RH7pf8qU4l" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Parmesan Italian Sausage Ditalini Soup ğŸ²ğŸ§€

A delicious, hearty soup with Creamy Parmesan Italian Sausage Ditalini Soup, featuring savory sausage, creamy broth, and the perfect bite of pasta â€“ this recipe is sure to please everyone.

Ingredients:

1 lb Italian sausage (mild or spicy) ğŸŒ­
1 onion, chopped ğŸ§…
3 garlic cloves, minced ğŸ§„
4 cups chicken broth ğŸ—
1 cup heavy cream ğŸ§´
1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese ğŸ§€
1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes ğŸ…
2 cups ditalini pasta ğŸ
1 tsp Italian seasoning ğŸŒ¿
Salt and pepper to taste ğŸ§‚
Fresh parsley, chopped ğŸŒ¿

Instructions:

Cook sausage: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the Italian sausage and cook until browned and crumbled, about 5-7 minutes.
Add onion and garlic: Add the chopped onion and garlic to the pot and cook for 3 more minutes until fragrant and softened.

Simmer the base: Pour in the chicken broth and diced tomatoes, bringing the mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Cook pasta: Stir in the ditalini pasta and cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the pasta is tender.

Make the soup creamy: Stir in the heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasoning. Let it simmer for another 2-3 minutes, until the soup is creamy and well combined.
Season and serve: Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper to taste. Top with fresh parsley and serve hot. Enjoy! ğŸ²ğŸ§€</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">This Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Shrimp with Spinach Pasta is a must-try for all pasta lovers! Creamy, savory, and oh-so-delicious! ğŸâ¤ï¸

Recipe:
- Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Shrimp with Spinach Pasta

Ingredients:
- 8 oz fettuccine or pasta of choice
- 1 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped
- 2 cups fresh spinach
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh basil, for garnish

Directions:
1. Cook the fettuccine according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and sautÃ© for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
3. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until they turn pink and opaque. Remove the shrimp and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the sun-dried tomatoes and spinach. Cook until the spinach is wilted.
5. Pour in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in the Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
6. Add the cooked shrimp back to the skillet, along with the drained pasta. Toss to combine and season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve immediately, garnished with fresh basil.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 25 minutes  
Kcal: 480 kcal | Servings: 4 servings

#seafood #italianfood #comfortfood #homemade #foodie #recipeoftheday

x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/7933861510016903/permalink/9448071745262531/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">One-Skillet Spicy Honey Steak &amp; Pasta
Ingredients:
1 pound steak, cut into strips
1 pound pasta (penne or rotini recommended)
1 red bell pepper, sliced
1 yellow bell pepper, sliced
1 red onion, sliced
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 cup honey
2 tablespoons soy sauce
1 tablespoon sriracha (or more, to taste)
1 teaspoon red pepper flakes
2 tablespoons olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)
Directions:
In a bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, sriracha, and red pepper flakes. Set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add steak strips and cook until browned, about 3-5 minutes. Remove steak from skillet and set aside.
Add bell peppers and red onion to the skillet. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
Add pasta and 4 cups of water to the skillet. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until pasta is cooked and water is absorbed, about 12-15 minutes. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking.
Stir in the honey-sriracha sauce and cooked steak. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0tJTVwYziBdxQXeMaBZoDeTEHdwb3o1gfjYhMPmfbxzTfEn1pM4iuNbAmC4v9foAWl&amp;id=61563394600163" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Fiery Chicken Ramen with Creamy Garlic Sauce ğŸ”¥ğŸœ
Thereâ€™s something about a steaming bowl of spicy, creamy ramen that just hits the spot. Itâ€™s cozy, bold, and packed with flavorâ€”exactly the kind of meal you crave after a long day. And the best part? Itâ€™s so easy to make at home.

This Fiery Chicken Ramen has everything you loveâ€”tender, caramelized chicken, rich garlicky broth, and perfectly slurpable noodles. A little spice, a little creaminessâ€¦ trust me, itâ€™s heaven in a bowl.

Letâ€™s do this!

What Youâ€™ll Need
For the Chicken
2 fresh chicken breasts, diced

2 tablespoons soy sauce

1 tablespoon chili sauce (go as spicy as you like!)

1 tablespoon honey (because balance is everything)

For the Ramen
2 packs instant ramen noodles

4 cups chicken broth

1 cup heavy cream

2 tablespoons minced garlic

1 teaspoon paprika

2 tablespoons olive oil

4 green onions, sliced

Salt &amp; pepper, to taste

Letâ€™s Make It!
Step 1: Marinate the Chicken
In a bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, chili sauce, and honey. Toss in the diced chicken, making sure every piece is coated in that bold, sweet heat. Let it sit for at least 30 minutesâ€”or longer, if you have the time. The longer, the better!

Step 2: Sear the Chicken
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook for 6-7 minutes, stirring occasionally. You want it golden brown and just a little caramelized. The aroma? Absolutely irresistible.

Step 3: Garlic &amp; Spice Time
Toss in the minced garlic and paprika, stirring for another minute. This is where the flavor really deepensâ€”your kitchen is about to smell amazing.

Step 4: Simmer the Broth &amp; Noodles
Pour in the chicken broth and bring it to a gentle boil. Add the ramen noodles and cook for 3 minutes, just until theyâ€™re tender. Theyâ€™ll soak up all that delicious, garlicky brothâ€”trust me, this is next-level ramen.

Step 5: Make It Creamy
Turn the heat to low and stir in the heavy cream. Let it simmer for 5 minutes until the broth is silky, rich, and just thick enough to coat your spoon.

Step 6: Serve &amp; Enjoy!
Ladle the ramen into bowls, top with fresh green onions, and dig in. The combination of spicy chicken, creamy broth, and fresh crunch is pure comfort food perfection.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/Katierecipes/posts/pfbid0UhQ96udz9EwZSnvZPsmAm2iJDrVir9JRRqb9px8fqyLAG8p58j2E11RB6kmJ5QYGl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Cajun Shrimp Pasta with Sausage

Ingredients:

For the Protein:
    â€¢ 1 lb large shrimp (peeled and deveined)
    â€¢ 6 oz andouille or smoked sausage (thinly sliced)

For the Pasta:
    â€¢ 10 oz fettuccine pasta (or your favorite pasta)

For the Sauce &amp; Veggies:
    â€¢ 2 tbsp olive oil
    â€¢ 1/2 yellow onion (thinly sliced)
    â€¢ 1 red bell pepper (thinly sliced)
    â€¢ 3 cloves garlic (minced)
    â€¢ 1 tsp Cajun seasoning (or Creole seasoning)
    â€¢ 1/2 tsp dried oregano
    â€¢ 1/2 cup crushed tomatoes
    â€¢ 1 cup chicken stock
    â€¢ 1/2 cup heavy cream 
    â€¢ 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
For Seasoning:
    â€¢ Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

Instructions:

    1. Prepare the Shrimp:
        â—¦ In a bowl, toss shrimp with Cajun seasoning, oregano, salt, and pepper.
        â—¦ Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. SautÃ© shrimp for 2â€“3 minutes per side, or until pink and lightly browned. Remove and set aside.
    2. Cook the Sausage:
        â—¦ In the same skillet, heat the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil. Add sliced sausage and brown on both sides. Remove and set aside.
    3. SautÃ© the Veggies:
        â—¦ Add onions, bell peppers, and garlic to the skillet. Cook for 5 minutes or until soft and fragrant.
    4. Make the Sauce:
        â—¦ Stir in crushed tomatoes and chicken stock. Bring to a simmer.
        â—¦ Add heavy cream (just 1/2 cup for a lighter texture) and Parmesan cheese. Stir until smooth and slightly thickened.
        â—¦ Taste and adjust seasoning with more Cajun spice, salt, or pepper if desired.
    5. Cook the Pasta:
        â—¦ While the sauce simmers, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and add to the sauce.
    6. Combine Everything:
        â—¦ Return shrimp and sausage to the skillet. Toss well with the pasta until everything is evenly coated and heated through.
    7. Serve:
        â—¦ Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and extra Parmesan if desired. Serve hot and enjoy the bold Cajun flavor!

Servings: 4
Prep Time: 15 minutes
Cook Time: 25 minutes</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02Voiv74H5WziABK75LtHb36r6HACaBmoi46KkcKEU22vXB56jNBegmGGpDhKo6D8Gl&amp;id=100051173859785" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/494148940_1339279907787792_966809779528170685_n.jpg?stp=c0.185.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=pKYN6QnAGlUQ7kNvwFdJV0F&amp;_nc_oc=AdklBxuAeL848HILgIlEbGbkr3-NZTNrIktr-g5bjkhFI8fvYU6Z4-P60XoAelgrLm4hrDIeHCQV7py32uVOhm3g&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=UHQz7ygL5UJqYiH8zdV2PQ&amp;oh=00_AfNId7-269aivfKYoSlYV27LTOmdIb1bwYK7Qv6-0spv-g&amp;oe=6846CFE2"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid02Voiv74H5WziABK75LtHb36r6HACaBmoi46KkcKEU22vXB56jNBegmGGpDhKo6D8Gl&amp;id=100051173859785" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Tender Steak Bites and Juicy Shrimp in Garlic Butter

Ingredients:

1 lb sirloin steak, cut into bite-sized cubes
8 large shrimp, peeled and deveined
2 tablespoons olive oil
3 tablespoons unsalted butter
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped
1 teaspoon smoked paprika
1 teaspoon lemon zest
Salt and pepper to taste
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional for a kick)

Directions:

In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium-high heat. Season the steak cubes with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika.
Add the steak cubes to the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until browned on all sides and cooked to your desired doneness. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, melt 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until they turn pink and are cooked through.
Add the garlic and red pepper flakes to the skillet with the shrimp and cook for an additional 1 minute until fragrant.
Return the steak bites to the skillet, toss everything together, and squeeze in the fresh lemon juice. Cook for another 1-2 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
Remove from heat and garnish with fresh parsley and lemon zest before serving.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 15 minutes | Total Time: 25 minutes
Kcal: 350 kcal | Servings: 2 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xzsf02u">Food</span></a></span></div><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488086086_1130700732195111_8423304796941864970_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e21142&amp;_nc_ohc=CSwfZxXfom0Q7kNvwEuun88&amp;_nc_oc=Adl7JqiVxnZqfrFv1TQATFvwahNblFkq4N8z2czYSeq0sRAgnhNBZvzp_fMP8dXd016TyX2vn4s5uVRn0xCBf4kq&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=UHQz7ygL5UJqYiH8zdV2PQ&amp;oh=00_AfM-GrCesJHeGerO0e9GS7idyWlavD0Zw9UaMcvDwCNHDg&amp;oe=6846BB78"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/homeinteriorsdc/posts/pfbid0WHaAkizfr6a1CFvoodoWyF6qJk6KqEJqcfaTGXTiLZ72YsZxgQcdDn2VTsnuUvSel" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Street Corn Chicken Rice Bowl

A delicious and flavorful rice bowl topped with juicy chicken, creamy street corn, and zesty toppings.

Ingredients:

For the Chicken:
- 4 chicken thighs, boneless and skinless
- 1 tbsp lime juice
- 1 tbsp avocado oil
- 1 tsp chili powder
- 1 tsp cumin powder
- 1/2 tsp garlic powder or 2 minced garlic cloves
- 1/2 tsp salt
- 1/4 tsp black pepper

For the Street Corn Topping:
- 1 cup sweet corn kernels, grilled if possible (or frozen)
- 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion
- 1 cup sour cream (save half for drizzling)
- 2 tbsp mayonnaise
- 1/2 cup Cotija cheese, crumbled (plus extra for garnish)
- 1 tsp chili powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 lime, cut into wedges

For the Rice and Assembly:
- 3 cups cooked rice
- Fresh cilantro for garnish

Instructions:

1. Season and marinate the chicken: Combine lime juice, avocado oil, chili powder, cumin powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Coat the chicken thighs and marinate for 15-30 minutes in the fridge.
2. Cook the chicken: Heat a skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken for 8-10 minutes per side until done. Rest, then slice.
3. Prepare the street corn topping: Mix grilled corn, red onion, sour cream, mayonnaise, Cotija cheese, and chili powder. Season with salt, pepper, and lime juice.
4. Prepare the rice: Reheat cooked rice with a splash of water until warm and fluffy.
5. Assemble the bowls: Add rice, sliced chicken, street corn topping, extra Cotija, and cilantro to each bowl. Garnish with lime wedges.
6. Optional: Drizzle extra sour cream or sprinkle TajÃ­n on top for extra flavor.
7. Serve warm with an optional squeeze of lime.

Nutrition:
- Calories: 512 kcal
- Carbohydrates: 43.5 g
- Protein: 22.6 g
- Fat: 28.2 g

Prep Time: 30 minutes | Cooking Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 50 minutes | Servings: 4 people</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/488613959_122151834002441364_4085627786278480102_n.jpg?stp=c0.160.1280.1280a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=Sco4IXNA4CkQ7kNvwG6FbKY&amp;_nc_oc=Adn_gM7Vwo56Sk8UIOAxiXBORlzZI-G_mMQzhk73-aVUCCt8Z0OYJN7XIV1t18RSgbF5e85vUlZnzeezdRze6eRU&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=M7fXhrOvgXxDX59es2UW5Q&amp;oh=00_AfPggYUcTNO4jcbM4v2Xzs0erkEwF1CXYkoBXqBpO6E4lg&amp;oe=6846E9CF"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/Katierecipes/posts/pfbid029wZE5gBfP8Zm8W7eLuwRtaLZitYRU6Apjn8rtSYArYBVUdRW9qqqEyBLhRhHotjLl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Cajun Chicken, Sausage &amp; Shrimp Gumbo with Rice 

Ingredients:

For the Gumbo:
    â€¢ 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken thighs (shredded)
    â€¢ 12 oz andouille sausage, sliced
    â€¢ 1/2 lb raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
    â€¢ 1/2 cup vegetable oil
    â€¢ 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
    â€¢ 1 medium onion, diced
    â€¢ 1 bell pepper, diced
    â€¢ 2 celery stalks, chopped
    â€¢ 3 cloves garlic, minced
    â€¢ 6 cups chicken broth
    â€¢ 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes (optional)
    â€¢ 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce
    â€¢ 2 tsp Cajun seasoning
    â€¢ 1 tsp smoked paprika
    â€¢ 1/2 tsp thyme
    â€¢ 2 bay leaves
    â€¢ Salt &amp; black pepper, to taste
    â€¢ 1/2 cup green onions, chopped
    â€¢ 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped

For the Rice:
    â€¢ 2 cups white rice
    â€¢ 4 cups water
    â€¢ 1/2 tsp salt

Instructions:

1. Cook the Rice:
In a pot, bring water to a boil. Add salt and rice, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Fluff with a fork and set aside.
2. Make the Roux:
In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Stir in the flour and cook, stirring constantly, for 10â€“15 minutes or until the roux is a deep brown (like chocolate). Be patientâ€”donâ€™t rush this step!
3. Add Veggies:
Stir in the onion, bell pepper, celery, and garlic. Cook for 3â€“4 minutes until softened.
4. Build the Gumbo:
Add the sausage and chicken to the pot. Stir in the chicken broth, Worcestershire sauce, diced tomatoes (if using), Cajun seasoning, paprika, thyme, bay leaves, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer.
5. Simmer:
Let the gumbo simmer for about 45 minutes, uncovered, to develop deep flavor.
6. Add the Shrimp:
Add the shrimp during the last 5â€“7 minutes of cooking. Cook just until they turn pink and are cooked through.
7. Finish &amp; Serve:
Remove bay leaves. Stir in green onions and parsley.
Serve hot over a scoop of white rice and garnish with additional parsley if desired.

Servings: 6
Prep Time: 15 minutes
Cook Time: 1 hour</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x13rtm0m" role="none" data-visualcompletion="ignore"></div></div></div></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="x1yztbdb"><div class="html-div xdj266r x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0St7xeJS9MPMSN9BZN2SPjqSCx5fYiEdeYc4hoZBY5hk8fWdAgufkXkQoMBix1Ltpl&amp;id=61568220096619" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486789542_122130420182607336_3496028291387788772_n.jpg?stp=c0.180.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=103&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=e5c1b6&amp;_nc_ohc=hfraWhiM2C0Q7kNvwGtGOTL&amp;_nc_oc=AdlRs-GA1rqMGjAfluBc8JW_QrUc68608-iv3vpRhUpE73cGrj8LEs8GLrI4xit1HB7K6xQy9O8og5-fEFQb843z&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=M7fXhrOvgXxDX59es2UW5Q&amp;oh=00_AfNY4w7hVQSc00SsaNWa1VK_UXPpfZNeDFCCz8yE9IAdRQ&amp;oe=6846D19D"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0St7xeJS9MPMSN9BZN2SPjqSCx5fYiEdeYc4hoZBY5hk8fWdAgufkXkQoMBix1Ltpl&amp;id=61568220096619" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Lemon Garlic Butter Cod Bowls with Roasted Brussels Sprouts

Ingredients:

For the Cod:

1 pound cod fillets, cut into 4 pieces

2 tablespoons olive oil

2 cloves garlic, minced

1 tablespoon lemon juice

1/2 teaspoon dried oregano

1/4 teaspoon salt

For the Roasted Brussels Sprouts:

1 pound Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved

2 tablespoons olive oil

1/2 teaspoon salt

1/4 teaspoon black pepper

For the Lemon Garlic Butter Sauce:

2 tablespoons butter

2 cloves garlic, minced

1 tablespoon lemon juice

1 teaspoon lemon zest

For the Bowls:

2 cups cooked brown rice or quinoa

Fresh parsley, chopped (optional, for garnish)

Directions:

Prepare the Brussels Sprouts:
Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Place halved Brussels sprouts on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and black pepper. Toss to coat evenly. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden and crispy.

Prepare the Cod:
While the Brussels sprouts are roasting, pat the cod fillets dry with paper towels. In a small bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, oregano, and salt. Brush the mixture evenly over the cod fillets.

Cook the Cod:
Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the cod fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork and is cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.

Make the Lemon Garlic Butter Sauce:
In the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and sautÃ© for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Add the lemon juice and zest, stir to combine, and remove from heat.

Assemble the Bowls:
Divide the cooked rice or quinoa between 4 bowls. Top each with a piece of cod and a portion of roasted Brussels sprouts. Drizzle the lemon garlic butter sauce over the cod. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 25 minutes | Total Time: 35 minutes
Kcal: ~370 kcal per serving | Servings: 4</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ“ Creamy Lemon Herb Chicken with Roasted Veggies

Juicy pan-seared chicken breasts in a creamy lemon herb sauce, served with garlic-roasted carrots, potatoes, and asparagus. Light, fresh, and super satisfying!

ğŸ— Ingredients

For the Chicken:
2â€“3 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
Salt &amp; pepper to taste
1 tsp garlic powder
1 tsp Italian seasoning
2 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp butter
3 cloves garlic, minced
Juice of 1 lemon + 1 tsp zest
Â½ cup chicken broth
Â½ cup heavy cream
Â¼ cup grated Parmesan
Fresh thyme or parsley for garnish

For the Roasted Veggies:
1 bunch asparagus, trimmed
3 large carrots, peeled &amp; cut into sticks
2 cups baby potatoes, halved
2 tbsp olive oil
Salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste

ğŸ”¥ Instructions
1. Roast the Veggies:
Preheat oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C).
Toss carrots, potatoes, and asparagus with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25â€“30 minutes, flipping once halfway.

2. Cook the Chicken:
Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and sear 5â€“6 minutes per side until golden and cooked through. Remove and set aside.

3. Make the Sauce:
In the same skillet, lower heat to medium. Add butter and garlic; cook 30 seconds.
Add lemon juice, zest, and broth. Simmer 2â€“3 minutes.
Stir in cream and Parmesan. Simmer until slightly thickened.
Return chicken to the skillet and spoon sauce over the top.

4. Serve:
Plate chicken with roasted veggies. Spoon extra lemon cream sauce over everything and garnish with herbs.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/andrewjackmiller/posts/pfbid0JesbDst8DcoKyoaeFuV69ouF89opArfqbcKtLAshu81qe4CZR13MkfNtE55C2Eshl" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Bowtie Pasta with Creamy Velveeta Beef Sauce ğŸ§€ğŸ

A rich, cheesy, and comforting pasta dish the whole family will love!

Ingredients (Serves 4)
1 (16 oz) block Velveeta cheese, cubed
1 (8 oz) block cream cheese, softened
1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup
1 can (10 oz) Rotel tomatoes with chilies, undrained
1 to 1.25 lbs ground beef
1 box (12 oz) bowtie pasta (farfalle)
(Optional) 1 cup reserved pasta water (to thin the sauce if needed)
Instructions
Step 1: Cook the Pasta
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Add bowtie pasta and cook until al dente, following package instructions (about 8-10 minutes).
Before draining, reserve 1 cup of pasta water in case the sauce needs thinning.
Drain pasta and set aside.
Step 2: Cook the Ground Beef
While the pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat.
Add ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned and fully cooked (about 7-8 minutes).
Drain excess grease and set aside.
Step 3: Make the Creamy Sauce
In the same skillet, lower heat to medium-low and add Velveeta, cream cheese, and cream of chicken soup.
Stir constantly until the cheeses are fully melted and the sauce is smooth.
Step 4: Combine Everything
Stir in the Rotel tomatoes (with juices) and the cooked ground beef.
Add the drained bowtie pasta and toss until everything is evenly coated in the creamy sauce.
If the sauce is too thick, gradually add the reserved pasta water, a little at a time, until the desired consistency is reached.
Step 5: Serve &amp; Enjoy
Spoon onto plates or bowls and serve warm.
(Optional) Garnish with freshly chopped parsley or extra shredded cheese for even more flavor.

class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/7245323138849852/permalink/9490564080992402/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Savory Sun-Dried Tomato, Spinach &amp; Ricotta Grilled Cheese Delight

Golden Grilled Cheese with Sun-Dried Tomato, Spinach &amp; Creamy Ricotta

Ingredients:

4 slices of sourdough bread
1 cup ricotta cheese
1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped
1 cup fresh spinach, chopped
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
Salt and pepper, to taste
Red pepper flakes (optional)
Directions:

Prepare the Ingredients: In a small bowl, mix ricotta cheese with a pinch of salt and pepper. Set aside. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and spinach.
Assemble the Sandwiches: Spread a generous layer of ricotta cheese on one side of each slice of bread. Top two of the bread slices with chopped sun-dried tomatoes and fresh spinach. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella on top, then cover with the remaining bread slices to form sandwiches.
Cook the Grilled Cheese: In a skillet, heat olive oil and butter over medium heat until the butter melts. Place the sandwiches in the skillet, cooking for 3-4 minutes per side, or until the bread is golden and the cheese has melted. Press gently with a spatula to encourage even melting.
Serve: Remove the sandwiches from the skillet and allow them to cool slightly. Cut in half, sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired, and serve with soup or salad for a complete meal.
Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cook Time: 8 minutes | Total Time: 18 minutes

Kcal: Approximately 420 kcal per serving | Servings: 2 servings

class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1007129367874217/permalink/1175210197732799/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487873777_3940288622956222_7995028371926174330_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=111&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=m9GGIOJcRJkQ7kNvwEvPcII&amp;_nc_oc=AdlsxO4osUHlT_nKwp8JeMd9C710Ysu62sFsuujJYt412FC2o6AsdLC-178ddjB7d4v8G2D3KAeXUcpidwuJEys3&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=-N48X7XcIHf6_rVr81gmEA&amp;oh=00_AfM9D36xrsDRxfu-mVNOzjNgP_DLylVO6kChz3yiq8rl4g&amp;oe=6846E692"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1007129367874217/permalink/1175210197732799/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Grilled Pineapple Teriyaki Salmon 

**Ingredients:
*Salmon:  
  - 4 salmon fillets  
  - Salt &amp; black pepper to taste  
  - 1 tbsp olive oil  

*Teriyaki Sauce: 
  - Â¼ cup soy sauce  
  - 2 tbsp honey or brown sugar  
  - 1 tbsp rice vinegar or lemon juice  
  - 2 cloves garlic, minced  
  - 1 tsp grated ginger  
  - 1 tsp cornstarch + 2 tbsp water (optional, for thickening)  

*Pineapple:  
  - 1 cup fresh pineapple chunks  
  - Optional: grill them for caramelized flavor  

*Garnish: 
  - Fresh parsley or green onions, chopped  
  - Sesame seeds (optional)  

**Directions:
1. Make the Teriyaki Sauce:  
   - In a small saucepan, combine soy sauce, honey, vinegar, garlic, and ginger.  
   - Simmer for 5 minutes. Optional: Mix cornstarch with water and stir into sauce to thicken.  

2. Prepare Salmon:  
   - Season salmon with salt and pepper. Brush lightly with olive oil.  

3. Grill Salmon &amp; Pineapple:  
   - Grill or pan-sear salmon over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.  
   - At the same time, grill pineapple chunks until slightly charred.  

4. Glaze &amp; Serve: 
   - Brush salmon with teriyaki sauce, top with grilled pineapple.  
   - Garnish with fresh herbs or sesame seeds. Serve with rice or veggies.  

- Serves 4
- Approximately 400â€“450 kcal</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid032Y2qUbYzWdjD8JFN8R5YTwE7u26K9qXvBh6GSR7xFixhRVQ28AXiii7r1gTA8ib2l&amp;id=61551932855249" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Crunchy Cheddar-Coated Chicken Delight

Ingredients:

4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese
1 cup crushed Ritz crackers or breadcrumbs
Â½ cup grated Parmesan cheese
Â½ tsp garlic powder
Â½ tsp smoked paprika
Â½ tsp salt
Â¼ tsp black pepper
2 large eggs
Â¼ cup milk
2 tbsp olive oil
Directions:

Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it with cooking spray.
In a shallow bowl, mix the crushed crackers, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk.
Dip each chicken breast into the egg mixture, allowing the excess to drip off. Then coat the chicken thoroughly with the cracker and cheese mixture.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Sear the chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Transfer the chicken to the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165Â°F (74Â°C).
Serve warm with your favorite dipping sauce or a side of roasted vegetables.
Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes | Total Time: 40 minutes

Kcal: 450 kcal | Servings: 4

x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/767592632247582/permalink/953599800313530/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Mediterranean Salmon Patties ğŸŸğŸŒ¿
Crispy, flavorful salmon patties packed with Mediterranean herbs and fetaâ€”perfect for a light and delicious meal!
Ingredients
For the Patties:
2 cans (6 oz each) salmon, drained and flaked
1 cup fresh spinach, finely chopped (or Â½ cup thawed, drained frozen spinach)
Â¼ cup red onion, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
â…“ cup feta cheese, crumbled
Â½ cup breadcrumbs (panko or regular)
2 large eggs, beaten
2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped
1 tbsp fresh dill (optional)
1 tbsp lemon juice
1 tsp lemon zest
1 tsp dried oregano
Salt and pepper, to taste
For Frying:
Olive oil
Optional Garnish:
Lemon wedges
Tzatziki sauce
Instructions
1. Prepare the Salmon
Drain the salmon and remove any bones or skin if desired. Flake it with a fork in a large bowl.
2. SautÃ© the Spinach
Cook spinach in a dry pan over medium heat for 2 minutes until wilted. Let it cool, then squeeze out excess moisture.
3. Mix Everything
Add spinach, red onion, garlic, feta, breadcrumbs, eggs, parsley, dill, lemon juice, zest, oregano, salt, and pepper to the salmon. Mix well.
4. Shape the Patties
Form the mixture into 6â€“8 patties, about 3 inches wide.
5. Cook Until Golden
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Cook patties for 3â€“4 minutes per side until crispy and golden brown. Drain on paper towels.
6. Serve
Enjoy with lemon wedges, tzatziki sauce, or a fresh salad!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09
