x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1616822912058188/permalink/1935979666809176/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Air Fryer Crispy Chicken Parmesan ğŸ—ğŸ§€ğŸ
Enjoy a healthier, crispier twist on the classic Chicken Parmesan, made in the air fryer! This dish combines crispy chicken, rich tomato sauce, and melted mozzarella, all without the extra oil from deep frying. Perfectly paired with pasta for a comforting meal! ğŸ½ï¸âœ¨

ğŸ›’ Ingredients (Serves 2)
For the Chicken ğŸ—
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts â€“ pounded to an even thickness

Â½ cup all-purpose flour â€“ for dredging

2 large eggs â€“ beaten

1 cup panko breadcrumbs â€“ for crunch

Â½ cup grated Parmesan cheese ğŸ§€ â€“ for added flavor

1 tsp garlic powder â€“ for a savory kick

1 tsp dried oregano â€“ for a classic Italian flavor

Salt &amp; pepper â€“ to taste

Olive oil spray â€“ for a light spray to crisp the coating

For the Sauce &amp; Topping ğŸ
1 cup marinara sauce ğŸ… â€“ or your favorite tomato sauce

1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese ğŸ§€ â€“ for melty goodness

1 tbsp fresh basil â€“ for garnish, optional

1 tbsp Parmesan cheese â€“ for topping

For Serving ğŸ
1 cup cooked spaghetti ğŸ â€“ or your preferred pasta

ğŸ”ª Instructions
1ï¸âƒ£ Prep the Chicken
Preheat the air fryer to 375Â°F (190Â°C).

Set up a dredging station:

Flour in one shallow dish.

Beaten eggs in another dish.

Panko breadcrumbs, Parmesan, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper in a third dish.

Dredge each chicken breast first in flour, then dip in egg, and finally coat with the breadcrumb mixture, pressing to adhere.

2ï¸âƒ£ Air Fry the Chicken
Spray the air fryer basket with a light coat of olive oil spray to prevent sticking.

Place the breaded chicken breasts in the air fryer basket in a single layer, making sure they don't touch.

Air fry at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for 10 minutes, flip the chicken, and cook for another 6-8 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through (internal temperature should be 165Â°F).

3ï¸âƒ£ Add the Sauce and Cheese
Once the chicken is crispy and cooked, spoon about 2 tablespoons of marinara sauce onto each chicken breast.

Top each with shredded mozzarella and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

Return the chicken to the air fryer and cook at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for an additional 3-4 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

4ï¸âƒ£ Serve
Plate the crispy chicken Parmesan over a bed of cooked spaghetti.

Garnish with fresh basil and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

5ï¸âƒ£ Enjoy!
Dig in and enjoy your Air Fryer Crispy Chicken Parmesanâ€”crispy, cheesy, and perfectly saucy with every bite! ğŸ—ğŸ§€ğŸ

ğŸ”¥ Pro Tips &amp; Variations
âœ… Make it spicy: Add red pepper flakes to the sauce or breadcrumbs for a bit of heat. ğŸŒ¶ï¸
âœ… No pasta? Serve the chicken Parmesan over zucchini noodles or a bed of cauliflower rice for a low-carb option.
âœ… Need extra crunch? Double-coat the chicken by dipping it in egg and breadcrumbs twice for an even crispier texture.
âœ… Use chicken thighs: For juicier chicken, swap the breasts for boneless, skinless chicken thighs.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/7245323138849852/permalink/9463565107025633/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Creamy Chicken Tortilla Wraps ğŸŒ¯âœ¨

Ingredients:

â€¢ 2 cups cooked chicken (shredded)
â€¢ 4 large tortillas
â€¢ 1/2 cup sour cream
â€¢ 1/4 cup mayonnaise
â€¢ 1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar or your choice)
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon paprika
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon chili powder
â€¢ Salt and pepper to taste
â€¢ 1/2 cup chopped lettuce
â€¢ 1/2 cup diced tomatoes
â€¢ 1/4 cup diced red onion
â€¢ Optional: avocado slices, jalapeÃ±os, salsa

Instructions:

1. In a bowl, mix sour cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, paprika, chili powder, salt, and pepper until smooth.
2. Add the shredded chicken to the mixture, stirring until well coated.
3. Lay out the tortillas and evenly distribute the chicken mixture onto each one.
4. Sprinkle cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and red onion over the chicken.
5. Add any optional ingredients like avocado or jalapeÃ±os.
6. Roll the tortillas tightly, tucking in the sides, and serve fresh.

Enjoy your creamy, flavorful tortilla wraps!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/487203401_4100176206878816_2892400044356986148_n.jpg?stp=c0.120.960.960a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=Kri_Vr8AhAAQ7kNvwHj7e49&amp;_nc_oc=AdkfVD51jTkfSaHGhiS9kk4HadzUWLR3CV5RV3qTcj9sAH8AXnTPQhhaeqKL6O1_g6aBUkuxdso2sJLsrk9Xl4Ye&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=-N48X7XcIHf6_rVr81gmEA&amp;oh=00_AfOcezUziseNx0PBwKWqdFm4B3Vg3R-0d-2McN_baFIitg&amp;oe=6846D525"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/190611330697899/permalink/592270033865358/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸŒ¶ï¸ Spicy Ground Beef Bowl with Pico de Gallo, Black Beans &amp; Lime Crema Recipe ğŸš

Ingredients:

For the Spicy Ground Beef:

1 lb ground beef (80/20 recommended)
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 green bell pepper, chopped
1 red bell pepper, chopped
1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 tablespoon chili powder
1 teaspoon cumin
1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika
1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (or more, to taste)
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon black pepper
2 tablespoons olive oil
For the Pico de Gallo:

2 cups chopped tomatoes
1/2 cup chopped red onion
1/2 cup chopped cilantro
1 jalapeÃ±o pepper, seeded and minced (optional)
2 tablespoons lime juice
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon black pepper
For the Lime Crema:

1 cup sour cream or Mexican crema
2 tablespoons lime juice
1 tablespoon chopped cilantro
1/4 teaspoon salt
For Serving:

Cooked rice (about 2 cups)
Avocado, sliced (optional)
Shredded cheese (optional)
Tortilla chips (optional)
Instructions:

Prepare the Spicy Ground Beef:
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and bell peppers, and sautÃ© until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional minute until fragrant.
Stir in the ground beef, breaking it apart with a spoon. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the diced tomatoes (with their juice), black beans, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper. Stir to combine and let simmer for about 10 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld.
Make the Pico de Gallo:
In a bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, jalapeÃ±o (if using), lime juice, salt, and black pepper. Mix well and set aside.
Prepare the Lime Crema:
In a small bowl, whisk together the sour cream (or Mexican crema), lime juice, chopped cilantro, and salt. Adjust seasoning to taste.
Assemble the Bowl:
In serving bowls, layer the cooked rice, spicy ground beef mixture, and top with pico de gallo.
Drizzle with lime crema and add sliced avocado, shredded cheese, and tortilla chips if desired.
Serve:
Enjoy your delicious and hearty Spicy Ground Beef Bowl! Perfect for a satisfying meal any day of the week! ğŸŒŸ</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1004632831356587/permalink/1182957983524070/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Grilled Shrimp Bowl with Avocado, Corn Salsa &amp; Creamy Sauce ğŸ¤ğŸ¥‘ğŸŒ½

 
Ingredients:

For the Shrimp:

1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 teaspoon paprika
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon black pepper
1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional)
For the Corn Salsa:

1 cup frozen corn, thawed
1/2 cup diced red onion
1/4 cup chopped cilantro
1 jalapeÃ±o, seeded and minced (optional)
1 lime, juiced
Salt to taste
For the Creamy Sauce:

1/2 cup mayonnaise
1/4 cup sour cream
1 tablespoon chopped cilantro
1 tablespoon lemon juice
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon black pepper
For the Bowl:

1 avocado, sliced
Sesame seeds, for garnish
Chopped green onions, for garnish
Instructions:

Prep the Shrimp: In a bowl, combine shrimp, olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper (if using). Toss to coat.
Make the Corn Salsa: Combine corn, red onion, jalapeÃ±o (if using), cilantro, lime juice, and salt in a bowl. Mix gently and set aside.
Grill the Shrimp: Grill the shrimp over medium heat for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Make the Creamy Sauce: In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, cilantro, lime juice, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Assemble the Bowls: Divide cooked rice between bowls. Top with grilled shrimp, mango salsa, avocado slices, and drizzle with Creamy Sauce. Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions.
Tips &amp; Tweaks:

Spice it up: Add more cayenne pepper or a pinch of red pepper flakes to the shrimp marinade.
Make it a meal: Serve the bowls with a side salad or soup.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x x4zkp8e x676frb x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm xi81zsa" dir="auto">Post â€¢ Saved to <a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486143334_122172995222329345_4030809290241105406_n.jpg?stp=c0.135.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=kdCdX1zz4ZwQ7kNvwG2eSs1&amp;_nc_oc=AdkZnoDGLuVK1BEaqgEpoH1DFKPkEhP6gjaQ8tdHw-toyJCxJ-Dkv1p-okMy7PGn6vvsEE2PGyJlGUYA6w9ep4LI&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=-N48X7XcIHf6_rVr81gmEA&amp;oh=00_AfNcRqoo7R4-qBK81aFcdyy7fGJWfsYsyb-myOSfNKF4tg&amp;oe=6846D63D"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/3527675180830766/permalink/3850240575240890/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">5-Minute Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Bombs

Ingredients:
1 cup shredded cooked chicken.
1 cup Alfredo sauce.
1 cup shredded Mozzarella cheese.
1 can refrigerated biscuit dough.
1/2 tsp garlic powder.
1/2 tsp Italian seasoning.
1/4 tsp black pepper.
1/4 cup melted butter.

Instructions:
Start by preheating your air fryer to 375 degrees F. While the air fryer is preheating, in a medium-sized bowl, combine the shredded chicken, Alfredo sauce, and half the Mozzarella cheese. Stir until all the ingredients are well combined. 

Take out the refrigerated biscuit dough and flatten each biscuit. Place a spoonful of the chicken mixture in the center of each biscuit. Fold the biscuit dough over the chicken mixture and pinch the edges to seal it. Repeat the process for all the biscuits. In a small bowl, mix together the garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and black pepper.

Brush each chicken bomb with the melted butter, then sprinkle the seasoning mixture on top. Place the chicken bombs in the air fryer basket, leaving some space between each one for air circulation. Cook for about 5 minutes or until golden brown. Once done, sprinkle the rest of the Mozzarella cheese on top of each chicken bomb and let it melt. 

Serve your 5-Minute Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Bombs hot and enjoy!</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="/saved/?list_id=2809343415748856" role="link" tabindex="0"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1nxh6w3 x1sibtaa xo1l8bm x78zum5 xdt5ytf xyamay9 xv54qhq x1l90r2v xf7dkkf" style="border-radius: max(0px, min(var(--card-corner-radius), calc((100vw - 4px - 100%) * 9999))) / var(--card-corner-radius);"><div class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/409493585144450/permalink/665069762920163/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><div class="x1n2onr6 x5yr21d xh8yej3"><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486544810_599179876491445_8656344211245153909_n.jpg?stp=c0.179.715.715a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=104&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=Lbxv_R4IBwMQ7kNvwE0gDA1&amp;_nc_oc=AdkdlBEAKqLBg87g9FK2GIQr0ernC_ct-r768dlopL7NJk0jDH3qI4wXq7FuYzNhvTjFVIO5V-Vt-p2uCOzfuCoE&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=djKe4iwFJDkjJle2L8k7dQ&amp;oh=00_AfP5szc0kHEpWv0vFlszXuMhWNkndWVcV8ukRuxXpH8JTA&amp;oe=6846B58C"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/409493585144450/permalink/665069762920163/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Lasagna Rolls 

âœ…ï¸Ingredients:

- 12 lasagna noodles
- 2 cups ricotta cheese
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1 egg
- 2 cups spinach, chopped (fresh or frozen)
- 2 cups marinara sauce
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon onion powder
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh basil leaves for garnish (optional)

âœ…ï¸Instructions:

1. Cook the Lasagna Noodles:

   - Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
   - Add the lasagna noodles and cook according to package instructions until al dente.
   - Drain and lay the noodles flat on a clean kitchen towel to cool.

2. Prepare the Filling:

   - In a large mixing bowl, combine ricotta cheese, 1 cup of mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, chopped spinach, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
   - Mix until well combined.

3. Assemble the Lasagna Rolls:

   - Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
   - Spread a thin layer of marinara sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
   - Take one lasagna noodle and spread about 2-3 tablespoons of the cheese filling along the length of the noodle.
   - Roll the noodle up tightly and place it seam-side down in the baking dish.
   - Repeat with the remaining noodles and filling.

4. Add Sauce and Cheese:

   - Once all the rolls are in the baking dish, pour the remaining marinara sauce over the top.
   - Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese evenly over the sauce.

5. Bake the Lasagna Rolls:

   - Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 25 minutes.
   - Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

6. Serve:

   - Allow the lasagna rolls to cool for a few minutes before serving.
   - Garnish with fresh basil leaves if desired.

Prep Time: 20 minutes | Cook Time: 40 minutes | Servings: 4-6

ğŸ›’ Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts ğŸ—
1 tablespoon olive oil ğŸ«’
1 teaspoon garlic powder ğŸ§„
Â½ teaspoon paprika ğŸŒ¶ï¸
Â½ teaspoon salt ğŸ§‚
Â½ teaspoon black pepper âš«
1 teaspoon lemon juice ğŸ‹
ğŸ¥‘ Salad Ingredients:
1 large avocado ğŸ¥‘ (diced)
1 cup cherry tomatoes ğŸ… (halved)
Â¼ cup fresh cilantro ğŸŒ¿ (chopped)
1 cup lettuce or mixed greens ğŸ¥¬ (optional)
ğŸ¥„ Dressing:
2 tablespoons olive oil ğŸ«’
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice ğŸˆ
1 teaspoon honey ğŸ¯
Â½ teaspoon Dijon mustard ğŸŒ°

ğŸ”¥ Instructions:
1ï¸âƒ£ Marinate &amp; Grill the Chicken:

Rub the chicken with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill or pan-cook for 6-7 minutes per side until golden brown.
Let it rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
2ï¸âƒ£ Prepare the Salad:

In a bowl, mix the avocado, cherry tomatoes, and chopped cilantro.
3ï¸âƒ£ Make the Dressing:

Whisk together olive oil, lime juice, honey, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
4ï¸âƒ£ Assemble &amp; Serve:

Add the sliced chicken to the salad and drizzle with dressing.

x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/7245323138849852/permalink/9453911817990962/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Steak Fajita Crunch Bombs
Ingredients:
1 lb flank steak
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon pepper
1 teaspoon cumin
1 teaspoon chili powder
4 cloves garlic, chopped
1 yellow onion, chopped
3 bell peppers, seeded, diced
9 medium flour tortillas
3 cups shredded mexican cheese blend
8 oz monterey jack cheese, sliced into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces
18 tortilla chips
2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, chopped
Instructions:
Season flank steak with olive oil, salt, pepper, cumin and chili powder.
Heat a pan over high heat.
Add the flank steak and cook for 3 minutes on each side.
Remove the flank steak from the pan and let rest for 10 minutes.
Preheat oven to 350Â°F (180Â°C).
Turn heat down to medium.
Add oil, garlic and onion to the pan.
Cook until onions are translucent.
Add the bell peppers, salt, and pepper, and cook for 5 minutes, until softened.
Slice steak into Â¼-inch (1 cm) cubes.
Add the cubed steak and stir to combine.
Remove from heat.
Lay out one medium tortilla.
Sprinkle Mexican cheese in the center, place two tortilla chips side by side over it, place a 1-inch chunk of jack cheese over the tortilla chips and finally, add roughy two spoonfuls of fajita mix on top.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486679111_600840172992082_488453454632538151_n.jpg?stp=c0.120.960.960a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=107&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=q1ea1LDzcgAQ7kNvwGCx0Kw&amp;_nc_oc=AdlmFJh-OMU3awHiCGNHkSFd8WRRI-6cFY8LJFVXsNZukKz0bF-9wi7bNpJTv3_5U-HN0L2TIJG98xcfxfYj7Teb&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=djKe4iwFJDkjJle2L8k7dQ&amp;oh=00_AfNKI7bwfgTqDDNlHMDhRHq11H-i6V6QrzbDC5Upk4Iixg&amp;oe=6846C016"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/7245323138849852/permalink/9470058749709602/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Blackened Salmon Stuffed with Spinach &amp; Parmesan ğŸŸğŸ§€ğŸŒ¿
Ingredients:
- 4 salmon fillets (skinless, about 1.5 inches thick)
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper (adjust for spice preference)
- 2 cups fresh spinach leaves
- 1 tablespoon butter
- 1/2 cup shredded Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
2. In a small bowl, combine paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper.
3. Slice each salmon fillet horizontally to create a pocket (be careful not to cut all the way through).
4. Season both sides of the salmon and inside the pocket with the spice mixture.
5. In a skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat and mix in the Parmesan and mozzarella cheeses.
6. Stuff each salmon fillet with the spinach and cheese mixture.
7. In an oven-safe skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Sear the salmon for 2-3 minutes on each side until a crust forms.
8. Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 8-10 minutes or until salmon is cooked through and cheese is melted.
Serve this Blackened Salmon Stuffed with Spinach &amp; Parmesan hot and enjoy!
Prep time: 10 mins, Cooking time: 20 mins, Servings: 4, Kcal: ~450 per serving</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0iZBkYYVEwctE6mj8AB4VURhn7wkQ5LGZJaAAuyr4Pa4XFTVNeeCKMrFdB1FDmDsSl&amp;id=61557917150157" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Burrata Bruschetta

Ingredients:

For the Bruschetta:

1 baguette, sliced into Â½-inch pieces

2 tbsp olive oil

2 cloves garlic, halved

For the Topping:

2 large ripe tomatoes, diced

1 tbsp balsamic glaze

1 tbsp olive oil

Â½ tsp salt

Â¼ tsp black pepper

Â¼ cup fresh basil, chopped

8 oz burrata cheese, torn into pieces

For Garnish:

Extra balsamic glaze for drizzling

Fresh basil leaves

Directions:

Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Arrange baguette slices on a baking sheet.

Brush each slice with olive oil and bake for 8-10 minutes until golden and crisp.

Remove from oven and rub each slice with the cut side of a garlic clove for extra flavor.

In a bowl, mix diced tomatoes, balsamic glaze, olive oil, salt, black pepper, and chopped basil. Let marinate for 5 minutes.

Top each toasted baguette slice with a spoonful of the tomato mixture.

Place torn burrata pieces over the tomatoes.

Drizzle with extra balsamic glaze and garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 10 minutes | Total Time: 20 minutes

Kcal: 250 kcal | Servings: 6 servings</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=pfbid0YjYcQC9giyNCErMgUJ6AE7QVcLCAnPm9yBkYxF4DWQdYkzFk6hYvBHeL2f2t1JWyl&amp;id=61563000427392" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Boudin Chimichangas with Crawfish Cream Sauce ğŸŒ¯ğŸ¦

Bold Cajun flavor wrapped in a crispy shell, topped with rich, creamy crawfish goodnessâ€”this fusion dish is next-level indulgence.

Ingredients
Chimichangas:

1 lb boudin sausage (casings removed)

6 soft taco-size flour tortillas

6 sticks pepper jack cheese

6 tsp Creole seasoning

Oil or butter for frying

Chopped green onions (for garnish)

Crawfish Cream Sauce:

12 oz crawfish tails

1Â½ cups half-and-half or heavy cream

2 tbsp olive oil

1 tbsp all-purpose flour

1 tbsp dried onion

2 garlic cloves, minced

1â€“2 tsp Cajun seasoning

1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce

1 tbsp butter

Shredded cheddar cheese (optional)

Instructions
1. Prep the Chimichangas:
Warm tortillas to make them flexible.
Fill with boudin, cheese stick, and Creole seasoning.
Fold tightly and secure with toothpicks.

2. Fry Until Golden:
Heat oil to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
Fry chimichangas for about 4â€“5 minutes until crisp.
Drain on paper towels.

3. Make the Sauce:
SautÃ© garlic in olive oil.
Add flour and dried onion to make a light roux.
Stir in crawfish and seasoning; cook briefly.
Add cream and Worcestershire; simmer until thickened.
Stir in butter and optional cheese until smooth.

4. Serve It Up:
Slice chimichangas in half.
Top with crawfish sauce and green onions.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1542597396467619/permalink/1712679942792696/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Must-Try BBQ Bacon Cheeseburger Mac 'n' Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pound elbow macaroni, cooked
1 pound ground beef
6 slices crispy bacon, crumbled
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
1/2 cup BBQ sauce
1/4 cup breadcrumbs
1 cup heavy cream
Salt and pepper, to taste
Instructions:
Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
Cook the ground beef in a skillet, seasoning with salt and pepper. Stir in the BBQ sauce and let it simmer.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked macaroni, beef mixture, crumbled bacon, and shredded cheddar cheese.
Pour in the heavy cream and stir everything together.
Transfer to a greased baking dish, sprinkle breadcrumbs on top, and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Serve hot and enjoy this cheesy, BBQ-infused mac â€˜nâ€™ cheese casserole thatâ€™s sure to be a hit! class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ Pineapple Teriyaki Chicken Foil Packs ğŸ”

Juicy chicken breasts grilled in foil with sweet pineapple, colorful veggies, and a sticky teriyaki glaze!

Ingredients
For the Chicken Packs

2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts ğŸ”

1 zucchini, thinly sliced ğŸ¥’

1 red bell pepper, chopped ğŸ”´

Â½ cup fresh pineapple chunks ğŸ

2 tbsp green onions, sliced ğŸŒ¿

Salt &amp; pepper to taste ğŸ§‚

1 tbsp olive oil

For the Teriyaki Sauce

Â¼ cup soy sauce

1Â½ tbsp honey ğŸ¯

1 tbsp rice vinegar

1 tsp sesame oil

1 garlic clove, minced ğŸ§„

1 tsp grated fresh ginger

Instructions
Preheat &amp; Prep Foil ğŸ”¥
Preheat grill (or oven) to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Lay out two large sheets of foil and lightly brush with olive oil.

Make the Teriyaki Sauce ğŸ¶
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger. Set aside.

Assemble Foil Packs ğŸ“¦
Place one chicken breast in the center of each foil sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange zucchini slices and bell pepper around the chicken.

Add Pineapple &amp; Sauce ğŸ
Top each chicken breast with pineapple chunks and spoon generous amounts of the teriyaki sauce over everything.

Seal &amp; Cook â²ï¸
Fold foil around the ingredients to form a sealed packet. Grill for 20â€“25 minutes (or bake for 25â€“30 minutes) until chicken is fully cooked and veggies are tender.

Unwrap &amp; Garnish âœ¨
Carefully open the foil packs (watch for steam!) and sprinkle with green onions. Serve immediately.

Recipe Details
Prep Time: 15 minutes

Cook Time: 25 minutes

Total Time: 40 minutes

Servings: 2 foil packs

Difficulty: Easy

Why Youâ€™ll Love It
ğŸ Juicy pineapple and savory teriyaki sauce create the perfect sweet and salty combo.

ğŸ§„ One-pan foil packs mean easy cleanup and flavor-packed results!

Bursting with tropical flair and savory richness ğŸ´

x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/7245323138849852/permalink/9452522848129859/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">ğŸ¥–ğŸ¥© Grilled Beef Tenderloin Crostini with BÃ©arnaise SauceğŸ¥–ğŸ¥© 
Ingredients:
1 baguette loaf
3 tbsp olive oil
2 beef tenderloin filets (about 6 oz each, 2 inches thick)
1 package of bÃ©arnaise sauce mix
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Fresh chives, chopped, for garnish
Directions:
Remove the beef tenderloin filets from the refrigerator about 30 minutes before grilling to bring them to room temperature.
Preheat your grill to medium heat, around 350-375Â°F (175-190Â°C).
Slice the baguette on a diagonal into Â½-inch thick slices and arrange them on a large baking sheet. Brush both sides of each slice with olive oil.
Grill the baguette slices until lightly toasted on both sides. Remove from the grill, lightly sprinkle with kosher salt, and set aside. These can be made ahead of time and stored in an airtight container for up to 12 hours.
Increase the grill heat to high, around 450-475Â°F (230-245Â°C). Season the tenderloin filets generously with kosher salt and freshly ground pepper on all sides.
Grill the tenderloins over high heat for 3-5 minutes per side, or until they reach an internal temperature of 125Â°F (52Â°C) for medium-rare. Remove the filets from the grill and let them rest for 10 minutes.
While the steaks are resting, prepare the bÃ©arnaise sauce according to the package instructions.
Arrange the toasted crostini on a large serving platter. Thinly slice the rested tenderloin filets and place a slice on each crostini.
Spoon about a tablespoon of bÃ©arnaise sauce over the beef on each crostini. Garnish with finely chopped chives and serve immediately.
Prep Time: 15 minutes | Cooking Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 35 minutes
Kcal: 320 kcal per serving | Servings: 4 servings

#foodstagram #cookingathome #homecooking #deliciousbites #easypartyrecipes #finediningathome</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div class="x14vqqas"><span class="x193iq5w class="x78zum5"><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf xl56j7k"><div class="x1lq5wgf xgqcy7u x30kzoy x9jhf4c x16d3s56 x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1fznrkb"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl xh8yej3"><img class="x1rg5ohu x5yr21d xl1xv1r xh8yej3" alt="image" src="https://scontent-den2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/486649572_122226151556236234_3403217575252105429_n.jpg?stp=c0.177.1080.1080a_dst-jpg_s206x206_tt6&amp;_nc_cat=102&amp;ccb=1-7&amp;_nc_sid=405ec2&amp;_nc_ohc=QWWgb3PjcpIQ7kNvwFIP-iW&amp;_nc_oc=AdnFisiM9gJsat6GZ7d-0DCyRGWd6orzDKkbCI5ca-y-0qBJY9FVmg2BO1N9urYfr10zg5dqxeN7aObKB_p6XCIW&amp;_nc_zt=23&amp;_nc_ht=scontent-den2-1.xx&amp;_nc_gid=djKe4iwFJDkjJle2L8k7dQ&amp;oh=00_AfMm9ytwuY0C8jtGYtQUk2M2Wg_IZatsDHl5qWqXgIBqJg&amp;oe=6846C78F"></div><div class="x10l6tqk x5yr21d xh8yej3"></div></div></a></div></div><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib xyqm7xq x1ok221b xeuugli"><a class="x1i10hfl xjbqb8w x1ejq31n x18oe1m7 x1sy0etr xstzfhl x972fbf x10w94by x1qhh985 x14e42zd x9f619 x1ypdohk xt0psk2 xe8uvvx xdj266r x14z9mp xat24cr x1lziwak xexx8yu xyri2b x18d9i69 x1c1uobl x16tdsg8 x1hl2dhg xggy1nq x1a2a7pz x1heor9g xkrqix3 x1sur9pj x1s688f" href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/1048748016842465/permalink/1194927178891214/" role="link" tabindex="0" target="_self"><span class="x193iq5w xeuugli x13faqbe x1vvkbs x1xmvt09 x1lliihq x1s928wv xhkezso x1gmr53x x1cpjm7i x1fgarty x1943h6x xtoi2st xw06pyt x1603h9y x1u7k74 x1xlr1w8 xzsf02u" dir="auto"><span class="x1lliihq x6ikm8r x10wlt62 x1n2onr6 x1120s5i" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; display: -webkit-box;">Mexican Street Corn White Chicken Chili
Ingredients
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 yellow onion, chopped
1 jalapeno, diced
4 cups Chicken Bone Broth
1.5 cups sour cream
1/2 cup shredded monterey jack cheese, (I used a blend of monterey jack and mild cheddar)
4 cloves of garlic, minced
1/2 tablespoon dried Oregano
1/2 teaspoon Chili Powder
2 cups frozen sweet white corn
1/2 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
1 lime, juice
3 tablespoons cornstarch
3 tablespoons water
Optional Toppings
cotija cheese
bacon crumbles
tortilla strips
sliced avocado
Olive Oil
Instructions
Heat a large, heavy bottomed pot on medium-high heat with 1 tbsp of olive oil. Saute the onion and jalapeno until the onion begins to soften. Then add garlic, oregano, and chili powder, stir until completely combined and add the broth, chicken, and salt and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to simmer and cover for 10-15 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked.
Meanwhile, combine the cornstarch and the water in a small bowl.
When the chicken is finished cooking, transfer it to a plate and shred with two forks. Add the shredded chicken back into the pot with the sour cream, shredded cheese, cilantro, corn, and lime juice. Mix until fully combined, then add the cornstarch mixture (give it a good stir first to collect any cornstarch that has settled on the bottom) and stir well until fully combined. Simmer for 10 minutes uncovered to thicken, stir occasionally.
To serve, divide between bowls and top with bacon, cotija cheese crumbles, tortilla strips, and sliced avocado.</span></span></a><div class="x78zum5 xdt5ytf x1iyjqo2 x1qughib"><div
